pa| de bzhin no/ /zhes gsol to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ nga'i drung du mya ngan las 'da' bar bsam ste rab tu byung ba de la pa Na phrag stong ri ba'i gos dang / mi lnga brgya yod
pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / ro sna brgya dang ldan pa'i zas rnams rjes su gnang ngo / /dge slong dag /tshul khrims nyams pa dag ni/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar rkang pa'i rting pa
gcig tsam yang yongs su spyad par mi gnang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag la ni/ nyes pa'i dmigs 'di bcu yod de/ bcu gang zhe na/ tshul khrims
kyis bdag smad pa dang / gzhan dang / lha dang / ston pas smad pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa dang / chos nyid kyis smad pa dang / phyogs phyogs su sdig pa
mi snyan pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pas grags par 'gyur ba dang / ma rtogs pa rnams rtogs par mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa rnams nyams pa dang / sngon thos pa'i chos
rnams brjed par 'gyur pa dang / rnam par 'gyod bzhin du dus byed pa dang / lus dang bral nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro ngan song du log par lhung nas sems can dmyal bar
skye'o| |'on kyang dge slong dag gis spyad pa ni/ bzhi ste/ bdag po byed cing yongs su spyod pa dang / byin pas yongs su spyod pa dang / gnang bas yongs su spyod pa dang / bu lon gyis yongs su spyod
pa'o| |de las dge slong 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba de dag ni/ bdag po byed cing yongs su spyod pa'o/ /kun tu sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dag ni/
byin pas yongs su spyod pa'o/ /so so'i skye bo dge ba can bsam gtan dang / klog pa la zhugs pa rnams ni/ gnang bas yongs su spyod pa'o/ /le lo can dag ni/ bu lon gyis
yongs su spyod pa'o/ /tshul khrims nyams pa ni/ yongs su spyod pa thams cad mi gnang ngo / /de lta bas na/ rnyed pa zhig yod na/ dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgo bar
bya'o| |gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// //mdor na/ bting ba dang ni ma bting dang / /phyung ba dang yang ma phyung dang / /de bzhin
mtshams kyi phyi rol gnas/ /thos pa yi rang bsam pas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma nyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so| |sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba dge slong gis shin tu myong bzhin du
gtan pa bting bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'ding ba'i tshe dge slong des dad pa byin la gnyid kyis log ste/ dge 'dun gyi
gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ro/ /u pa li/ de ltar na/ dge slong gtan pa shin tu myong bzhin du gtan pa bting bar mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge 'dun gyi gtan pa shin tu ma myong
bzhin du gtan bting bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ dge slong zhig gis dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba'i tshe dad pa byin la nyal la/ dge 'dun gyi gtan pa yang bting
bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba shin tu ma myong ba yang gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ro/ u pa li/ de bzhin du dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'ding
ba'i tshe dad pa byin pa la gnyid kyis log gam/ snyoms par zhugs pa ste/ shin tu ma myong yang gtan pa bting bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis gtan pa
'byin pa'i tshe myong bar gyur kyang gtan pa ma phyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'ding pa'i tshe dad pa ma byin la
gnyid kyis log gam/ snyoms par zhugs pa ste/ u pa li/ de ltar na/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myong bar gyur kyang gtan pa ma phyung bar 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong zhig gis

dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe myong par ma gyur kyang gtan pa phyung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ yod de/ 'di ltar/ dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi gtan pa 'byin pa'i tshe dad pa byin la gnyid kyis

log gam/ snyoms par zhugs sam/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song yang rung ste/ dge 'dun gyis gtan pa phyung ngo / /zhes thos te/ thos nas kyang legs par phyung ba'o/ /shin tu phyung ba'o/ /zhes rjes su yi rang
ba'o| |gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// //mdor na/ bslab pa byin dang tshul shing dang / /gang la las rnams bya ba dang / /bcu gnyis rnams la slar
'khyal dang / /mi gtsang ba dang mi btsan pa/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal bas tshul shing brim zhing las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /ma ning dang / za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /
pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / kun
gnas dang / so sor gnas pa dang / mi gnas pas tshul shing brim zhing las bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gang la las bya ba de slar 'khyal na yang mi btsan no/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ gang la chos bzhin ma lags par las bgyis pa de slar 'khyal na yang mi btsan par 'gyur ram
u pa li/ de ni/ btsan no/ btsun pa/ gang zag gi las bcu gnyis bsgos pa'i tshe de dag 'di skad du/ nged cag la ma bsgo zhig ces mchi na/ ci/ de dag de ltar 'khyal ba yang
mi btsan nam/ u pa li/ btsan no/ /de ni/ ngas chad pas bcad pa rnams kyi phyir bsam ste/ gsungs so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mi gtsang ba rnams slar 'khyal na/
mi btsan no/ /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mi gtsang ba zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ gang la phas pham pa bzhi'i nang nas gang yang rung ba zhig byung bar gyur
pa ste| de tsam gyis na/ mi gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// //mdor na/ bslab pa byin dang las byed dang //
kun gnas kyang ni de bzhin te/ /bsnyen rdzogs mtshams kyi phyi rol du/ /mngags te gtang bar mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ las bgyid pa bslab pa stsal bas las bgyis na/ bgyis pa zhes
bgyi'am/ 'on te ma bgyis pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ ma byas pa zhes bya ste/ slar yang bya dgos so/ /de bzhin du ma ning dang / za ma dang / mi gnas pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
bya'o| |gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig la dge sbyong zhig bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod nas des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i dge slong rnams sbran te/ des
bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir des dge tshul pha de khrid de dkyil 'khor du dong nas de dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu dkyil 'khor du phyin nas de mtshams kyi phyi rol tu mngags te btang
ba dang / de gnyen dag gis khrid de song ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa de rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi dngos por 'gyur ba'i bar chad du gyur pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge
slong dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de mtshams
kyi phyi rol tu ma mngags shig /'di lta ste/ dge slong dag /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo dbang bskur ba'i rigs pa/ dbang ma bskur nas rgyal tshab 'thob pa de/ rab
tu bsrung bar bya ba dang / rab tu bskyang bar bya ba de bzhin du dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa de yang rab tu bsrung zhing bskyang ba'i rigs so/ /de
lta bas na/ dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa'i dge tshul de/ mi thos pa'i nye 'khor tsam du spangs la mthong ba'i nye 'khor tsam du thal mo sbyar te mngon du lta bzhin
zhog cig /de ltar na/ nyes pa'i dmigs su mi 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// //mdor na/ bzod par gsol ba byed
dang mtshams/ /spu bsnyal ba yang de bzhin no/ /'thab mo rgod pa bsdigs pa dang / /smad par bya dang rigs sun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdigs pa'i las
bgyis pas bzod par gsol cig /ces gsungs na/ gang du bzod par gsol bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ mtshams kyi nang du'o/ /ji ltar bzod par gsol bar bgyi/ spu
langs shing rab tu langs pa las dge 'dun la spu nyal bar byed/ 'byung bar rtsol/ phyag 'tshal ba mngon du ston cing / 'thab mo rgod pa de yang slar gtong ba'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'thab mo rgod pa'i dge slong dag la bsdigs pa'i las byos shig /ces gsungs na/ de ste btsun pa/ de la bsdigs pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshe ma rangs par gyur na/ de la
thabs ji lta bur bgyi/ u pa li/ de'i yo byad dang rdzas las kha cig gis lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer cig /kha cig gis ni/ par bur gyi snod dag khyer la phyi rol tu phyung ste
'or cig /de ste ka ba la 'ju na yang ka ba chod cig /de ste sgo skyes la 'ju na yang sgo skyes phyung la/ de la ngo ldog mi phod pa ma byed cig /de slar sus bcos par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyis
so/ /su la bcol ba'i yo byad dgug /sbyin bdag la slong la de ste ma 'byor na/ dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor las byos shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /de ste btsun pa/ dge
slong ma zhig 'thab mo rgod par gyur na/ de la yang bsdigs pa'i las bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de la yang bsdigs pa'i las bya'o/ /de ste ma rangs par gyur na zhes pa nas/ the tshom ma byed cig ces
bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ de ste dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma zhig 'thab mo rgod par gyur na/ de dag la yang bsdigs par bgyi'am/ de la the tshom
du ma byed cig ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rigs sun phyung ba'i dge slong la bskrad pa'i las byos shig /ces gsungs na/ de ste btsun pa/
de la bskrad pa'i las bgyid pa'i tshe de ma rangs par gyur na/ de la ji ltar bgyi/ u pa li/ de la yo byad rnams zhes bya ba nas the tshom ma byed
cig /ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /de bzhin du dge slong mas rigs sun pa dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dag la yang bskrad pa'i las bgyi'am/
de la the tshom du ma byed cig /ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ 'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam
po so gsum pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong skrod cig ces gsungs na/ sus bskrad par bgyi/ de ni/ dge 'dun gyis bskrad par
bya'o/ /de'i yo byad las kha cig gis ni/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer/ kha cig gis ni/ par bur gyi snod dag khyer te phyi rol tu phyung la 'or cig /de ste ka ba la 'jus na/
ka ba chod cig /sgo skyes la 'jus na/ sgo skyes kyang phyung la/ de la ngo ldog mi phod par ma byed cig /slar sus bcos par bgyi/ dge 'dun gyis so/ /'chos pa'i yo byad su las
dgug /yon bdag la bskul lo/ /des kyang ma 'byor na/ dge 'dun thams cad kyi nor gyis slar bcos par bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong
la ji ltar dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dag kyang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa la smod par byed pa'i dge slong de la slar bsdum
pa'i las byos shig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de ste dge slong mas kyang khyim pa la smad par gyur na/ de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de la yang slar bsdum pa'i
las byed du chug cig /dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin no/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khyim pa la smod na/ slar bsdum pa'i las
byed du chug cig /ces gsungs na/ dge slong gis dge slong la smod na/ de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de la yang slar bsdum pa'i las bya'o/ /dge slong gis dge slong
ma dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /dge slob mas dge slong ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma
la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /dge slob mas dge slob ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /dge tshul phas dge tshul pha
dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /dge tshul mas dge tshul ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
dge slob ma dang / dge tshul pha la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /de ltar 'khor lo bzhin rgyas par brjod do/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa
bdun pa'o// //mdor na/ dge tshul dag dang bsdigs pa dang / /lnga las nyung ba mi gnas dang / /u pa lis ni ji ltar dris/ /nub mo lnga yang byin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun
pa/ dge slong gis bsdigs pa'i las bgyis pa'i dge tshul la bsnyen par rdzogs pa bgyis na/ de bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/
u pa li/ bsnyen par ni/ rdzogs mod kyi/ bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa ni/ 'das pa dang bcas pa'o/ /bzod pa ni/ gsol ba zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis lo lnga lon la/ chos rnam pa lnga dang ldan na/ gnas ma bcas kyang ljongs spyad pa spyod du gnang ngo / /zhes gsungs na/ btsun pa/ lo bzhi lon la chos rnam pa lnga dang ldan
na/ de'ang gnas ma bcas par ljongs spyod pa spyod du gnang ngam/ u pa li/ mi gnang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lo lnga ma lon pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro/ /de ste lo drug gam/ lo
dgu lon la/ de yang chos lnga dang mi ldan na/ de gnas ma bcas par ljongs spyad pa spyod du gnang ngam/ u pa li/ mi gnang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos lnga dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir
ro/ /btsun pa/ dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo gsum lon la/ de yang sde snod gsum dang ldan pa/ rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/ dri ma gsum dang bral na/ de yang gzhan la gnas
bca' bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de yang de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcas pa'i tshul du bya ba'i phyir ro/ /ji srid du gnas ma bcas pa la rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de mang na
yang zhag lnga'i bar du ste/ yang gnas bca' ba chol zhing sbyor ba ma btang ba'o/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ mthun pa
dag dang mi mthun pa/ /tshad gzung du yang med pa dang / /bcas pa dang ni ma bcas pa/ /de bzhin ming dang rigs kyang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i tshal mgon med zas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ nongs pa mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi/ mi mthun pa zhes kyang bgyi na
btsun pa/ nongs pa mthun pa gang lags/ mi mthun pa gang lags/ u pa li/ phas pham pa rnams ni/ phas pham par mthun gyi/ gzhan dang mi mthun pa'o/ /dge 'dun gyi lhag ma
ni/ dge 'dun gyi lhag mar mthun no/ /ltung ba ni/ ltung bar mthun no/ /so sor bshags pa ni/ so sor bshags par mthun no/ /nyes byas ni/ nyes byas su
mthun no/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa chad dang ldan pa zhes kyang bgyi/ nongs pa tshad dang mi ldan pa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/ tshad dang ldan pa ni/ gang lags/ mi ldan pa ni/ gang lags/
u pa li/ gang zhag gi mtha' dang / nyes pa'i mtha' dran par gyur pa ste/ tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /gang zhag dang nyes pa'i mtha' mi dran par gyur pa de ni/ tshad dang mi ldan pa zhes
bya'o/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa bcabs pa zhes kyang bgyi/ ma bcabs pa zhes kyang bgyi na/ btsun pa/ bcabs pa gang lags/ ma bcabs pa gang lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ rnam pa
gnyis kyis bcabs pa ste/ sems kyis bcabs pa dang / zhag tu bcabs pa'o/ /de la zhag tu bcabs pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma bcabs pa'o/ /sems kyis bcabs pa gang yin
pa de ni/ bcabs pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ nongs pa rnams kyi ming dang / rus zhes bgyi ba/ btsun pa/ ming gang lags/ rus gang lags/ u pa li/ phas pham pa rnams
ni/ ming ngo / /de las byung ba ni/ rus so/ /dge 'dun gyi lhag ma zhes bya ba ni/ ming ngo / /de las byung ba ni/ rus so/ /ltung ba dang / so sor bshags pa dang / nyes byas rnams ni/
ming ngo / /de las byung ba ni/ rus so/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //mdor na/ gcig la chad pas bcad pa dang / /bslab pa byin la
mi spyad de/ /de dag la ni dad mi sbyin/ /dge slong byed dam mi len to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /
drug sde dag dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i nyes pa byung bar gyur nas de dag chad pas bcad pa dang / de dag ra ba'i nang du dkyil 'khor byas nas chad pa byed do/ /de dag la dge slong dag gis tshe
dang ldan pa dag /ci zhig byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ chad pa byed do/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis 'di ni/ slar bcabs pa yin gyi/ chad pa ma yin no/ /zhes smras pa dang /
de dag spa gong nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag /gang na dge slong gcig
pu gnas pa der chad pa'i las ma byed cig /ces bka' stsal to /gang du dge slong gnyis sam/ gsum gnas pa der yang dge slong dag gis chad pa'i las ma byed cig /gang
na dge slong bzhi'am/ de las lhag pa yang rung gnas pa der dge slong dag gis chad pa dang / gzhi nas bslang ba'i chad pa dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang / yid mgu bar bya ba
dang / gzhi nas bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas slar bslangs te yid mgu ba dag byos shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang na dge slong
bzhi'am/ de las lhag par gnas pa de dag tu dge slong gis chad pa dang / gzhi nas bslang ba'i chad pa dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang / yid mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas
bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba dag kyang byos shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong pa dag gis bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong bzhi la chad pa byed
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bslab pa'i byin pa'i dge slong bzhi la yang chad pa byed du mi gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa byin pa'i dge slong bzhi
la chad pa byed du mi gnang ngo / /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis bslab pa byin pa gsum dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gcig la byed do/ /bslab pa byin pa gnyis
dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gnyis la byed do/ /bslab pa byin pa gcig dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gsum la chad pa byed do/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bslab pa byin pa bzhi la yang chad pa ma byed cig/ /bslab pa byin pa gsum dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa
gcig la yang ma byed cig /bslab pa byin pa gnyis dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gnyis la yang ma byed cig /bslab pa byin pa gcig dang / tshul bzhin gnas pa gsum la yang chad pa ma
byed par yongs su dag pa bzhi'am/ de las mang ba rnams la chad pa byos shig /chad pas bcad pa la ji lta bar chad pa gzhi nas bslang ba dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba dang / yid mgu bar
byed pa dang / gzhi nas bslangs te yid mgu bar byed pa dang / gzhi nas slar bslang ba'i yid mgu bar bya ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pa la dad pa stsal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /chos nyid la reg na/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal ba las dad pa blang du rung ngam/ u
pa li/ de la dge slong du 'du shes bzhag na/ gdod rung ngo / /gleng gzhi'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs te/ sgo gnyis pa rdzogs so// //mdor
bsdus pa ni/ dkyil 'khor lhung bzed dugs khang dang / /dud pa btung dang khar phor dang / /lcags skra shing rta'i lte ba dang / gdang shing sgron ma mchod rten te/ /mdor na/ dkyil 'khor
lha yi gnas dang ni/ /phye dang gsum dang gnas mi 'cha'/ /lhung bzed med par rab tu byung / /lhung bzed la yang mi bri ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag gis gar bab bab tu lhung bzed bkrus pa dang / sa phyogs der sbrang ma dag
gis gang ste mi sdug par gyur pa bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis mthong nas/ ci/ 'phags pa dag gis phyogs 'dir bshang gci bgyis sam zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis/ bzhin
bzang / 'dir bshang gci dag ni/ sus kyang ma byas kyi/ nged kyi lhung bzed bkrus so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis/ 'phags pa/ khyed kyis 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba'i rigs so//
zhes smras pa dang / de dag spa gong nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de dag 'phya ste dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag ni/ mi gtsang ba ste/ gar bab bab tu lhung bzed 'khru'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de
ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus kyi/ de
bas na/ gar bab bab tu lhung bzed ma bkru bar dge slong dag gis lhung bzed gang du bkrus pa'i gnas der dkyil 'khor byos shig /ces bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
dkyil 'khor byos shig ces gsungs nas dge slong dag gis lhung bzed bkrus pa'i gnas der dkyil 'khor zlum por byas pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gtsug lag
khang du 'ongs te gnas kyi bar na mar dkyil 'khor yod pa dag mthong nas/ kye/ 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang / kha cig gis yang / kye/ 'di lta la shes par byar ci yod/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu
dag ni/ nyi ma la dad do/ /zhes smras so/ /gzhan dag gis/ kye/ de bzhin te/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag ni/ nyi ma la dad pa bden no/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ nyi ma dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ma byed cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis nyi ma dang 'dra ba'i dkyil
'khor ma byed ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis zla ba kham pa 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor byas so/ /der bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis yang gtsug lag khang du lhags nas/ kye/
dge slong shAkya'i bu dag ni/ zla ba la dad do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ zla
ba dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor kyang ma byed cig /dge slong dag gru bzhir byed pa la zhugs pa dang / gtsug lag khang der bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag yang lhags nas/ kye/ dge sbyong
shAkya'i bu dag ni/ ba lang la dad do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/
dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dang rnam pa gnyis ltar ma byed par mdung rtse dang rnga 'dra bar byos shig /ces bka' stsal nas dge slong rnams de cis bya ba mi shes nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ba lang gi lci ba'am/ sa'am/ chus byug par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis byos shig /ces gsungs pa
dang | dge slong dag gis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la de 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis byas te/ de mgu bar gyur pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkon mchog gsum la ni/ nyi ma'am/ zla ba'am/ ji ltar dad pa rnam pa thams cad du bya ste/ de la the tshom ma byed
cig |gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag pos gtor ma len
pa'i lha dag la rnam pa gsum gyis dus dus su yang dag par mgu bar bya/ yang dag par mchod par bya/ yang dag par bde bar bya'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ dus dus su gtsang ma'i byi
bdar dang / dus dus su gtor ma'i las kyang byed/ dus dus su sbyin pa'i yon kyang bsngo'o/ /dge slong dag sbyin par byed pa dang / sbyin bdag gis gtor ma len pa'i lha dag la dus dus
su yang dag par mgu bar bya/ yang dag par mchod par bya/ yang dag par bde bar byas na/ sbyin par byed pa dang / sbyin bdag rnams la yid dge bas slar brtse bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang / bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas yang ston pas gsungs pa/ skyes bu gang zag dad pa dag /gang gis lha rnams mchod byed pa/ /ston pa'i
bka' bzhin byed pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang de la bsngags/ /sa phyogs gang na shes rab can/ /mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan 'khod pa/ /bshos gsol sbyin rab bsgrag par bya/ /de dag
rjed pas rjod par 'gyur/ /mchod par byas pas mchod par 'gyur/ /de nas 'di la snying brtse ba/ /ma yis lus bskyed bu la bzhin/ /lhas rjes brtse ba'i mi rnams kyis/ /bde zhing bzang po
mthong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu gang zag la dad pas lha rnams la mchod na/ ston pa'i bka' bzhin byas pa yin te/ sangs rgyas dag gis kyang bsngags so/ /zhes
gsungs pa dang / drug sde dag gis ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / 'jig rten gyi lha dag la sogs te thams cad mchod par byed pa
dang | dad pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa rnams/ /'phags pa 'di dag dge bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rab tu byung na/ 'di ltar gnod pa sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang /
tshil dag za zhing gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dag la mchod de/ bdag cag dge bsnyen gyis kyang ring du spangs na/ 'di dag ni/ mchod par byed do/ /zhes nyes
pa ngor brjod/ 'phyas 'dogs shing mi snyan par zer nas de dag dge slong dag gis bzlog pa dang / ci'i phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ gang skyes bu gang zag
dad pa dag gis lha dag la mchod par byas na/ ston pa'i bka' bzhin du byas pa yin te/ sangs rgyas dag gis kyang bsngags so/ /zhes ma gsungs sam/ ci/ nged cag dad pa
ma yin nam/ ci'i phyir na mi mchod ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
dag /ngas khyim pa dag la dgongs te gsungs kyi/ dge slong dag la ma yin gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis lha rnams la mchod par ma byed cig /bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong dag lha rnams la mchod par ma byed ces gsungs pa dang / drug sde dag gis de dag la gnod par byed pa la zhugs pa dang / dge slong de dag gi rmi lam du nged
kyis nyes pa ci byas na/ nged la gnod par byed ces ston to/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag ma dad pa dag kyang / 'phags pa rnams/ 'di dag gis khyed cag la gnod pa ci zhig
byas na/ 'di dag ma rung bar byed ces 'phya'o/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la mchod par yang ma byed/ gnod par yang
ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag lam du zhugs te 'dong ba'i tshe lha dag gi rten mthong ba dang byol te lam mthon dman dang / tsher ma can du dong ba dang / de na dge slong kha
cig ni/ 'jag mas gnon/ kha cig ni/ tsher ma zug /kha cig ni/ dred nas lhung ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ lam byol te ma 'dong bar lam drang por dengs la/ lha dag gi rten la se gol gyi sgra phyung la zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bklag par bya ste/ de la the tshom ma
byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lhan cig spyod pa dang / nye gnas kyi
dge slong gi mkhan po dang / slob dpon la dus gsum du bltar song zhig /cas gsungs la/ mtshams chen po dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du chod cig /ces kyang gsungs na/ btsun pa/ de
ltar na/ slob dpon dang / mkhan po dpag tshad phyed dang gsum na mchis na/ de dag gis ji ltar mchi/ u pa li/ de dag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing bltar song zhig /de ste de dag rgyang
grags ldan gnas na/ de dag gis zhag bdun nam brgyad na bltar song zhig /de tshun chad ni/ ji ltar dus su bltar song zhig /'dom lnga brgya na gnas na
ni| de dag gis dus gsum du bltar song zhig /de ltar ma song na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo la rab
tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig 'ongs nas des de lhung bzed med par rab tu phyung ngo / /de'i tshe na dge slong dag gis lhung bzed bkrus nas lhung bzed gzhag pa'i sar bzhag ste mchod rten
la phyag byas nas bdag bdag gi lhung bzed blangs te zas bza' ba'i gnas su 'khod do/ /gang gi tshe dge slong dag zas bza' ba'i lhung bzed dag bkrus nas mchod rten la phyag byed
pa la zhugs pa dang / gsar du rab tu byung ba de yang de dag dang lhan cig tu phyag byas nas gang gi tshe dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag byas te lag pa bkrus pa dang / gsar du rab tu
byung ba des kyang gnas brtan kun shes ko'u 'di n+ya'i lhung bzed blangs pa dang / des de ltar bzlog go /de nas gang po dang / ming chen dang / ma 'gag pa dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal
gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / re ba ti la sogs pa'i lhung bzed blangs te/ de dag gis kyang slar bzlog pa dang / de mchi mas mig gang bzhin du phyogs gcig tu
bdug go /'dod chags dang ma bral pa'i dge slong dag /'di ltar lhung bzed med par sus rab tu byung zhes 'phyas 'dogs so/ /kha cig gis ni/ nye dga' bo yin no/ /zhes smras nas de dag
gis nyes pa sbom po la spyod pa de ma gtogs par gzhan su zhig de ltar byed ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed med par rab tu dbyung bar dang por lhung bzed dag tshol la gdod rab tu phyung zhig/
de ste mi 'byor na/ bdag gi lhung bzed chung du byin cig /dge slong dag gis lhung bzed med par rab tu phyung na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ tshe dang
ldan pa ma 'gag pa la nye gnas gzhon nu lhung bzed 'dzin pa zhig yod pa des de'i lhung bzed dang / bdag gi lhung bzed gnyis bkrus te/ lhung bzed de dag gnyis kyang 'dra ba zhig nas
bdag gi gang yin/ slob dpon gyi gang yin pa mi shes nas phyi zhig na des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa'i lhung bzed la slob dpon ma 'gag pa'i lhung bzed ces yi ge bris so/ /de nas dus phyi zhig
na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs ba dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams khyim du bshos la spyan drangs te/ khyim bdag de la sngon yongs su spyad pa'i smad 'tshong ma zhig yod de/
des de la yang bzang mo/ ngas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bshos la spyan drangs kyi/ khyod kyang tshur shog la rang gi lag gis kyang brim par byos
shig ces spring pa dang / de yang brel ba'i rkyen cig byung nas der ma 'ongs so/ /bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dag bshos gsol/ sbyin rabs gsungs nas slar bzhud pa dang /
tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa'i lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i gzhon nu de khyim de nyid du lhung bzed bkrus te 'gro'o/ /snyam du bsam nas 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag des 'phags pa/ lhung bzed skad
cig g.yar/ mdza' ba zhig la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zhig bskur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / des bdag gi ni/ ma byin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa'i lhung bzed byin pa dang / khyim bdag
des de'i nang du bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang mas bkang nas smad 'tshong ma de la bskur te 'phrin du/ bzang mo/ ngas ni/ kha zas zas 'di lta bus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
'dun rnams tshim par byas kyi/ khyod kyis de la rjes su yi rang skyed cig /ces spring ngo / /des kha zas de dag byo ba dang lhung bzed kyi zhabs la yi ge 'dug pa mthong nas bud med kyi yul ni/
rnam pa bco brgyad la mkhas te/ des bklags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa'i ming mthong nas des 'di snyam du/ bdag gis 'phags pa lha dang / mis mchod pa'i lhung bzed de 'di

bzhin du bskur ba'i mi rigs so/ /snyam du bsam nas/ des lhung bzed de dris phyis te de nas me tog bsung zhim pos bkang nas khri'u tshon gyis bris pa'i steng du bzhag ste de'i drung du btung nas pog \?\ por gyis

bdug cing 'dug pa dang / de na skyed pa gzhan zhig kaR+sha paN lnga brgya dang / dri dang / phreng ba dag khyer te de'i drung du 'ongs nas bzang mo/ ci byed/ kun tu spyad kyi/ 'dong ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / lhung
bzed la mchod pa bya'o/ skad cig sdod cig /des lhung bzed 'di gang nas 'ongs/ su'i yin zhes smras pa dang / mos ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so/ /des/ khyod kyis ya mtshan can thams cad dag

la yang sbyin pa gtong ste/ rab tu byung ba dag kyang ma shor to/ /zhes smras pa dang / de rna ba bkab nas sdig pa de lta bu ma byas kyi/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur ta re zhes smras so/ /mos de
skad smras kyang des log par byed pa de ma btang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong gang mi bri ba bris pa de ni/
nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur gyi/ de bas na/ dge slong dag mi bri ba ma 'bri zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la mi bri ba ma 'bri zhig /ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis gang mi
bri ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi bri pa rnam pa lnga ste/ so sor thar pa thams cad dang / so sor thar pa ldan pa dang / 'dul ba thams cad dang / 'dul ba thams cad du
ldan pa dang / gang zag so so'o/ /mtshan ma can du bya ba la ni/ nyes pa med do/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// //mdor
na| dge tshul gyis ni lhung bzed bcag /lhung bzed ji ltar bsreg par bya/ /sreg 'gebs gnang bar bya ba ste/ /drang srong chen pos rjes su gnang / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du
yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis dge tshul pha lhung bzed 'dzin pa de la des lhung bzed 'khrur bcug pa dang /
dge tshul pha de yang dran pa nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa zhig nas de'i lag nas lhung ste chag go /dge slong de phongs par gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong dag /gang cung zad dge slong dag gis dge tshul pha la lhung bzed 'khrur bcug na/ nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/ de bas na/ dge
slong dag gis dge tshul pha dag la lhung bzed 'khrur ma gzhug cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lhung bzed dge tshul pha la 'khrur ma gzhug cig ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i dge tshul pha tsun+da zhes bya ba lhung bzed 'dzin te/ des/ mkhan po/ lhung bzed tshur stsol cig /bkru'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / des/ bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab
pa'i gnas bcas te/ dge slong gis dge tshul pha dag la lhung bzed 'khrur ma gzhug cig /ces gsungs kyi/ nga nyid 'khru'i/ khyod phar song zhig /ces smras pa dang / des/ mkhan po/ ci/ bdag
gis kyang nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur ram zhes smras pa dang / des/ bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ chos kyi bdag po bas na/ ngas ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong
dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul pha dran pa nye bar gnas pa de dag la ni/ 'khrur gzhug ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/
mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag lhung bzed du zan zos nas de yang ma bcos pas btsas khyer nas rdol to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed sreg par byos shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed sreg shig /ces gsungs nas dge slong dag gis lhung bzed shing gis bsregs pa
dang / lhung bzed ma rung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shing gis sreg par ma byed cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis rtswa dang / sog ma dag gis g.yogs te bsregs pa
dang | de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa dang / sog mas g.yogs te sreg par ma byed cig ces bka' stsal nas dge slong dag gis ji ltar bsreg par bya ba mi
shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi sreg 'gebs sbyor cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis lhung bzed kyi sregs 'gebs ji ltar sbyor ba
mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sreg 'gebs la rnam pa gnyis te/ slob dpon gyis byas pa dang / bdag gis byas pa'o/ /de la slob dpon gyis byas pa ni/ bum
pa lta bu'o/ /bdag gis byas pa ni/ phru ba'am/ rdza ma yang rung ste/ thal bas bkang la rdza ma ji tsam ran par gyis shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis gyo mo'i nang du de
bzhin du bsregs pas de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rol tu ni/ 'jim pa dang phub mar bsres pas yugs la nang du til gyi tshigs
ma'am/ ba lang gi lci bas yugs te/ de bskams pa dang sa gzhi byi bdar gyis la/ 'og tu phub ma'am/ til gyi tshigs ma dang / gzhan yang byad bzang du 'gyur ba dag bting ste rtswa
dang / lci ba dang / sog ma dag gis g.yogs la ci nas dud pa ma shor bar byos la sregs shig /de'i g.yas g.yon chag chag thob la skyang nul gyis shig /ci nas srog chags dag bde
bar bya ba'i phyir ro/ /bsregs pa de grang ba dang lhung bzed phyung la khrus te nam kha dog zhen par gyur gyi bar du sreg par gyis shig /de bas na/ lhung bzed kyi sreg 'gegs dang / yo byad
dag rjes su gnang ngo / /gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// //mdor na/ gcig la gcig dang dugs khang dang / /khyim pa gsum pa de bzhin te/ /
gding ba dang ni de bzhin sgra/ /lci bas byas pa kun thos pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan du yod pa na
khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi dge 'dun gyi phyir dugs khang zhig byas so/ /de nas drug sde dag gis gos gcig pus smad g.yogs byas te gcig la gcig las byed cing 'khod pa dang / bram ze
dang | khyim bdag dag phyogs der lhags pa dang / de dag gis de mthong nas/ kye/ 'di lta bu dag tu byed pa su zhig ces smras pa dang / de na kha cig gis mu stegs can de dag yin no/ /zhes smras so//
yang kha cig gis/ 'di dag ni/ mu stegs can ma yin gyi/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag 'phya ba la zhugs te/ kye/ ston pa ni/ ngo tsha dang ldan na/ ci'i phyir 'di dag ngo tsha
ba dang / khrel med ces smras so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag
rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus kyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag dugs khang du gos gcig pu gyon te gcig la gcig las ma byed cig /dge slong dag gis gos gcig bu gyon te dugs khang du las
byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis dge 'dun phyir dugs khang zhig
byas pa dang / der dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyis byugs te rkang pa la reg nas mgo bo la reg/ /mgo bo la reg nas kha la reg /kha la reg nas lag pa dang rkang pa la reg /lag pa dang rkang pa
la reg nas slar yang kha la reg cing / gos ngan pa zhig gis smad g.yogs te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam zhig na khyim pa ma dad pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs nas des dge slong dag mthong ba dang / de
'phya ba la zhugs te/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu dag ni/ mi gtsang ba ste/ rkang pa la reg pa kha la reg par byas nas gos ngan pas smad g.yogs byas te/ gcer bur skye bo dag gi nang na
'dug go /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams
'phya ba ni/ yus kyi/ de bas na/ dugs khang du khyim pa ma gzhug cig /ma dad pa yang las byed du ma gzhug cig /dugs khang gi sgo ba dge slong rnams bskos la de dag gis khyim bdag
nang du ma gtang zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dugs khang du khyim pa ma gtang zhig /las kyang byed du ma gzhug cig /ces gsungs pa dang / de nas dus phye zhig na dugs khang du zhugs
pa'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin der 'ongs pa dang / dge slong sgo bas smras pa/ khyim bdag nang du ma 'gro bar 'dug cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dugs khang du ma gtang zhig/
ces bka' stsal to/ /des/ 'phags pa dag /ci/ kho bo yang gzhan du 'gyur ram/ kho bos ni/ nges par 'phags pa dag gi las bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dad pa dag ni/ dugs khang du thong la las kyang byed du chug cig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /bcom
ldan 'das kyis dad pa dag ni/ dugs khang du thong la las kyang byed du chug cig ces gsungs pa dang / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nang du 'gro ba na de dang lhan cig tu bram ze zhig
kyang 'ongs nas de ma btang ba dang des/ 'phags pa/ ci'i phyir na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ nang du btang la/ bdag ni/ mi gtong zhes smras pa dang / dge slong gis de la smras pa/ bram
ze| khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ dad pas na/ nang du btang ngo / /des smras pa/ 'o na/ bdag kyang dad par gyur na/ nang du gtong ngam zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de ste dad par gyur na/ nang du thong zhig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis de skyabs gsum du btang nas nang du
btang ngo / /des kyang dge slong dag rkang pa la reg nas kha dang mgo la reg cig/ gos ngan pas smad g.yogs nas sgren mor 'dug pa mthong ba dang / de ma dad de
'phya ba la zhugs so/ /dge sbyong shAkya'i bu ni/ mi gtsang ba ste/ rkang pa la reg pa kha dang mgo bo la reg cing / gos ngan pas smad g.yogs nas sgren mor 'dug go /zhes smras pa dang / da
ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rab tu dad pa dag ni/ dugs khang gi nang du thong zhig /dad pa chung
ba dag ni/ ma gtang zhig// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po so bzhi pa/ gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis sangs
rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag dugs khang du spyan drangs te dge slong dag nang du zhugs pa dang / de na dgra bcom pa'i dge slong zhig gis tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong
zhig la las byed cing 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nang du gshegs nas des las byed pa gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
khyed cag gis dge slong 'di la dge slong 'dis las byed pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong ngo / /zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong las byed pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'o/ /gang
la las bya ba 'di ni/ tshul khrims nyams pa/ sdig pa'i chos can khong rul pa/ zags pa/ gsog tu gyur pa/ dung sgra lta bur spyod pa/ dge sbyong ma yin pa dge sbyong du yid ma 'dzin pa/ tshangs par
spyod pa ma yin pa tshangs par spyod par yi dam 'dzin pa ste/ de bas na/ dge slong dag seng+ge lta bus wa 'dra ba'i las ma byed cig /byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
seng+ge 'dra bas wa lta bu'i las ma byed cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig de dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs

su spyod do/ /de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las/ dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de la zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / bu btsas nas bu pho zhig byung ste/ de
gzugs legs pa/ blta na sdug cing mdzes pa/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas ming btags so/ /de bsrings bskyed nas cher gyur pa dang / de
dus phyi zhig na dze ta'i tshal du song ste legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas de mdzod gsum dang ldan par gyur te/ des 'di snyam du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag/ bu'i
pha ma ni/ dka' bar bya ba byed de/ phan par byed pa'o/ /gso bar byed pa'o/ /skyed par byed pa'o/ /nu ma snun par byed pa'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs pa ston par byed pa yin te/ bus phrag pa gcig
la ni/ ma/ gnyis pa la ni/ pha khyer te lo brgya tshang gi bar du khyer tam/ yang nas gzhi chen po nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / shel dang /
gser dang / dngul dang / asma gar+b+ha dang / spug dang / g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba de lta bu dag gis dbang por bcug gam/ dbang phyug tu bcug kyang des ni/ pha dang ma la bus phan btags
pa'am/ nye bar phan btags par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis pha ma dad pa med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs par byas sam/ yang dag par bskul tam/ dul bar byas sam/ 'jug par byas
sam| so sor bkod dam/ tshul khrims ngan pa las tshul khrims phun sum tshogs par/ ser sna can las gtong ba phun sum tshogs par/ shes rab 'chal ba las shes rab phun sum
tshogs par yang dag par bskul/ dul bar byas/ zhugs par byas/ so sor bkod na/ de lta bu ni/ bus pha dang / ma la phan btags pa dang / nye bar phan btags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes
gsungs so/ /snyam du bsam nas bdag gis kyang ci nas pha ma la phan btags pa cung zad cig bya'o/ /snyam nas ji srid dga' ba'i bar du gshongs spyod cing 'dug nas mnyan du yod pa
gang na ba de logs su gshongs spyod cing song ngo / /mthar gyis spyad pa spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin to/ /des de gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gnas la rab tu bkod
do| |de nas dus phyi zhig na des pha'i drung du song las bsod nams su bya ba'i dngos po bdun po'i yon tan rgyas par brjod pa dang / des 'phags pa/ bdag gis kyang nor sna bdun las byas pa'i
bsod nams kyi dngos po cung zad cig bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / des bgres po/ de bzhin legs kyi gyis shig /ces smras pa dang / ci zhig bya/ dugs khang zhig gis shig /des dugs
khang byas te khyim bdag de rang gi dugs khang du rang gi las bya ba la zhugs te shin tu ngal bar gyur nas bkru ba'i yo byad dang / 'bru mar dang / phye la sogs pa mang du lhag go /de nas des/ bu
bdag rab tu ngal bar gyur gyi/ nga'i rgyab cung zhig mnyes shig /ces smras pa dang / des/ yab/ bcom ldan 'das kyis seng+ge lta bus wa lta bu dag la bsnyen bkur ma byed cig /ces bka' stsal

te ma gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / des bu/ seng+ge lta bu gang / wa lta bu gang zhes smras pa dang / yab/ bdag ni/ seng+ge dang 'dra/ khyod ni/ wa dang 'dra'o/ /bu/ de ci'i phyir zhes smras pa dang / yab/

bdag ni/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /khyod ni/ tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bu/ de ltar wa dang 'dra ba nga lta bu las seng+ge dang 'dra ba khyod lta bu skyes sam zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/ yang dag par mchod par byed/
yang dag par bde bar skyong bar byed pa'i rigs de ni/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu pha ma la chos bzhin byed/ tshul bzhin byed pa ni/ tshangs
pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag /rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/ yang dag par mchod par byed/ yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni/ slob dpon dang bcas
pa'o| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin byas na/ slob dpon lta bur 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/ yang dag par
mchod par byed/ yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rigs de ni/ sbyin par rigs pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin du byas na/ sbyin par rigs pa'o//
dge slong dag /rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/ yang dag par mchod par byed/ yang dag par bde bar bsnyen bkur byed na/ rigs de ni/ me dang bcas pa'o/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin du byas na/ me lta bu'o/ /dge slong dag /rigs gang na pha ma la yang dag par mgu bar byed/ yang dag par mchod par byed/ yang dag par bde
bar bsnyen bkur byed na/ rigs de ni/ lha dang bcas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bus pha ma la chos bzhin du byas na/ lha lta bur 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka'
stsal pa dang / bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas yang gsungs pa/ pha dang ma gnyis tshangs pa ste/ /slob dpon lha yang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar me yi lha phran bzhin/ /bu yi sbyin pa'i

gnas yin no/ /de bas de gnyis phyag bya zhing / /phyi bar bya zhing bkru ba dang / /rkang pa gnyis kyang bkru bar bya/ /de bzhin mkhas pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /yang na bza' ba btung ba dang / /bgo ba mal stan de
bzhin te/ /des ni pha dang ma gnyis la/ /mkhas pas bsnyen bkur bcas byed na/ /'dir ni mnar bar mi 'gyur te/ /song nas mtho ris dga' bar 'gyur/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde de
gsungs pa de'i tshe na dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pha dang / ma dang / bla ma la ni/ rim
gro bgyid pa'i yon tan brjod pa ni/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di la ci zhig ngo mtshar cher yod/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
'dod chags med/ zhe sdang med/ gti mug med/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa
rnams med bzhin du pha ma la rim gro bya ba'i yon tan brjod pa pas/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gti mug dang bcas/ skye ba dang bcas/ rga ba dang / na ba
dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grol ba na yang ma la
gnod pa cung zad cig byas nas sdug bsngal chen po rjes su myong ngo / /phan pa cung zad cig byas nas kyang bde ba chen po rjes su myong bar gyur te/ de dag legs par shin tu yid la byos shig dang

bshad par bya'o/ /sngon byung ba ni/ dge slong dag /sngon 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na ded dpon mdza' bo zhes bya ba/ phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ gnas rgya che zhing yangs
pa zhig ste/ ngal bso po'i nor dang 'dra ba/ ngal bso po'i nor la 'gran pa zhig yod de/ des rigs mnyam pa'i chung ma zhig blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/ /de la rtse
dga' yongs su spyad pa las bu pho rnams byung yang shi nas de bu med de/ bu 'dod pas lha gu lang dang / wa ru na dang / ngal bso po dang / ba sa ba la sogs pa lha stong la gsol kyang de'i bu gson
par ma gyur te/ de la gzhan zhig gis/ de ste khyod la bu pho zhig btsas na/ bu mo'i ming du thogs shig dang / yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /de dus phyi zhig na de dang lhan cig
tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/ /des rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon nas khye'u zhig btsas te/ de gzugs legs
shing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu/ mgo gdugs 'dra ba/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba dang / kos ko ring ba/ smin ma snyoms pa/ sna mtho zhing yan lag
dang nying lag thams cad du ldan pa zhig btsas te/ de btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas ming gdags par brtsams te mdza' bo'i bu ste/ bu mo'i ming du gdags pas na/ khye'u 'di'i ming bu mo mdza'

mor gdags so/ /ji tsam na khye'u bu mo mdza' mo zhes bya ba de cher gyur pa dang / de'i pha yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs te/ de de nyid du shi bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo mdza' mos ma la/ bdag gi pha

sngon las kyi 'bras bu gang gis 'tsho/ bdag kyang phyis de bzhin du bsgrub bo/ /zhes smras pa dang / mas bsam pa/ sngon rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'jug pa'i tshong pa yin no/ /zhes 'di la smras na ni/ /'di

nyid kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs te/ de nyid du shi bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsam nas des/ bu/ khyod kyi pha ni/ sngon 'bru tshong pa byed byed de/ khyod kyang dga' na/ 'bru tshong ba gyis shig /ces smras

pa dang / des 'bru'i tshong khang brtsigs te thog ma'i nyin par kaR+sha pa Na bzhi rnyed de/ des de dag ma la byin no/ /de nas dus phyi zhig na gzhan zhig gis de la khyod kyi pha ni/ sngon dri tshong pa'o/ /zhes smras

pa dang / des 'bru tshong pa btang ste/ dri tshong pa'i tshong khang brtsigs so/ /de nas nyi ma dang po'i tshe kaR+sha pa Na brgyad rnyed nas des yang de dag ma la byin no/ /de nas dus phyi zhig na gzhan zhig gis de la khyod
kyi pha ni/ gser tshong pa yin no/ /zhes smras pa dang / des yang dri tshong pa btang ste gser tshong pa la zhugs pa dang / de'i nyi ma dang po la kaR+sha pa Na bcu drug rnyed pa dang

des yang de dag ma la byin no/ /phyis de nyin mo des kaR+sha pa Na sum cu rtsa gnyis rnyed pa dang des de dag ma la byin no/ /de nas gser tshong pa phrag dog can dag gis grong khyer thams cad kyi gser

'dis bsdus so/ /snyam du bsam nas bu mo mdza' mo la/ khyed 'di lta bu byed cing 'tsho ste ci rung / khyod kyi pha ni/ sngon rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i tshong pa yin na/ khyod sus 'di 'dra ba ngan pas 'tsho

ba la 'jug tu bcug /ces smras pa dang / de gser tshong pa dag gi tshig des bskul pas de'i ma'i thad du song ste/ ma/ bdag gi pha ni/ 'di ltar sngon rgya mtsho chen po'i tshong pa'o/ /zhes thos na/ rjes su
gnongs shig dang / bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs la mchi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / mas de la/ bu/ de ni/ bden mod kyi/ khyod ni/ gzhon la bu gcig pu ste/ kho mo bor nas rgya mtsho chen

por ma 'gro zhig /ces smras pa dang / de nas bu mo mdza' mos ma'i tshig ma mnyan te bdag gi grong khyer du gang rgya mtsho chen por zhugs shing 'dong du dad pa rnams 'dong ngo / /zhes des bdag nyid ded

dpon du bsgrags so/ /de nas tshong pa lnga brgyas bskor te dong ba dang / de ma'i snying du sdug pas dkrugs te mchi mas brnangs bzhin rkang pa gnyis la bzung ste/ bu/ kho mo bor te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs

la ma 'gro zhig ces smras pa dang / de 'di ltar snying rje zhing mi dga' ste dal gyis smras pa la khros nas ma'i mgo bo rkang pas phul te de mgron po mang po dang 'grogs te song ngo / /mas/ bu khyod la las

'di rnam par smin par ma gyur cig /ces smras pa dang / de nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / des dong tshe rnying pa lnga
brgyas gru bo che nyos te gru'i nang du 'jug pa dang / 'byin pa dang / mnyan pa dang / nyag thag 'dzin pa dang / phyogs rtog pa'i mi dag la gla byas nas des dril chen por lan gsum du bsgrags

nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs te song ba dang / ji tsam zhig na chu srin nya'i rigs kyis gru ma rung bar byas nas bu mo mdza' mo gru tshal zhig la 'jus nas mthar phyin to/ /de nas skam la song ba
dang | dga' ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer de mthong ste/ de der song nas de nas lha'i bu mo gzugs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzhi byung ste/ der 'ongs nas bu mo mdza' mo bde bar 'ongs sam/ 'di ni/

bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa dang / btung ba'i khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / nyal ba'i khang pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang /
dngul gyis gang ba yin gyi/ 'di bzhes shig /tshur spyon/ bdag cag dang lhan cig bzhugs so/ /zhes smras nas de dang lhan cig lo du ma/ lo brgya du ma/ lo stong du ma/ lo brgya stong du mar ji
ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu chen pos rang gi bsod nams la myong bar gyur ba bzhin myong bar gyur to/ /de dag

gis lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo ba dang de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma btang yang der 'gro bar 'then te/ des phyi zhig na lho phyogs su song ba dang / de rtag tu ra ro ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer
mthong nas de'i sgor phyin pa dang / de nas kyang lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/ de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/ de bas kyang mdzes pa brgyad byung ste/ de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo tshur

spyon/ bde bar byon tam/ bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa 'di dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / nyal ba'i khang pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / shel
dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dag gis gang ba yod kyi/ tshur spyon/ lhan cig bzhugs so/ /zhes smras nas bdag dang lhan cig lo du ma/ lo brgya du ma/ lo stong du ma/ lo brgya stong
du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu chen pos myong ba bzhin du myong bar gyur to/ /de dag gis kyang de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig
ces bsgo'o/ /de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig /ces bsgo na je thur 'then te 'gro 'dod nas ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang dga' ba can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer mthong
nas de'i sgor phyin pa dang / de nas yang lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/ de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/ de bas kyang mdzes pa bcu drug byung ste/ de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo bde bar byon tam/

bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon/ bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa 'di dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / nyal ba'i khang pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / shel dang /
byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul dag gis gang ba yod kyi/ tshur spyon/ lhan cig bzhugs so/ /zhes smras nas de dang lhan cig lo du ma/ lo brgya du ma/ lo stong du ma/ lo brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems

can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ rdzu 'phrul chen po mthu chen pos myong bar gyur pa bzhin myong bar gyur to/ /de dag gis kyang de la lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo'o/ /de lho phyogs

kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo yang je thur 'then cing 'gro bar 'dod nas de ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song ba dang / bla ma'i tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa bzang po zhig mthong nas de'i sgor 'ongs
ba dang / de'i nang nas lha'i bu mo de bas kyang gzugs legs pa/ de bas kyang blta na sdug pa/ shin tu bzang mo sum cu rtsa gnyis shig byung nas de dag gis bu mo mdza' mo tshur spyon/ mdza' mo bde

bar byon tam/ bdag cag gi zas kyi khang pa 'di dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / nyal ba'i khang pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / shel dang / byi ru dang /
gser dang / dngul la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba yod kyi/ tshur spyon/ lhan cig bzhugs so/ /zhes smras nas de dag dang lhan cig lo du ma/ lo
brgya du ma/ lo stong du ma/ lo brgya stong du mar ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul chen pos myong ba bzhin myong bar gyur to/ /de dag gis kyi lho phyogs
kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo'o/ /de lho phyogs kyi lam du ma 'gro zhig ces bsgo yang je thur 'then cing 'gro bar 'dod nas ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs kyi lam du song nas de phyi phyir zhing dad
pa skyes te/ de rim gyis lho phyogs su song ba dang lcags las byas pa'i grong khyer zhig mthong ste/ de der zhugs so/ /der zhugs ma thag tu de'i sgo yang slar bcad par gyur to/ /de nas yang

nang du song ba dang sgo yang de bzhin du bcad do/ /de nas yang nang du song ba dang / sgo yang bcad par gyur te/ ji tsam zhig na skyes bu rab tu lus che ba zhig de nas byung ste de'i spyi bo la lcags kyi
'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ shin tu rab tu 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa zhig 'khor zhing 'dug ste/ de'i mgo las rnag khrag byung ba ni/ zas su za bar mthong ngo / /de nas bu
mo mdza' mos skyes bu de la/ khyod ci'i phyir de ltar gyur ces dris pa dang / des/ ngas ni/ ma la gnod pa byas pa'i phyir ro/ /zhes skyes bu des de skad du smras ma thag tu bu mo mdza' mo de'i
las kyang mngon du smin par gyur te/ bdag gis kyang ma la gnod pa byas nas de'i las kyis 'dir khrid de 'ongs so/ /snyam bsam pa dang / de ma thag tu nam mkha' las sgra 'di skad du/ gang bcings

pa de ni/ thar/ gang ma bcings pa de ni/ bcings pa'o/ /zhes sgra de byung ma thag tu skyes bu de'i spyi bo na 'khor lo yod pa de ni/ med par gyur/ bu mo mdza' mo'i spyi bor 'khor lo byung ngo / /de nas bu mo

mdza' mo rab tu sdug bsngal bar skyes bu des mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rtag tu dga' dang dregs byed cing / /skyid par byed pa bor byas te/ /tshangs pa bla ma'i khang pa nas/ /ci yi phyir ni khyod
'dir 'ongs/ /bu mo mdza' mos smras pa/ rtag tu dga' dang dregs byed cing / /skyid par byed pa bor byas te/ /tshangs pa bla ma'i khang pa nas/ /'dir ni 'ongs par 'dod gyur pa/ /yun ring po yi las kyis
gnyer/ /las kyis ring nas gnyer nas kyang / /gang du las kyis gnyer ba der/ /las kyang rnam par smin par gyur/ /las gang rnam par smin pas na/ /'khor lo 'bar dang rab 'bar ba/ /bdag gi
srog la gnod gyur te/ /klad la 'khor lo 'bar bar gyur/ /mi des smras pa/ khyod kyis ngan pa'i sems bskyed do/ /dga' bar byed pa ma yi mgor/ /khyod kyis rdog pa brgyab pas na/ /de yi las kyi
'bras bu yin/ /bu mo mdza' mos smras pa/ 'khor lo 'bar ba rab 'bar ba/ /bdag gi srog la srog la gnod byed pa/ /lo grangs srong phrag ji srid du/ /nga yi klad la 'khor bar 'gyur/ /mi des smras pa/ lo
grangs stong phrag drug cu dang / /lo grangs brgya yi bar du ni/ /'bar ba'i lcags kyi 'khor los kyang / /khyod kyi mgo la 'joms par byed/ /de nas bu mo mdza' mo des
mi de la/ kye skyes bu/ gzhan dag kyang 'dir 'ong ba lta yod dam med ces smras pa dang / mi des smras pa/ gang gis las 'di lta bu byas pa dag ni/ 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bu mo mdza'
mo sdug bsngal gyis mngon du gzir ba dang / sems can rnams la snying rje ba bskyed nas mi de la 'di skad du smras so/ /kye skyes bu/ ngas sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'khor lo 'di mgo
la bzod par bya'i/ /gzhan dag gis 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pa de dag 'dir ma 'ongs shig /ces smras ma thag tu bu mo mdza' mo byang chub sems dpa' de'i mgo las 'khor lo de shing ta
la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'dug pa dang / de'ang dus 'das nas dga' ldan gnam gyi lha'i khams su skyes so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /dge

slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i dus na bu mo mdza' mo zhes bya ba de ni/ nga nyid yin te/ de'i tshe ngas tshong byas te/ kaR+sha pa Na ma la byin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni/ grong khyer chen
po rnam bzhir rab tu bde ba myong bar gyur to/ /de nas ngas ma la gnod pa cung zad cig byas pa de'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas ni/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur
to| |de bas na/ dge slong dag /de bzhin du bslab par gyis shig /pha dang / ma la phan gdags par bya yi/ gnod pa ma byed cig dang / de lta bu'i gnod pa mi myong bar 'gyur ba ni/ ji ltar
bu mo mdza' mo so so skye bo'i tshe na myong ba bzhin te/ yon tan mang por yang 'gyur zhing / de yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin te/ dge slong dag /de bzhin bslab par byos shig /dge slong dag /de lta
bas na/ tshul khrims rab tu nyams par gyur kyang rnam pa lnga la nye g.yog bya bar gnang ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ pha dang / ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / nad pa rnams so/ /gleng gzhi ni/
mnyan du yod pa na ste/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /nyi ma ni/ shar/ bya rog ni/ zer/ zhing pa ni/ rmo rko byed/ ma lus par rku ba rnams ni/ ngu'o/ /dge
slong dag /de ni/ dper byas te/ don de mi shes pa'i phyir don de'ang bstan par bya ste/ dge slong dag /nyi ma shar ces bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla

dwags so/ /bya rog zer ro/ /zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi snod gang zag rnams kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /zhing ba zhing rmod ces bya ba ni/ sbyin par byed pa dang / sbyin bdag rnams kyi tshig bla dwags so/ /ma lus

par rku ba rnams ngu'o/ /zhes bya ba ni/ bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong dag /ston pa ni/ nyan thos dag la thugs brtse bas thugs rje'i don ston pa/ phan par dgongs pa/
thugs rje bzhin pas na/ ngas khyod la don byas kyi/ khyod kyis da bya ba'i rigs so/ /de 'di ltar dgon pa dang / shing drung dang / khang stong dang / ri dang / grog po dang / ri
phug dang / sog ma'i phung po dang / bla bag med pa dang / dur khrod dang / nags tshal gyi phyogs dang / bas mthar gnas par bya ste/ dge slong dag/ bag med par ma byed cig /phyis 'gyod par
gyur ta re/ ngas bstan pa 'di ni/ ngas rjes su bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgon bar gnas par gsungs pas na/ phyis 'gyod par gyur ta re/ 'di ni/ ngas bstan pa'o/ /zhes
gsungs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /dge slong dag /dgon pa dang / nags tshal gyi phyogs dang / bas mtha' la gnas shing bsam gtan byed pa la zhugs so/ /mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag
gzhan zhig gis dgon pa la gnas pa'i dge slong dag gi phyir dgon par khyim brtsigs te/ ji tsam zhig na bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin pa

dang | de'ang slar khyim du 'ongs te 'dug pa dang / de dus phyi zhig na de'i skra dang kha spu ring por gyur nas snga dro'i dus na sham thabs bgos te lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te song ba dang / de la khyim
bdag des/ 'phags pa/ skra dang / kha spu ring ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / des/ bzhin bzang / 'breg mkhan med do/ /zhes smras nas khyim bdag gis/ 'phags pa/ de lta na bzhud cig
dang / bdag gis 'breg mkhan gtang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / des bsod snyoms blangs nas slar song ba dang / des 'breg mkhan yang btang ngo / /bsod snyoms pa de rab tu le lo can zhig ste/ de gding

ba'i steng du 'dug bzhin skra bregs pa dang / skra yang gding ba'i steng du lhung nas zad par dor ma nus so/ /khyim bdag des bsam pa/ 'breg mkhan/ khyod song la dge slong de'i skra dang / kha spu dag bregs
sam ma bregs ltos shig /ces smras pa dang / de der song song nas gding ba de'i steng du 'dug pa dang / de'i gos la skra dag chags nas khyim bdag des bsod snyoms pa de la mgu ba dag byas nas
slar khyim du song ba dang / de'i chung mas/ jo bo'i sras/ ci/ khyod 'brag mkhan gyi khyim na 'dug 'dug gam/ des gos la bltas na skra chags shing 'dug pa mthong nas des bsam pa/ bsod snyoms
pa de gding ba'i steng du 'dug bzhin du skra ma bregs grang zhes de bltar 'gro'o/ /snyam bsam nas de der song ste bltas pa dang / de'i gding ba la skra dag gis gang zhing 'dug pa mthong nas 'phags

pa| gding ba'i steng du skra mi bregs pa tsam yang mi shes sam zhes nyes pa gang brjod pa dang / bsod snyoms pa de gnang nas spa gong ste ngo tsha nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong
dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag de dag 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ dge slong dag gding ba'i steng na 'dug
cing skra ma bregs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gding ba'i steng na 'dug cing skra ma bregs shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis gnas
khang dang / bkad sa dang / sgo khang du skra bregs nas de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dge 'dun gyis phyag dar byed pa'i gnas der skra ma
bregs shig /bregs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang dge 'dun gyi phyag dar bya ba'i gnas der skra ma bregs shig /ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong kha
cig rgas shing 'khogs la rid par gyur/ kha cig ni/ na bar gyur te phyi rol tu 'gro ma nus/ mi na ba dag kyang tsha zhing char ba bab par gyur ba dang / de dag kyang phyir 'byung mi nus nas
gnod par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dge slong dag/ rgas shing 'khogs la rid par

gyur pa dang / na ste mi bde ba dag ni/ snga khang du skra breg par gyis shig /min ba dag tsha zhing char ba bab par 'gyur te phyi rol tu 'byung bar mi bde na/ de yang snga khang du skra breg par gyis shig /
sa'i dngos po thams cad du'ang sa gzhi phyi bdar bya/ yang na ni/ byed du chu gcig /skra ni/ bsdus la phyag dar khrod du 'or cig /sen mo gcod pa yang go rim 'di bzhin no/ /gang mi bde
bar gyur pa de la rjes su bcas kyi/ mi bde ba med pa dag ni/ de ltar ma byed cig /byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de'i tshe na dge slong zhig
na bar gyur na des rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu rnams kyi sman gyis gsos kyang de'i nad sos par ma gyur nas ji tsam zhig na sman pa gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang /
de la dge slong dag gis/ bzhin bzang / dge slong 'di 'dra bar na bar gyur na/ sman dpyad kyi thabs ston cig /ces smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa/ phyi dro phye zo zhig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /
zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis/ bzhin bzang / phyi dro phyi bza' bar bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na/ nged cag gis ji ltar phyi dro phye bza' bar bya zhes smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa/ khyed cag
gi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin gyi/ gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag /ba lang rgan po so med pa dag gis nas ji ltar zos pa de bzhin du 'byung ba yod de/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ba ni/ ba lang rgan pos zos pa'i nas las phyer thogs la byin cig /de la
the tshom ni/ ma byed cig /de la phye de byin kyang sos par ma gyur nas dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa dag /de ni/ ro yal bas mi phan te/ nas gzhan las
phye byos la byin ces smras so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gzhan
gyis ma zos pa'i nas las phyir byos te tshags kyis tshogs la byin cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin yang sos par ma gyur nas dge slong bdag gis sman
pa la zhib tu smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa/ lde gu byos la byin cig dang / sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman pas bsgo na/ phye la lde gur byos la byin cig /de bzhin du phye las zan du byas pa dang / de nyid kyang rung ste/ thams cad byin cig /de la the
tshom ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams
kyis gsos kyang sos par ma gyur nas phyi zhig na sman pa gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / dge slong dag gis dris pa/ bzhin bzang / dge slong 'di na ba'i thabs 'di lta bu zhig na/ sman
dpyad ston cig /ces smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa dag /phyi dro khu sha byin cig dang / sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis/ bzhin bzang / phyi dro za bar bcom ldan

'das kyis ma gnang na/ de la phyi dro khu sha ji ltar bza' zhes smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa dag /khyed kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin gyi/ gnang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dred mo zhes bya ba'i srog chags shig yod de/ des sha ji ltar zos pa de bzhin du 'byung
gi |de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ba ni/ dred mos zos pa'i sha las khu shar byos te byin cig /de la the tshom ma byed cig /de dag gis dred mos zos pa'i sha las khu shar byas te byin yang sos par ma
gyur nas dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa dag /de ni/ ro yal zin pas sha gsar pa las byas pa dag byin cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /de ltar
gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman pas sha gsar pa las khu shar byos la byin cig /ces bsgo na ni/ de lta bas na/
rjes su gnang ba ni/ sha gsar pa las khu shar gyis la dar gyis tshogs te byin cig /dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byin yang sos par ma gyur nas dge slong dag gis sman pa la zhib tu smras pa
dang | des/ 'phags pa dag /snag tshogs byos la byin cig ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste
sman pas snag tshogs byin cig ces bsgo na ni/ byin cig /de la sogs te gtubs pa dang / skam po thams cad kyang byin cig /de la the tshom ma byed cig /gleng gzhi'i
sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// //mdor na/ dud pa btung dang seng ras dang / /snar blugs pa dang phor bu dang / /khab ral dang ni mig byug pa/ /drang srong
chen pos gnang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dud pa btung pa'i spu bu chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs so/ /btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis seng ras chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ bal las byas pa dang / zar ma las byas pa dang / ras las byas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis sna'i nang du blugs pa chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes bzhin btung
pa'i phor bu chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji ltar bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khab ral chos shig /ces gsungs
na| ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mig byug ba'i sman gyi snod chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar
bgyi| u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// //mdor na/ phor bu dang yang skud ris dang / /rkang

gnas pa dang rkang rten dang / /bkru sman dag dang rngan pa dang / /shi bar gyur ba'i chos gos so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sman gyi phor bu chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa
li| de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skud ris chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ skud pa bdun las byas pa ste/
bal dang / ldum bu sha na ka dang / ras bal dang / gso ma dang / rtswa du gu la dang / ldum bu ko tam pa dang / srin bal gyi skud pa las byas pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang rten chongs
shig| ces gsungs na/ ji ltar bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khri dang rkang rten chongs shig /ces gsungs na/
ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag
gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzang / bdag nad 'di 'dra ba zhig gis btab na/ sman dpyad kyi thabs ston cig /ces smras pa dang / des/ khyim bdag /snum
bag sngar zo zhig dang phyis bkru sman gtang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de snum bag za ba la zhugs so/ /ji tsam zhig na de'i grong du nye bar 'gro ba'i dge slong der 'ongs nas des/ khyim bdag /ci
byed cing 'dug ces smras pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras so/ /des/ khyim bdag /kho bo bkru sman gtong bar rab tu mkhas kyi/ sman pa la sbyin pa de kho bo la byin cig dang / ngas
khyod la bkru sman btang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag des/ legs kyi/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes smras nas des de bkru sman btang nas gtsug lag khang du langs te song ngo / /khyim
bdag de'i bkru sman mchod nas de'i nye du dag song ste sman pa la dris pa/ khyim bdag de bkru sman mchong na/ thabs ji lta bur bgyi zhes smras pa dang / de la bkru sman sus blud/ de dag gis/
'phags pa/ 'di zhes bya bas blud do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de khros nas de nyid kyi gan du song la dris shig /ces smras so/ /de dag gis de de'i shi ba las sos nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis rngan pa len cing sman ma gtong zhig /de ste bkru sman btang na yang gung du ma 'gro
zhig /de 'dra ba'i rkyen cig byung na yang sman dpyad ston la song zhig /de bzhin du ma byas par song na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ nor bdag gis nor
chags pa bzung ste/ des de la dus 'di tsam zhig na byin cig ces dus btab nas btang ngo / /des bsam pa/ de ltar dus btang tu zin kyang ngas dus bzhin du gzhal bar mi nus kyi/ ci nas dus la bab na
bros te 'gro'o/ /snyam du bsam mo/ /phyis yang bsam pa/ yul dang bral te 'gro ba yang rab tu sdug bsngal gyi/ ci nas nor bdag de gsad do/ /snyam bsam nas de dze ta'i tshal du 'gro ba'i lam du des de
bsad do/ /ji tsam zhig na drug sde dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis bsam pa/ bdag cag gis phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed do/ /snyam bsam nas bshu bar bsam pa dang / de'i gnyen dag gnas
der 'ongs nas de dag gis de mthong ste ngu ba la zhugs nas khyed dag gis bsad do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis nged kyis ni/ ma bsad kyi/ gdon mi za bar dgras bsad do/ /zhes smras so/ /de
ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de'i gnyen rnams dogs pa skyes pa ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ dge
slong dag gis de 'dra ba'i phyag dar khrod ni/ ma len cig /gang gi tshe na skye bo mang po dag gis rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe na/ slang bar bya ste/ de ltar ma byas na/ 'das pa dang
bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po so lnga pa/ mdor na/ lcags kyi gong bu gzar bu dang / /rgyab khur
rked pa mgo bo dang / /pha dang ma la gos dang zas/ /spu can chos gos gsum pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lcags kyi gong bu lcags thag gis thogs shig /ces gsungs na/ lcags thag ji lta
bu gdag par bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sman gyi gzar bu chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ji lta bu bcang bar bgyi/ u pa
li/ de ni/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs pa'o/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag rgyab dang / rked pa dang / mgo la khur ma khyer cig /ces gsungs na/ btsun pa/ dge slong
ma dag gis kyang rgyab dang / rked pa dang / mgo la khur mi bkur bar bgyi'am/ u pa li/ dge slong ma dag gis kyang rgyab dang / rked pa dang / mgo la khur ma khyer cig /de ste khyer na/ 'das pa
dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod
do/ /de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad nas dus phyi zhig na de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang / de la bu gzugs legs pa/ blta na sdug
pa/ bzang ba/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa'i khye'u zhig btsas te/ de dag gis btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas ming btags so/ /de bsrings bskyed de cher gyur pa dang / ji tsam dus
phyi zhig na pha ma la ma gsol bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyer te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs
pa dang / de'i pha rgan pos mthong nas bu khyod rab tu byung na/ nged cag sus gso bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang / de spa gong nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /pha dang / ma ni/ bu'i dka' ba byed pa ste/ de lta bas na/ bu rab tu byung yang pha dang / ma gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /
bgo ba dag sbyor bar rjes su gnang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung yang pha ma gnyis kyi bza' ba dang / bgo ba dag sbyor cig /ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar sbyar ba
mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang lhung bzed dang / chos gos lhag par gyur pa des sbyar bar byos shig /de ste med na/ sbyin bdag la bslangs
te sbyor cig /de ste dge 'dun du gtogs la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dbang bar gyur na/ de'i phyed byin cig /de ste bsod snyoms pa zhig na/ bsod snyoms phyed sbyin par gyis shig /de ltar ma byas
na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa nas mi ring ba zhig na ri brag gi grong zhig yod de/ ri brag gi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig
yod pa de'i nang na rgan zhugs gzhan zhig gnas te/ de nas dus phyi zhig na mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir mnyan du yod par song ngo / /drug sde rnams ni/ chos kyis kyang drug sde'i nang na
gcig gis ni/ dze ta'i tshal gyi sgo srung pas na/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo sgo na 'dug pa des mgo dkar la smin ma ring ba zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsam pa/ dge slong
gnas brtan gang zhig 'dir 'ong / bsur 'gro'o/ /snyam bsam ste/ de sngar song ba dang / des gnas brtan bde bar 'ongs sam zhes smras so/ /des slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag
'tshal lo/ /zhes smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bos bsam pa/ rgan zhugs 'dis slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes par rig nas des/ rgan zhugs/ tshur
shog /gtsug lag khang du 'dong ngo / /zhes smras so/ /des gtsug lag khang du khrid nas ngal bsor bcug pa dang / des cung zad cig 'dug nas slob dpon/ bdag ni/ mchod rten la phyag
'tshal du mchi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / nye dga' bos/ sdod cig dang 'du ba'i dus la bab pa dang bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / des/ slob dpon/ bdag gis chos gos gsum ga yang khyer te ma 'ongs
pas 'gro'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / nye dga' bos/ rgan zhugs/ sdod cig dang / 'dir chos gos gsum byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /zhes smras nas ji tsam na 'dug par gyur pa dang / des de la
par thang ni/ mthang gos su byin gyis brlabs/ la ba ni/ stod g.yogs su byin gyis brlabs/ be'u ras ni/ sbyar mar byin gyis brlabs te/ de nas la ba dang be'u ras gnyis phrag pa la bzhag nas
par thang gis dkris pa'i steng du the gus dkris te dam du bcings nas de nas 'dus pa'i nang du btang ba dang / dge slong dag gis mthong nas de nas dge slong kun tu bcings pa kha cig gis ni/ nyes pa
ngor brjod do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rgan zhugs pha bi ci'i phyir smyon thabs byed ces smras pa dang / des/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /'di ni/ kho bo'i chos gos gsum yin te/ kho bo ni/ glo bur du 'ongs na/
gang du gzhag ces smras pa dang / de dag gis chos gos gsum de 'dra ba yin nam zhes smras pa dang / des/ gang la med pa de ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes smras so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa de ni/ dge slong dag gis spu ring po las chos
gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlab par mi gnang bar dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
dge slong rnams nyes pa ngor brjod pa ni/ yus te/ nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa de ni/ spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag spu ring po las
chos gos gsum du byin gyis ma rlobs shig /de ste byin gyis brlabs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag spu ring po las chos gos gsum du byin
