gyis ma rlobs shig /ces gsungs pa dang / dad pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis la ba dang / phrug stan dang / be'u ras dag phul ba dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma blangs pa dang /
des/ 'phags pa dang / nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i tshe na ni/ mu stegs can dag yon gnas lags na/ da ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung
bas khyed cag yon gnas lags te/ da khyed kyis ma blangs na/ bdag cag gis dge ba'i zong med bzhin du 'jig rten pha rol tu ji ltar 'gro zhes smras pa dang / de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug
go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dang pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag zer ba ni/ bden te/ de lta bas
na/ ngas rjes su gnang gi/ longs la spu thung du rnams ni/ lhag pa'i gos su byin gyis rlobs shig /spu ring po rnams ni/ yon bdag gir byin gyis rlobs la bcang bar gyis shig /gleng gzhi'i sgo gsum
pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// //mdor na/ dbu dang sen mo'i mchod rten dang / /kha dog dkar po mar me dang / /khyim dang mar me snod dag dang / /ba lang btsun mo rta babs so//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na zhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ni/ chos kyis nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan
'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o/ /ji tsam dus phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi bsod nams kyi don bstan pa'i phyir 'breg mkhan bkug nas skra
dang / kha spu bregs ba dang / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dze ta'i tshal du song nas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis dbu
skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsig par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /ngas rjes su gnang gi /rtsigs shig /des gzhi yangs
pa'i gnas shig tu mdza' bo dang / phu nu dang / gnyen dag dang lhan cig tu rim gro cher byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten yang skye
bo thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhig brtsigs nas/ rdo thal gyis ma byugs pas mi mdzes par gyur nas de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten skye bo thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhig brtsigs na/ rdo thal gyis ma byugs kyi bar du
mi mdzes par gyur na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang / bdag gis rdo thal gyis byug par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /ngas rjes su gnang gi /rdo thal gyis skus shig /des rdo thal gyis bskus nas dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gis mchod pa byas so/ /mtshan mo mar me med pas mi
mdzes par gyur nas de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten rdo thal gyis bskus nas dri dang / byug pa dang / me tog dag gis mchod pa bgyis na/ mtshan mo zhugs mar ma mchis
te mi mdzes par gyur na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la mchod par bgyis la mtshan mo zhugs mar gyi phreng

ba bud do/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /ngas rjes su gnang gi /de la mchod pa bgyis te nub mo dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten gyi steng du mar
me'i phreng ba bus shig /de nas mar zags nas mchod rten gyi kha dog dkar po yang ma rungs par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar me'i

phreng ba 'og tu zhog cig /des mar me'i phreng ba 'og tu bzhag pa dang / khyis mar me 'thungs nas snod kyang khyer ro/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten gyi 'og tu zhugs mar gyi phreng ba bzhag na/ khyi dag gis mar 'tshal nas zhugs mar gyi snod kyang 'tshal te
mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang / bdag gis zhugs mar gyi khang bu bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bas na/ khyim
bdag /ngas rjes su gnang gi /de ltar byos shig /des mar me'i khang bu dag kyang byas so/ /dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la ba lang dag gis bsnyogs pa dang / de yang bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der song nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs
pa la ba lang dag gis bsnyogs par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang / bdag gis stegs bus bskor bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /ngas rjes su gnang gi/ bskor bar byos shig /des stegs bus bskor na/ rta babs med pa dang mi mjes par gyur te/ de yang bcom ldan
'das gang na ba der song nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten gyi tha ma stegs bus bskor na/ stegs
bu de'i rta babs ma mchis te mi mdzes na/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang bar mdzod cig dang / bdag gis stegs bu'i rta babs bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /ngas rjes su gnang gi /byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / des rta babs byas te yo byad thams cad bsags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu
skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la mdza' bo dang / phu nu dang / gnyen dag bsags nas mchod pa chen po byas so/ /skye bo mang po dag de lta bu mthong nas rab tu mos te/ de dag dad pa skyes nas de
dag gis kyang rnam pa de lta bur bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten dag gnas gnas su brtsigs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na ji srid dgyes pa'i bar du bzhugs

nas rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der ljongs spyad pa spyod cing rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan

'das yul dbus 'gyur 'chang nas ljongs spyad pa spyod cing rgyal po'i khab tu byon to/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa na bzhugs par thos te/ thos nas rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /

yo lang chen pos nang gi btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / nang gi skye bo dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos de

lta bu bshad de de thos pa dang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha stong phrag brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

mngon du byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas lha stong phra brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la dus gsum du bltar 'dong ngo / /de dus phyi zhig na dpyid kyi dus la babs pas shing rtsi dag kyang mi
tog rgyas/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / skeg dang / ko ki la dang / dzi ba dzi ba ka la sogs pa'ang skad 'byin par byed pa'i nags stug po de na
nang gi btsun mo dag gis bskor cing 'dug 'dug pa las/ de la nang gi btsun mo dag gis gsol pa/ lha/ bdag cag gis nyin re re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal lta zhing mchi bar mi nus na/
lhas nang gi btsun mo dag gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten zhig rtsig par mdzod cig dang de la bdag cag gis rim gro bskyed de me tog dang / dri dang / byug
pa dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mchod par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang /
sen mo stsol cig dang / bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten nang gi btsun mo dag gi dbus su rtsig go /zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo stsal nas des bsti stang dang / rim gro cher byas te nang gi btsun mo dag dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten nang gi btsun
mo'i dbus su brtsigs nas de la nang gi btsun mo dag gis mar me dang / spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang / byug pa dag gis rab tu mchod pa byas so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra la
mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lhas sbyin gyis sbad nas pha chos can/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa 'tsho ba dang yongs su phral nas bdag nyid rgyal por zhugs so/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan
pa la chos kyi sbyin pa thams cad gcad par khrims bcas pas/ sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la bya ba mi byed do/ /gang gi tshe bco lnga pa'i skabs 'byed pa'i dus

la bab pa de'i tshe na yang dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la su yang phyag dar dang / mar me dang / me tog gis mchod pa mi byed do/ /de nas btsun mo dag gis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la rnam pa de

lta bu mthong nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po dran te de dag mi dga' ste mya ngan byed cing / kyi hud/ chos kyi rgyal po dang bral bar gyur nas bdag cag gi bsod nams kyang zad par gyur to/ /zhes zer zhing

du bar gyur to/ /de'i nang nas btsun mo dpal gyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba zhig gis 'tsho ba la ma bltas par sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su bran nas dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten gyi phyag dar byas te mar me'i

phreng ba dag phul lo/ /ji tsam na ma skyes dgra khang steng du byung ste bltas pa dang / snang ba chen po byung ba mthong nas pha bi ci zhig ces dris pa dang / gzhan zhig gis/ dpal gyi blo gros mas dbu skra dang / sen

mo'i mchod rten la zhugs mar gyi phreng ba phul zhes smras pa dang / dpal gyi blo gros ma bos nas ci'i phyir rgyal po'i khrims las 'gal bar bya zhes smras pa dang / btsun mos/ kho mos rgyal po'i khrims
las 'gal mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho mos chos kyi rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i khrims las ma 'gal lo/ /zhes smras pa dang / de khros te 'khor lo 'phangs nas de
'tsho ba dang phral ba dang / de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad bzhin du dus las 'das pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas bzang por skyes so/ /de'i tshe na lha rnams 'dun sar
'dus so/ /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma dpag tshad kho ra khor yug tu snang ba'i 'od kyis lus bskor nas lha'i 'dun sar song ngo / /de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dpag tshad kho ra
khor yug tu rgya cher snang ba'i 'od mthong nas dris pa/ gser gyi lus la su yis bskus/ /pad+mo ut+pal bzhin 'dra ba/ /dpal ldan mi mtshungs ci las byung / /khyod kyi lus las 'od byung
ba/ /ci phyir khyod gdong pad+mo 'dra/ /khyod ni gser gyi 'od 'dra ba/ /ci 'bras lha mo bdag la smros/ /gang gi las las byung ba spyod/ /lha mos smras pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ni/ /skye
bo rnams kyi mar me ste/ /sangs rgyas mchog gi mtshan mthong bas/ /mun sel de la mar me phul/ /nyon mongs mun pa sel la phul/ /zla zer 'dra ba'i 'od mthong nas/ /thub pa gsal ba'i
dngos po ste/ /ston pa'i 'od mthu mthong bas na/ /gsung ba mchog la phyag byas pa/ /de yi las kyis 'dir skyes te/ /bdag la rab tu gsal zhing mdzes/ /bdag gdong blta na sdug pa ni/ /pad+mo
zla bzhin rnam par dag /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ e ma'o zhing 'di yon tan can/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs la/ /mtho ris gang du skye ba yi/ /khyod kyis sa bon der btab bo/ /gser bzhin spungs
la dkar ba yin/ /rnam pa mchog la sus mi mchod/ /sangs rgyas pad+mo kha 'byed bzhin/ /gang du lhags skyes pad+mo spyan/ /yan lag mchog rnams 'bar ba ste/ /spyan ni ka ma la dang 'dra/ /chos nyid
kyis lha'i bu pho'am/ lha'i bu mo yang rung ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum du skyes nas ring po ma lon par gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang yin pas skyes pa ste/ sems 'di
gsum skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas bdag gang nas shi 'phos zhes bltas na/ mi las so/ /gang du snyam pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i khams bzang por skyes pa mthong
ngo| |las gang yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dad pa'o/ /snyam du sems nas de nas dpal gyi blo gros mas 'di snyam du/ bdag gis zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal lta ba'i
mi rigs kyi/ ci nas bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o/ /snyam bsam nas/ de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas dri ma med pa 'tsher ba'i rna cha ni/ thogs/ lus

do shal dang / se mo dos brgyan te lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+mo dang / ku mud dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / man+dA ra ba la sogs pa'i me tog dag gis pang ba bkang nas 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa
rgya chen pos thams cad 'od snang bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis mngon par gtor nas chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rab tu rtogs bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad de
thos nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros mas 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas
brjod pa bya ba rnam gsum brjod de/ btsun pa/ bdag la 'di ltar ni/ phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lhas kyang ma bgyis/ sdug pas kyang ma
bgyis/ phu nu dang / gnyen gyis kyang ma bgyis/ tshe snga ma la ma bgyis/ bram ze dang / dge slong gis kyang ma bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi mchi ma dang / khrag gi rgya mtsho ni/
bskams/ rus pa'i ri las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo ni/ phye ste/ bdag ni/ lha dang / mi'i gnas su bzhag go /zhes gsol to/ /smras pa/ khyod kyi
mthus ni rab gsal ba/ /ngan song lam ste nyes mang po/ /mtho ris bsod nams sgo yang phye/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /khyod la brten nas nyes pa rnams kyang spangs/ /bdag
gis rtag tu rnam dag mig kyang thob/ /'phags pa dga' zhing zhi ba'i lam yang thob/ /sdug bsngal mtsho las pha rol bdag brgal nas/ /'gro ba na yang lha mi rnams kyis mchod/ /skye rga na dang 'chi ba'i

nyes dang bral/ /srid pa stong du'ang rab tu mthong bar dka'/ de ring thub pa'i zhal mthong 'bras bu thob/ /btud nas se mo do yang rab tu 'phyang / /zhabs gnyis la yang phyag byas dga' ba skyes/ /rgyal la g.yas
kyi phyogs nas bskor byas nas/ /lha yi 'jig rten khams su mngon du song / /de nas lha'i bu mo dpal gyi blo gros ma tshong pas khe rnyed pa bzhin/ zhing pa lo legs pa bzhin/ dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba
bzhin/ nad pa nad thams cad las thar ba bzhin/ longs spyod gang dag dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs pa'i longs spyod de nyid dang bdag gi gnas su song ngo / /dge slong dag
srod dang / tho rangs mi nyal zhing thub pa la brtson zhing 'khod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis der 'od rgya cher snang ba mthong ngo /mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ ci/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom
ldan 'das la zhal blta ba'i phyir tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po'am/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi'am/ gang zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bltar mchis zhes gsol

ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /tshangs pa 'khor gyi bdag po yang ma yin/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la sogs pa lhags pa'ang ma yin mod
kyi| rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i chung ma dpal gyi blo gros ma zhes bya ba zhig gis bdag gi 'tsho ba la ma bltas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i
mchod rten la mar me'i phreng ba phul ba dang / de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'khor lo 'phangs te 'tsho ba dang phral lo/ /de nga la sems mngon par dad bzhin du dus 'das nas sum cu rtsa gsum du
gnas bzang po'i lhar skyes so/ /de nub mo nga'i drung du 'ongs te/ de la ngas chos bshad nas des bden pa mthong ste bdag gi gnas su song ngo / /de lta bas na/ dge slong dag /bsod nams la 'jigs
par ma byed cig /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ bde ba'i tshig bla dwags so/ /mos pa dang / sdug pa dang / shin tu sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams so/ /dge slong dag/
khyed cag gis bsod nams ma yin pa la 'jigs par gyis shig /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni/ sdug bsngal gyi tshig bla dwags so/ /ma mos pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / shin tu mi sdug pa dang /
yid du mi 'ong ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams ma yin pa'o/ /dge slong dag /ngas yun ring po nas kyang mngon par mthong ste/ yun ring po nas bsod nams byas pa/ rnam par smin pa la mos pa
dang | sdug pa dang / shin tu sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba dag myong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /ngas lo bdun gyi bar du byams pa'i sems bsgoms pas bskal pa 'jig pa dang rtas pa bdun

gyi bar du 'jig rten 'dir ma 'ongs so/ /'jig rten 'jig pa'i tshe kun snang dang ba'i lha'i ris su skyes so/ /rtas pa'i tshe tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang stong par skyes nas der yang ngas tshangs pa dang / tshangs
chen gyi bdag por gyur nas ngas zil gyis non gyi/ gzhan gyis ma yin no/ /sems can brgya phrag bcu la dbang bsgyur te sems can gyi nang na mchog tu bsngags so/ /stong phrag gsum cu rtsa drug gi bar

du brgya byin lha'i dbang por gyur to/ /brgya phrag grangs med pa'i bar du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ mtha' bzhi btul nas rin po che bdun dang ldan no/ /rin po che sna bdun ni/ rnam pa 'di lta bu

yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / dmag mi rin po che dang bdun no/ /

nga la bu yang stong tshang nas de dag kyang dpa' ba dang / nus pa dang / gzugs su ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde tshar gcod pa ste/ de yang ngas 'di ltar rgya mtsho'i mtha' tshun chad sa chen po 'di chos kyis btul
gyi| dbyug pa dang / mtshon gyis gnod cing mi bde ba med par gnas so/ /de'i tshe yang nga 'di snyam du/ las gang gi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas bdag 'dir mthu che rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur snyam bsam
pa dang / yang 'di snyam du las 'di'i 'bras bu gsum dang / las 'di'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa gsum gyis bdag 'di ltar mthu che bar gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang
gdul ba dang / dul ba'o/ /snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs nas yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs so/ /dge zhing bde bar 'dod pa yis//
bsod nams rnam par smin la ltos| |lo bdun par du dge slong dag /byams par byed pa'i sems bsgoms pas/ /bskal pa 'jig cing rtas 'gyur ba/ /bdun du 'jig rten 'dir ma 'ongs/ /'jig pa'i

tshe na bdag nyid ni/ /'jig rten kun snang ba dang par gnas/ /rtas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na/ /tshangs chen dbang bsgyur gnas su yang | /lan bdun gyi ni bar du gnas/ /sum bcu rtsa drug par du ni/ /lha yi
dbang po byas par gyur/ /brgya phrag grangs med par du yang / /rgyal po rab tu 'jig grags byas/ /rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bor blugs/ /'dzam bu gnas kyi dbang por gyur/ /dbyug dang mtshon
gyis ma yin par/ /'jig rten 'di yang thul bar byas/ /chos nyid kyis ni rkyen med par/ /yang dag rjes su slob par gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor 'di dag tu/ /phyug
cing longs spyod che ba der/ /de 'dra'i rigs su nga yang skyes/ /nor rdzas thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /rin chen sna bdun de bzhin te/ /nor dang yo byad mang por ldan/ /rgyal po grags shing 'jigs
par gyur/ /mthu chen de yi rgyu yis ni/ /gang du skyes pa'i mchog tu gyur/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa can/ /de yis 'di ltar bshad pa'o/ /ngo mtshar che ba 'di shes pa/ /de yang rdzu 'phrul chung
ma yin/ /mkhas pa gang gis dad mi 'gyur/ /de ste rigs ni dmar gyur kyang / /de la phan par 'dod pa dang / /mthu rnams chen por mngon 'dod pa/ /dam pa'i chos la bla mar byos/ sangs rgyas bstan pa
dran par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag yid mgu ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/ /gling gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i
tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// //mdor na/ khyim rmang rta babs bcas pa dang / /ba gam stegs bu bcas pa ste/ /ka ba mtshal gyis byugs pa dang / /rtsig pa rgya skyegs ri mor bri'o/
/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pa bcom ldan 'das gang ba na der song nas bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten
la mtha' ma dri gtsang khang gis bskor la rta babs kyang gzugs par bgyi'o/ zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /rjes su gnang gi /byos
shig /yang bcom ldan 'das/ de ste rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la ba gam bgyi'o/ zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /de lta bas na/ ngas rjes su gnang gi /byos shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das/ de ste rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis ba gam gyis
bskor bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /ngas rjes su gnang gi/ byos shig /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste rjes su
gnang na/ bdag gis ka ba dag mtshal gyis byug go /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang gi /byos shig /bcom ldan
'das kyis de ste rjes su gnang na/ bdag gis rtsig ngos rgya skyegs kyis bri bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /de lta bas na/ rjes su
gnang gi /bris shig /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ ba lang so dang tha gu dang / /phreng ba rin chen phreng ba can/ /
g.yogs ma dang ni snying po dang / /snying po yi ni sgo yang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas byin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la mchod pa dang / bkur sti byos shig /ces gsungs na/ dge slong dag gis mchod rten la mchod pa byed pa na/ phur bus btab nas me tog
gi phreng ba btags pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa dag gis mthong nas ci'i phyir 'di ltar dge slong dag gis ston pa'i mchod rten la phur bu med pa la phur bur btab ces 'phyas 'dogs so/ /
de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de lta bas na/ mchod rten la phur bu
ma btab par ba lang gi so lta bu chung dus thob cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis ba lang gi so lta bu chung dus thob cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis mchod rten la khung bu brkos te ba lang
gi so lta bu 'dzugs pa la zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod rten la khung bu brkos te ba lang gi so lta bu ma gzugs par mchod rten rtsig pa'i tshe na tshugs shig /ces bka' stsal to/ /dge
slong dag mchod pa byed pa na mchod rten la 'dzegs nas me tog gi phreng ba rnams mgur chu'i bre la 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas ci'i phyir 'di ltar dge slong dag gis
ston pa'i mchod rten la rdog pas rdzi zhing 'dong zhing 'dong zhes 'phyas 'dogs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis ston pa'i mchod rten la rdog pas rdzi zhing ma 'dong zhig /de ste mchod pa'i phyir na ni/ khyim pas 'dzegs shig /
de med na/ dge tshul phas rkang pa gnyis khrus la dis byug gam gos kyis dkris te 'dzegs shig /de dag kyang med na/ dge slong dag gis ston
par 'du shes zhog la dus la bab par bsams te de ltar de bzhin du 'dzegs la de'i ri mo byos shig /mchod rten che ste 'dzeg mi nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thag
pas btags te 'dzegs shig /dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la me tog gi phreng ba phul ba dang / de dag rnying ste mi mdzes par gyur nas khyim bdag skyabs med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la me tog gi phreng ba phul ba dang de dag rnying te mi mdzes nas de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i
mchod rten la rin po che'i phreng ba dbul lo/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /gnang gi /phul cig /dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod
rten la bya rog la sogs pa bya rnams 'khod de/ de dag gi rtug pas mchod rten ma rung bar gyur pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la dbu skra dang / sen
mo'i mchod rten la bya rog la sogs pa bya rnams mchis shing rtug pas mchod rten ma rung bar bgyis na/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen
mo'i mchod rten la g.yogs pa'i snying pos g.yog go /zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag /de lta bas na/ gnang gi /g.yogs pa'i snying pos g.yogs shig ces bka'
stsal pa dang / des g.yogs pa'i snying pos g.yogs so/ /g.yogs pa de dbyar 'drul zhing mun pas mi snang bar gyur pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bdag
gis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la g.yogs pa'i snying pos g.yogs pa de da ltar dbyar gyi chab kyis rul te mun par gyur nas mi mngon na/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag
gis chab sgo gdod par bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag/ gnang gi/ sgo thod cig /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i
tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //mdor na/ 'khar ba la sogs mchod rten bya/ /gser dang dngul la sogs pa dang / /rgyal mtshan gyis su 'di la bskor/ /'bru mar la sogs
chag chag gdab/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na/ bdag gis
bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khar ba'i mchod rten bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /byos
shig /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na/ gser gyi mchod rten bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /de lta bas na/ gnang gi /
byos shig /de bzhin du dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rgya cher byos shig /de ste yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan
'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la rgyal mtshan dbul lo/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /de lta bas na/ gnang gi /phul cig /
bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal mtshan phul cig /ces gsungs pa dang / des ci 'dra ba zhig dbul ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal mtshan bzhi ste/ seng+ge'i
rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang / klu'i rgyal mtshan dang / khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan no/ /de ste yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi
dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la 'bru mar gyis chag chag gdab bo/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag gnang gi /chag
chag thob cig /yang gsol ba/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la ldong ros kyis byug go /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ khyim bdag /gnang gi/ byugs shig /ji ltar ldong ros kyis byugs pa de bzhin du tsan+dan gyis byug pa yang rgya cher byos shig /gleng gzhi'i nang
nas sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa ste/ gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo gsum pa rdzogs so// //mdor bsdus pa ni/ sgo leb dang yang de ltar dbyar/ /drug sde dag dang
btso blag mkhan/ /gzhong pa bsten pa de bzhin te/ /kun tu rgyu dang skyin po dang / /chag chag gdab dang rung ba dang / /de bzhin mdo rnams bsdus par mdzod/ /mdor na/ sgo leb dang ni pus 'khyud
dang | |dra ba dang yang gzugs 'khor dang / /zhing dang 'bras dang skye ba dang / /nor las skyes dang gos rnams so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo leb la lag gzungs byos shig /gsungs na/ ci
'dra ba las bgyi/ u pa li/ rin po che ma gtogs pa'o/ /yang gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi pus 'khyud chongs shig /ces gsungs na/ ci lta bu las bcang
par bya/ u pa li/ skud pa sna bdun te/ bal gyi dang / ldum bu sha na ka'i dang / ras kyi skud pa dang / zar ma'i dang / rtswa du gu la'i dang / ko tam pa ka'i dang /
srin bal rnams so/ /yang gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dra ba byos shig /ces gsungs na/ ci lta bu las bgyi /u pa li/ rnam pa bzhi ste/ rtswa mun dza'i dang / bal ba dza
dang | zar ma'i dang / ras kyi skud pa las so/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dra ba'i gzugs 'khor byos shig /ces gsungs na/ ci lta bu las bgyi/ u pa li/ rin
po che ma gtogs pa'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan dang cing des de la dge bar sems pa zhig 'dug ste/ de na gcer bu pa'i dge bsnyen
pa'i bu mo chung mar blangs te des de la/ bzang mo/ sangs rgyas ni/ ston pa/ chos ni/ rgyal mtshan/ dge slong ni/ yon gnas te/ de dag la bya ba byos shig /ces bsgo ba dang / de
g.yos kun tu spyod de g.yo med pa ltar/ jo bo'i sras/ legs kyi/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag de'i khyim du nyin gcig bzhin dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge
slong rnams bshol gsol lo/ /de nas dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag de ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu don cung zad cig yod par gyur te/ des chung ma de la bsgo ba/ bzang mo/ kho bo yul
'di zhes bya ba'i ri drung gi grong du don cung zad cig yod par gyur te/ der 'gro'i/ khyod kyis de bzhin du sbyin gnas rnams la bshos gsol cig ces smras pa dang / de g.yos kun tu spyod
de g.yo med pa ltar/ jo bo'i sras/ legs kyi/ bshos gsol lo/ /zhes smras so/ /de song nas bdag gis chung ma la bsgos zin na/ dge slong la yang bsgo'o/ /snyam du bsam ste de
gtsug lag khang du song nas dge bskos kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag yul 'di zhes pa'i ri brag gi grong der don cung zad cig mchis par gyur te/ bdag der
mchi'i/ khyod kyis de bzhin du dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong gtang bar gsol/ des/ khyim bdag /de bzhin legs kyi/ gtang ngo / /zhes smras so/ /de nas khyim bdag des ston pa
dang | chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag byas te/ ri brag gi grong der song ngo / /dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong dag phan tshun tshe dang ldan pa/ khyim bdag de'i chung ma ma dad pas gdugs tshod
las snga zad du 'dong ngo / /zhes gtam byas nas de dag gdugs tshod las sngar dong ba dang / khyim bdag de'i chung mas mthong nas 'phags pa/ khyed cag ha cang sngar byon te/ ci/ bdag gi sug
las gzhan ma mchis sam zhes nyes pa ngor brjod pa dang / de dag spa gong nas cang mi zer bar gdugs tshod bab kyi bar du 'khod nas zan zos te dong ngo / /des phyi de nyin mo zas dag sngar
zad du sbyar te stan bting nas bya ra byed cing 'dug go /dge slong dag gdugs chod bab khar dong pa dang / des mthong nas 'phyas pa dang / dge slong dag gcig la
gcig tshe dang ldan pa/ gnyis kar yang 'phya'i/ ji lta bu yang rung zos la dong nas tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la bsgo ste phyin chad 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mi 'dong bar bya'o/ /zhes smras
nas zan zos te gtsug lag khang du dong ngo / /dge slong de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bzlas pa dang / dge slong dag phyis der mi 'dong bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag de slar 'ongs nas bzang
mo| |yon gnas dag bsgo ba bzhin du bshos gsol tam zhes dris pa dang / des/ jo bo'i sras/ nyi ma gnyis shig gshegs te bshos gsol nas ma gshegs par gyur to/ /zhes
smras pa dang / de skad ces thos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste 'phags pa/ ci'i slad du dge 'dun gyis bskos pa'i dge slong rnams ma btang zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis ji ltar
gyur pa thams cad bzlas so/ /des/ 'phags pa/ de lta na/ bdag gi zhing las skye ba'i 'bras bu de 'phags pa rnams la dbul gyi/ khyed 'dir gsol cig smras pa dang / des/
khyim bdag /mi 'tshal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma btsos pa'i 'bru len par bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi /dge 'dun gyi phyir 'bras longs la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng
gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gang zag zhig gi phyir gnas khang zhig brtsigs te bzhag nas de'i nang du mal stan dag kyang phul te
bzhag pa dang / dge slong dag gis mdzod chen po'i nang du gcig tu bsdus te bzhag go /dge slong des khyim bdag de la smras pa dang / des 'phyas 'dogs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ mal stan ji ltar bsngos pa
bzhin du spyad par bya ste/ der gang dag gnas pa de nyid dbang ngo / /de nas yang khyim bdag des gnas khang der gos kyi rnyed pa mang zhig phul ba dang / de la mal stan 'gyed pas dge 'dun gyi
rnyed pa'i nang du brubs pa dang / dge slong des khyim bdag de la smras so/ /de yang 'phyas 'dogs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag de 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ yon bdag gis dbang du bya'i/ longs la dge slong dag /khyim gyi rnyed pa de ni/ der gang gnas pa de dag nyid
dbang ngo / /de dag gis dge slong de la 'thob pa gzhan dag ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'am dge 'dun gyir gtogs pa'i rnyed
pa de dag las kyang byin cig /des kyang de la longs spyod du gyis la de la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// //'dul
ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po so drug pa/ mdor na/ gang zhig gang du gnas pa dang / /dge slong des kyang de rung ba/ /las kyang gsar pa'i yo byad dag /zas dang mar me rung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gtsug lag khang du gnas khang
dag brtsigs nas der mal stan dag kyang phul/ rnyed pa dag kyang bcas pa dang / dge slong dag mal stan de dag kyang dge 'dun gyi nang du brubs te rnyed pa yang spyir bgos so/ /de ltar gyur pa
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po nges par 'gyur ba la ma spyod cig /de na nges par gnas pa gang yin pa de dag
gis spyad par bya ste/ rnyed pa yang bdag gis byos shig /dge slong dag gis de la rnyed pa gzhan ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyi ga yang byin la ci bder spyad
par bya ste/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams la ji ltar rgan rim du bskor bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa de'i drung du bsod snyoms pa
gzhan zhig der song nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gnas la bzhag go /dus phyi zhig na yang nor las bsod nams su bya ba'i dngos po bdun po'i yon tan brjod pa dang / khyim bdag de
rab tu dad par gyur nas 'phags pa/ bdag gis kyang nor las byas pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos po cung zad cig bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / bsod snyoms pa des/ khyim bdag /de bzhin du byos
shig |ces smras pa dang / 'phags pa/ ci zhig bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byos shig /'phags pa/ bdag la ni/ kaR+sha pa Na mchis na/ bsod nams bya ba'i grogs dag ma mchis
so| |khyim bdag /kaR+sha pa Na khyer te shog cig /ngas khyod kyis bsod nams kyi grogs bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / des kaR+sha pa Na rnams byin nas las gsar pa byed pa yang bskos so/ /des kaR+sha pa
Na rnams gnas khang gi nang du bcug ste bzhag nas las cung zad tsam yang ma brtsams so/ /khyim bdag des 'di snyam du/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang ji tsam zhig byas pa bltar 'gro'o/ /zhes
bsam nas de der 'ongs na/ cung zad tsam yang ma byas par mthong ngo / /des bsod snyoms pa la/ 'phags pa/ ci'i phyir las dag ma brtsams zhes dris pa dang / las gsar pa byed pas/ 'dir
yo byad dag dgos so/ /zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis/ bdag gis kaR+sha pa Na phul ba de la las gsar pa bya ba'i yo byad dag ci'i phyir mi sbyar/ des smras
pa| khyim bdag /ngas phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas ma rung bar ji ltar bya zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa/ de la nongs pa ma mchis kyi/ gyis shig /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste khyim bdag gis bsgo na/ las gsar pa'i yo byad de las sbyor cig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /des de
las gsar pa'i yo byad sbyar te bsod snyoms pa des las gsar pa yang byas nas bsod snyoms slong du song ba dang / khyim bdag des mthong nas 'phags pa/ khyod ni/ bsod snyoms spyod
na| bdag gi gtsug lag khang gi las gsar pa sus bgyid ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag /sems can thams cad ni/ zas la gnas na/ cing ltogs bzhin du khyod kyi gtsug lag khang
gi las gsar pa byed dam/ los kyang bsod snyoms la 'jug mod ces smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa/ de ltar na/ las gsar pa'i rgyu de las bshos su mdzod cig ces smras pa dang /
des| ci'i phyir na ngas phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyir bsngos pa bza' zhes smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa/ de la gnod pa med kyi/ zo zhig /ces smras nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong
rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste khyim bdag gis bsgo na/ de nyid la zan du zo zhig /de la the tshom du ma byed par bza' bar gyis
shig |de nas bsod snyoms pa de zas mi bzang ba zos pas gram par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zas ngan pa ma za zhig /ces gsungs pa dang / zas bzang ba za bar gyur nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zas bzang por yang ma za bar ji ltar gtsug lag khang gzhan gyi bza' ba'i thang de bzhin du zo zhig /snum bag dag ma rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar gtsug lag khang gzhan na snum bag rnyed pa de ltar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /bsod snyoms pa des las gsar pa'i yo byad dag blta ba'i phyir 'bru mar
bsod snyoms su blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / las gsar pa'i rgyu las 'bru mar nyos shig /yo byad gzhan rnams ci dgos pa yang de las sbyar bar bya ste/ de
la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// //mdor na/ dge 'dun rnams kyi mal stan ni/ /bla gab med par mi bgo
dang | |tshon dang lhung bzed las byed mi bgo ste/ /srod 'das mtshan mo mal stan bgo mi bya/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
na bzhugs so/ /drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan bgos nas tshon gyi las byed/ gos 'khru/ 'tshed/ lhung bzed kyi las byed pa'i gos rnams mes
tshig |dri ma can du yang gyur cing tshon gyis kyang ma rung bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
'dun gyi gos gyon nas tshon gyi las ma byed cig /lhung bzed kyi las dang / gzhan yang shing gsheg pa'i las dag ma byed cig /byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi
ni| mnyan du yod pa na ste/ yang drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos rnams gyon nas bla gab med par tshon rtsi'i las byed cing char bab bzhin du 'dug nas gos ma rung bar gyur te/ de ltar
gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gos rnams gyon nas bla gab med par char bab bzhin ma
'dug zhig /'dug na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ yang drug sde dag ljongs spyad pa spyod pa las ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu mtshan mo srod
'das te phyin pa dang / ri brag gi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der 'ongs nas dge slong dag gis so sor bshes pa'i gnas su ngal bso ba la zhugs so/ /de dag gis smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa dag /ngal bso ba ni/ phyis bya'i/ mal stan 'ged pa bos la rgan rim bzhin du mal stan dang / gnas khang bgos shig /de dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa/ dge slong kha cig nyal
nas srod kyang 'khor na/ gnod pa byas te ci rung gi /gang du bshes pa'i gnas su nyol cig dang / sang nam nangs nas gnas khang dang / mal stan bgo bar bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag
gis tshe dang ldan pa dag /ston pa bzhugs bzhin du khyed kyis bstan pa dag bshig par bya'am/ gnas khang dang / mal stan dag nged cag dang rgan rim du bgos shig /ces smras pa dang / mal
stan 'ged pas gnas khang dang mal stan dag 'ged pa la zhugs nas gsar bu rnams la ma bgos par nam nangs nas drug sde dag cung zad cig nyal nas nang bar sngar langs te mal stan
dag slar phul nas dong ba dang / dge slong dag gis ci'i phyir na mal stan dag slar phul/ de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag /nged cag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs te/ da ni/ slar 'dong
ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag /de ltar na/ khyed cag gis mtshan rangs dge slong dag gtses te ci bya zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag /bstan pa
brtan par bya ba'i phyir byas kyi/ nged la nyes pa ci yod ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis dpyas btags so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ mtshan mo srod 'khor phan chad mal stan ma bgo zhig /de ste glo bur du nub mo 'ongs na/ gang mdza' ba'i gnas
su 'dug la/ de ste nam nangs nas kyang 'dug par gyur na/ gnas kyang bgos shig /mal bstan yang byin cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ drug sde dag ljongs spyad pa spyod cing
dong nas ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas ri drung gi grong de na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der phyin nas dge slong dag gis gang mdza' ba'i gnas su bzhag ste/ de nas mal bstan
bgo bar byed pa na/ rgan rim gyi khri'u'i steng du de dag nan gyis 'dug nas de dag la rgan rim gyis kyang bslang bar ma nus so/ /gang gi tshe mal stan dag bgos pa dang / de'i tshe rgan
rim gyi khri'u de dag lhan cig spyod pa dang nye gnas rnams la byin nas mal stan ma thob pa rnams 'phya bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong gsar bu rnams 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ rgan rim gyi khri'u dag dang chung du na stan dag kyang rgan rim du bgos
shig |gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// //mdor na/ snam phyi sa dang bkru ba'i sa/ /gci ba'i sa dang rkang pa bkrus/ /phyi ba snod dang
gzar bu dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde dag snam phyi sa'i
sgo na 'chag cing gtam zer zhing 'dug nas dge slong dag la gnod par byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /skad cig sdod cig /nged cag rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes smras nas de dag gis de'i nye 'khor du
ston cing kha ton yang byed/ btso blag gi las kyang byed nas dge slong dag snam phyi sar 'dong du yang ngo tsha nas bshang gci la sogs pa yang bag yangs su byar med/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin nang
du 'jug tu yang med par de dag gis bgags pa dang / de dag thams cad nad du gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag gis snam phyi sar song nas gtam zer zhing ma 'dug cig /de'i nye 'khor du ston par yang ma byed cig /klog par yang ma byed cig /kha ton yang
ma byed cig /btso blag gi las kyang ma byed cig /dge slong dag gis snam phyi sa na gtam zer zhing 'dug gam/ rim bzhin du byed dam/ de'i nye 'khor du ston tam/ kha ton byed dam/ klog
gam/ btso blag gi las byed na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag bkru sar 'khru zhing 'dug pa ma zin par drug sde dag gis nged rgan no/ /zhes zer nas bslang ngo / /de ltar
gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bkru sar dge slong bkru ba
ma zin par ma bslang zhig /bslangs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag gci sar song ba dang / phyis drug sde dag der 'ongs te nged cag rgan gyi/ ji ltar rgan rim
bzhin du 'jug go /zhes smras pa dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dge slong dag rgan rim du gci sar ma 'dug par ji ltar 'ongs pa'i rim bzhin du zhugs shig /dge slong dag gis ji ltar rgan rim bzhin du 'jug na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur
ro| |drug sde dag gis dge slong dag rkang pa 'khru zhing 'dug pa la bkru ba ma zin par rkang pa 'khru ba'i 'og gzhi rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes zer te khyer ba dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur to/ /de
ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis rkang pa bkru ma zin par rkang pa bkru ba'i gzhi ji
ltar rgan rim bzhin ma bkur cig /dge slong gis dge slong dag gi rkang pa bkru ma zin par rkang pa bkru ba'i gzhi rgan rim bzhin du khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /
drug sde dag gis dge slong dag gdong phyi bas gdong phyi ba ma zin par rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes zer nas gdong phyi ba khyer ba dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge slong gi gdong phyi ba ma zin par rgan rim du ma bkur cig /dge slong dag gis dge slong
gi gdong phyi ba ma zin par gdong phyi ba rgan rim du khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du snod dang / gzar bu dang / kha gzar la sogs pa yang rgyas par sbyar bar bya'o/
gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// //mdor na/ bum pa dang ni gzhong khung dang / /lhung bzed nag po btung phor dang / /spu gri'i brdar
dang sen gcod dang / /smang tsher dang ni rkang rten no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde dag gis

gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par dge 'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa dag rgan
rim du ma bkur cig /dge slong gis dge slong dag gi btso blag gi las byed pa ma zin par dge 'dun gyi tshon gyi bum pa rgan rim du khyer na/ 'das pa dang
bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa la ji lta ba bzhin du gzhong khung la yang de bzhin no/ /drug sde dag gis dge slong dag zas za ba ma zin par lhung bzed nag po rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes zer
nas khyer ba dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong dag zan bza' ba

'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis dge slong dag zan za zhing skom phyed tsam 'thungs pa dang / btung ba'i phur bu rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes zer nas khyer te de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa

phor bu rgan rim du ma bkur cig /dge slong gis dge slong dag zan za zhing skom phyed tsam 'thungs pa la phor bu rgan rim du khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag
gis dge slong dag skra phyed tsam bregs pa dang / spu gri yang rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes zer te khyer ro/ /de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong dag skra dang / kha spu phyed tsam bregs pa la spu gri rgan rim du ma bkur cig /dge slong gis dge slong dag skra dang / kha

spu phyed tsam bregs pa dang / spu gri rgan rim du khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis dge slong dag skra dang / kha spu 'breg pa'i spu gri rnon por bya ba'i spu gri brdar la phyed
tsam brdar ba dang / rdar rgan rim du bya'o/ /zhes zer te khyer ba dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das

pa'i spu gri brdar la phyed tsam brdar ba la rgan rim du khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis dge slong dag sen mo phyed tsam bcad pa dang / sen mo gcod pa rgan rim du

'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// //mdor na/ mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba dang / /mngon mtshan bdag ni byin pa med/ /yid ches par ni
gzung ba lnga/ /gnyer phyir nyer spyod dge slong ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi
tshe yul mnyam dka'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po mkhas pa can/ lha stong phrag brgyad cu dang yul mnyam dka'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag brgya phrag stong dang bcas te bcom ldan
'das kyis bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab tu 'di ltar/ kye khyed cag rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang / yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po dag nyon cig /rgyal po nga'i
yul na su yang rkun po ma byed cig /gang gis byas pa de ngas yul dang phral te gtang ngo / /nor bdag la ni nga nyid kyi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no/ /zhes dril chen bsgrags so/ /gang gi tshe
bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ko sa lar rgyal po gsal rgyal dar la bab pa lta bu'i mdo sdes btul ba de'i tshe na des kyang mnyan du yod par 'di ltar/ rgyal po nga'i yul na su yang rkun po ma
byed cig /gang gis nga'i yul du rkun po byas pa de chad pa bsad pas bcad la nor bdag la ni/ nga nyid kyi mdzod dang / bang ba nas sbyin no/ /zhes dril chen bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe na gang
yul mnyam dka' na gnas pa'i rkun po rnams dang / gang yul ko sa la na gnas pa rnams de'i sa mtshams kyi bar du dong nas 'khod do/ /yul mnyam dka' na gnas pa'i rkun po
rnams dang / yul ko sa la na gnas pa rnams thams cad sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod nas 'gron pa mang po dag 'joms so/ /zhes de skad kyi sgra kun tu grags so/ /de dag gis
thos nas yul mnyam dka'i 'gron pa mang po bsel dang lhan cig yul ko sa lar 'dong ngo / /yul ko sa la nas kyang yul mnyam dkar de bzhin du 'dong ste/ ji tsam dus phyi zhig na yul
mnyam dka' nas 'gron pa mang po bsel dang bcas te yul ko sa lar dong ba dang / de dag gang gi tshe mtshams las 'das nas yul ko sa lar phyin pa de'i tshe de nas ded dpon gyis
smras pa/ kye/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ni/ mi srun lag gtum zhing khro ste/ dpa' zhing mthu dang ldan no/ /zhes grag gi gal te 'gron pa mang po
dang bdag cag rnams bcom na yang bsab par nus kyi/ bsel ba de dag slar khye zhig ces smras pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag gis smras pa/ de ltar na/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras
nas bsel ba de dag slar bkye'o/ /rkun po rnams kyis bya ra btsugs te bsdad pa dang / bya ra bas bsel ba slar log pa mthong nas des/ kye/ bsal ba rnams slar log gi/ 'gron
pa mang po gzhom mo/ /zhes smras nas 'gron pa mang po de dag shing sA la'i dgon par phyin pa dang / bcom mo/ /de la tshong pa kha cig ni/ bsad/ kha cig ni/ bros so/ /de la bros
bas mgo rdul gyis gang bar byas te rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du song nas lha la/ bdag cag ni/ tshong pa lags na/ khyed kyi yul du phyin na tshong pa ma lags par gyur to/ /ci byas
lha| bdag cag ni/ rkun pos bcom mo/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu/ myur du rings par song la rkun po dang / nor rnams zungs la 'on
cig /ces bsgo ba dang / lha/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes nas dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan te dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi
pa bal glang gi tshogs dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha bskon te myur bar rings su shing sA la'i dgon par dong ba dang / rkun po dag de'i bar
dgon pa na shing sA la stug po'i nang du zhugs te bag yangs su nor 'god cing 'khod pa dang / 'phags skyes pos de'i steng du brdzis te de dag gis rkun po kha cig ni/ bsad/ kha cig ni/ bros
kha cig ni/ gson por bzung ngo / /de nas rkun po'i g.yul las rgyal te rkun po dang bcom pa'i nor rdzas dag khyer te rgyal po'i drung du song ste rkang pa la gtugs nas lha/ 'di dag ni/ rkun po'o/ /
'di dag ni/ nor ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos tshong pa dag la kye/ de dag bdag bdag gi nor dag ngo shes par byos la slar khyer cig ces bsgo ba dang / de na mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba dang / dge
slong dag kyang bcom pa'i nang du gtogs nas rgyal pos de thams cad 'phrog pa'i nor rdzas slar byin pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba'i rang gi gos btsag gi nang du btsos pa dang / dge slong dag gi yang khyer

ro| |dge slong dag gis bdag cag gi gos btsag gi nang du btsos pa ngo ma shes nas de dag kun tu rgyu ba dang lhan cig 'thab mo byung ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba mang po dag gis de dag khyer ba dang / rgyal
po'i drung du song ste lha/ bdag cag gi gos btsag gi nang du btsos pa mu stegs can kun tu rgyu bas 'tshal te slar mi ster ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba de dag
bkug ste/ kye/ 'phags pa dag gi gos dag ci'i phyir bkur gyi/ slar phul cig /ces bsgo ba dang / de dag gis/ lha/ btsag gi nang du btsos pa 'di dag ni/ bdag
cag gi gos so/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos/ 'phags pa dag /khyed kyi gang yin pa shes par gyis la khyer cig ces smras so/ /dge slong dag gis gcig nas gcig tu phyung ste bltas pa dang /

kha cig ngo shes te lha/ 'di dag ni/ bdag cag gi gos so/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba dag la/ e ma'o/ /mu stegs kun tu rgyu ba/ 'jab bur rku ba rkun ma yin na/ khyed cag ni/ rkun
po chen po yin no/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag la lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ kye 'phags pa/ khyed cag gis da phan chad chos gos la mngon mtshan bya ba'i rigs so
de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rgyal po de skad zer ba yus te/ de bas na/ chos gos dag la
mngon mtshan thob cig /kha chag dang 'or thabs su drubs shig /sgro gu yang thogs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon mtshan thob cig ces gsungs na/ dge slong dag gis mi shes nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos kyi mthar snag tsha'i thig le byos shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i rigs mnyam pa

zhig las chung ma zhig blangs nas de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/ /de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las de dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba
brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / bu khye'u zhig btsas te zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas so/ /de rigs dang mthun par ming btags so/ /de bsrings

bskyed de cher gyur pa dang / dus phyi zhig na de'i ma dus las 'das so/ /khyim bdag des kyang chung ma zhig blangs nas de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/ /de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa

las| dus phyi zhig na bu pho gsum zhig btsas te de dag kyang rigs dang mthun par ming btags so/ /'di ltar dgra'i nang na chen chung 'thab pa gcugs che ste/ mos ma shi ba'i bu khye'u chen po de la rtag

par gtses pa dang / de ma dran nas yi chad de yul gzhan du song ba las legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo / /de nas dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag de na bar gyur nas de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu
dang | lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag gi sman byas kyang de'i nad tha gi bar ma gyur nas de na ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ring po mi thogs par dus 'da' bar shes nas des khyim tshes dag bsags te

'dus nas de'i nang du bu la smras pa/ bu dag /khyed cag gi bu chen po dge sbyong shAkya'i sras kyi nang du rab tu byung ba de yang khyed kyis nor skal byin cig ces smras nas/ bsags pa kun mtha' zad par 'gyur/ /
mtho ba'i mtha' ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /'dus pa'i mtha' ni 'gyes par 'gyur/ /chos kyi mtha' ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i bu ljongs spyod
cing 'dug pa des bdag gi pha dus las 'das so/ /zhes thos te de yang 'di snyam du/ bdag song la ma yar mo dang nu bo dag gi mya ngan bsang gi /chos bshad du 'gro'o/ /snyam du sems nas de ji
tsam dga' ba'i bar du ljongs spyad de mnyan du yod pa gang na ba de logs su ljongs spyod cing song ngo / /rim bzhin du spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin nas lam gyi ngal bsos te bdag gi khyim du
'ongs pa dang / nang gi skye bo dag gis mthong nas ngus te dus pa'i sgra dag khyim tshes dag gis thos nas de dag 'dus te/ kha cig ni/ skad phyung ste ngu / /kha cig ni/ mig mchi mas gang zhing 'dus
nas so so'i skye bo dag ni/ 'dod chags dang ldan pas gnyen dang bral bar gyur pa mya ngan gyis mig mchi mas gang ngo / /de yang du ga khyer zhing 'dug go /de la rgan mo gzhan zhig gis/ bu/ khyed kyi

phas ni| nor skal byin par nged kun gyis kyang thos na/ ma ngu zhig /skye ba yod na/ 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / de cung zad tsam zhig gi bar du sems shing 'dug nas des/ ma yang mo dang /
nu bo dag la chos bshad do/ /de dag gi mya ngan cung zad sangs nas de dag gis khyod kyi nor skal dag longs shig ces smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga 'das nas byin pa

ni| med do/ /zhes gsungs na/ ji ltar blang snyam du bsam nas tshe dang ldan pa dag /nga ni/ rab tu byung ba la nor rdzas kyis byar med kyi steng du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nga 'das nas byin pa med do/ /
zhes gsungs kyi/ khyed cag nyid khyer cig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis nyes pa ngor brjod pa/ 'phags pa/ longs la sbyin pa yang byin cig /bsod nams kyang byos shig /de la nyes pa ci zhig yod
ces smras so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim pa la ni/ re ba yod/

rab tu byung ba la ni/ re ba med pa'i phyir te/ khyim bdag la ni/ nga 'das na byin cig pa na khyim pa dag gi de btsan no/ /rab tu byung ba la ni/ de lta bu med do/ /de bas na/ khyim pas de lta bur bsam ste byin pa

longs shig /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba'i phyir te/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag lci ba'i ri lu dang / so shing dang / bkru ba'i yo

byad dang / ba lang gi lci ba rnams 'chags dang / khyams dang / sgo khang dag tu bor nas ljongs spyad pa spyod du 'dong ngo / /de dag la dge slong dag gis the tshom skyes nas ma spyod do/ /de ltar gyur pa
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yid gcugs pa rnam pa lnga las ni/ longs shig /mdza' ba dang / yid 'dres pa dang / bla ma dang / mi
'gyur ba dang / thos na dga' bar 'gyur pa ste/ yid gcugs pa rnam pa de lnga la ni/ spyad par bya ste/ de lta the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/
mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs nas de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/ /de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa
las dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang / bu mo zhig btsas nas de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas
ston chen po byas nas rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so/ /de bsrings bskyed de cher gyur pa dang / khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de bslangs te/ de rdzas la sogs pas de brdzangs te/
btang ngo / /dus phyi zhig na khyim pa de dus 'das nas/ de khyo dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo / /de dus phyi zhig na mu ge byung
nas bsod snyoms slong zhing 'dug pa dang de bsod snyoms spyod pa las srang zhig tu de'i phas mthong nas des smras pa/ bu mo/ da ltar gang na ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang /
des pha/ mu ge byung nas bdag rab tu bkres shing 'dug go /zhes smras pa dang / des bu mo/ de ltar na khyod rab tu ma byung na ni/ ngas khyod la mi 'dod bzhin du sbyin na/ da bsod snyoms ma
byed par bdag gi khyim du zan za zhing dbyar mo khang du song zhig /des khas blangs nas de grogs shig dang gnyis kyis zos shing dbyar mo khang du song ngo / /zhag du ma zhig gi bar du der zos
nas bu/ bsod snyoms pa gnyis ni/ zas sbyin par mi nus kyi/ khyod gcig pu 'dir zan zos shing song zhig /ces smras pa dang / des pha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig pu grong du 'gro bar ma gnang
ngo| |zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras pas/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na/ ngas gnang gi /dus 'di 'dra ba la ni/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gnyen dang lhan cig 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa stsol cig /gsol ba ni/ 'di ltar gyis shig /
stan bting la gaN+DI brdungs te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dag 'dus shing 'khod pa dang / ji ltar rgan rim du phyag byos la rgan rim gyi mdun du pha gu'am/ stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du 'dug
nas thal mo sbyar la tshig 'di skad ces smros shig /gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'di 'dra ba'i mu ge'i dus la bab nas bsod snyoms blangs
ba yang mi nus na/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma la bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma las gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol na/ 'phags
ma'i dge 'dun dag gis bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gnyen dang lhan cig 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa stsol cig /brtse ba can brtse ba'i phyir ro/ /de
ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba gyis la las byos shig /gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/ dge
slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ 'di ltar mu ge'i dus la bab ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dun dag las gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol na/ de ste 'phags
ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gnongs la/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di
la gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa stsol cig /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o/ /gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams/ dge slong ma
ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ 'di ltar mu ge'i dus la bab ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams la gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol te/ de las 'phags ma'i
dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mu ge'i dus la bab na/ gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa gsol na/ 'phags ma rnams las gang la dge
slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ mu ge'u dus la bab ste gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa stsol bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /mi bzod pa ni/ smros shig /'phags
ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa stsal te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsungs pas/ de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge slong mas
mnyen dang lhan cig tu 'dre bar nye spyod kyi sdom pa/ dge 'dun ma rnams kyis byin par gyur na/ gcig pu gnyen gyi khyim du zas za bar gyis la de la the tshom du ma byed cig /nam mu ge'i tshe
ni| rjes su gnang ngo / /de ma yin par ma gnas shig /mu ge ma byung bar gnas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// //
mdor na/ bskyi ba la ni rnam pa gnyis/ /ras la yang ni rnam gsum ste/ /nyo bar yang ni 'dod pa dang / /sder bsdus par ni gyur pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i
tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag cig la kaR+sha pa Ni zhig bskyis pa dang / de dus kyi mtha' zhig tu ci zhig gis dus
'das nas dge slong de ji ltar dus 'das pa khyim bdag des thos so/ /dge slong de ji ltar dus 'das pa khyim bdag des thos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/ shes bzhin du dge slong
dag la dris pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di zhes bgyi ba'i dge slong de gang na mchis/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang / dus 'das so/ /'phags pa/
des bdag gi kaR+sha pa Ni zhig bskyis te 'tshal to/ /bzhin bzang / de ni/ dur khrod du bskyal gyi/ der song ste dos shig /'phags pa/ khyed kyis de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos
bgos na/ bdag gis ji ltar dur khrod du song ste bda'/ khyed kyis stsol cig /ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag des ni/ legs par smras te/ de'i nor las bskyis pa dge slong dag gis byin cig /de dag gis gang
nas sbyin pa mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos yod pa las byin cig /dge slong de dag gis lhung bzed dang / chos gos de dag
byin pa dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos de dag ma 'dod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshongs la byin cig /dge slong dag gis de dag thams cad byin no/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji tsam blangs pa de tsam du byin la lhag ma bgos shig /mnyan du yod pa na dge slong gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag cig las kaR+sha pa Na zhig
bskyis pa dang / de dus kyi mtha' zhig tu ci zhig gis dus 'das pa dang / dge slong dag gis snga ma bzhin du lhung bzed dang / chos gos btsongs nas de la byin no/ /khyim bdag gis smras
pa| 'phags pa/ des bdag la 'di tsam zhig 'tshal te/ bdag la ni/ 'di las ma stsal gyi/ gzhan yang stsol cig /ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos ni/ 'di las med do/ /zhes sgos shig /de ste yid mi ches na/ go bar gyis
shig |go bar bsgo yang mi btub na/ de la dge 'dun gyi'am/ gang zag gzhan gyi las ni/ ma sbyin cig /rigs kyi gzu bo rnams kyis go bar bsgos la thong zhig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du
yong ba na dge slong zhig gis gos tshong pa las ras shig rin ma byin par blangs pa las/ dge slong de dus 'das nas dge slong de dus 'das so/ /zhes gos kyi bdag po des thos nas
de gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te shes bzhin du dge slong rnams la/ 'phags pa/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ga la mchis zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang /
dus 'das so/ /'phags pa/ des bdag las ras shig rin ma sbyin par byas te khyer ro/ /bzhin bzang / de dur khrod du bskyal gyi/ der song la dos shig /'phags pa/ de'i chos gos
dang | lhung bzed ni/ khyed rnams kyis bgos na/ bdag ci'i phyir dur khrod du song ste bda'/ khyed rnams kyis byin cig /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams/ gos tshong pa 'di smra ba ni/ bden gyi/ de ni/ byin cig /dge slong rnams kyis de'i ras nyid byin pa
dang | des 'phags pa rnams/ bdag la des rin thang 'di tsam du 'tshal to/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid tshongs la byin cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge
slong rnams kyis de btsong par brtsams pa dang / snga ma'i rin thang du ma lon nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhag ma ni/ chos gos dang / lhung bzed rnams tshongs la byin
cig| gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na dge slong zhig gis tha ga pa la ras 'thag pa'i phyir skud pa dang / rngan pa byin pa las dge slong dus 'das nas dge slong rnams kyis tha ga pa la
bos te/ bzhin bzang / khyod la dge slong ming 'di zhes bya bas ras 'thag pa'i phyir skud pa dang / rngan pa byin pa de slar phul cig /ces smras pa dang / des 'phags pa rnams/ bdag gis de la
ras sbyin par byas kyi/ skud pa dang / rngan pa ni/ ma lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis de ji ltar bya ba ma shes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams/ tha ga pa smra ba ni/ bden gyi/ ras su longs shig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis phra mo las bkug pa dang / des 'phags
pa rnams/ bdag gis de la sbom po sbyin par byas so/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de ni/ dus 'das kyi/ ji ltar byin pa de lta bur longs shig /gleng
gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong zhig gis gos tshong pa la kaR+sha pa Na byin te ras shig byin cig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong de dus 'das nas dge slong rnams kyis gos tshong pa la bos
te| bzhin bzang / khyod la dge slong ming 'di zhes bya bas ras kyi rin zhig byi pa de 'on cig /ces smras pa dang / des 'phags pa rnams/ de la ras su sbyin par bgyis so/ /zhes smras pa dang /
dge slong rnams kyis de la ji ltar bya ba mi shes so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams/ gos tshong pa de smra ba ni/ bden gyi
ras su longs shig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis phra mo bkug pa dang / des 'phags pa rnams/ bdag gis de la sbom po dbul bar bgyis so/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong de ni/ dus 'das na/ ji lta bu byin pa de bzhin du longs shig/ /'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po so bdun pa/ gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du
yod pa na ste/ drug sde rnams 'jig rten pa la grags par gyur te/ gang su yang rung nyo ba dang / btsong pa de dag de dag gi drung du dong nas 'phags
pa| dngos po 'dis ci ri zhes 'dri'o/ /de nas mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gnyis shig gcig ni/ gos nyo/ gcig ni/ 'tshong ste/ de gnyis rin thang gi gtam smra zhing 'khod
pa'i steng du nye dga' bo phyogs der 'ongs pa dang / de gnyis kyis 'phags pa nye dga' bos bcad pa btsan no/ /gcig na re/ de bzhin du btsan par bya'o/ /zhes smras nas de
gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo la/ 'phags pa/ 'di'i rin ji tsam zhes dris pa dang / des gcig la gsang ste/ bzhin bzang / khyod nyo'am/ 'on te 'tshong pa zhes
dris so| |des/ bdag ni/ nyo ba'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / nye dga' bos 'di ni/ kaR+sha pa Na nyi shu ri'o/ /zhes smras nas gnyis pa la yang gsang ste/ bzhin bzang / ci khyod
nyo'am| 'on te 'tshong pa zhes dris pa dang / des/ 'phags pa/ bdag ni/ 'tshong pa'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / nye dga' bos/ 'di ni/ kaR+sha pa na bzhi bcu ri'o/ /zhes smras pa dang /
de gnyis gsang ste bslus nas yang gnyi ga'i mngon sum du/ khyed cag ji lta bur legs pa de lta bur byos shig ces smras so/ /de gang 'tshong ba des/ 'di ni/ kaR+sha pa Na bzhi
bcu ri'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / gang nyo ba des bdag gis dad pa dang / yid ches pa las 'di ni/ kaR+sha pa Na nyi shu ri'o/ /zhes thos so/ /zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi dad
pa dang | yid ches pa su yin/ 'phags pa nye dga' bo yin no/ /bdag cag gnyis la des shes bzhin du gtses te bdag la des kaR+sha pa Na bzhi bcu ri'o/ /zhes smras so/ /des
smras pa| bdag la yang des shes bzhin du gnyi ka la bslu ba'i phyir mdor na des gnas ngan len la mtshungs par spyod kyi/ phyin chad dgos pa yod na yang de la mi 'dri'o/ /zhes
smras so| |de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams/ khyim bdag de gnyis 'phya ba ni/
yus kyi| de bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dngos po gang la yang rin thang ma gcod cig /khyim pa rtsod pa'i drung nam 'dug cig /dge slong dag gis dngos po gang yang rin thang gcad
dam| khyim pa rtsod pa'i drung na 'dug na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po gang la yang dge slong gis rin thang ma gcod cig /ces gsungs na/
dge slong dag gis chos gos dang / gos nyo bar 'dod pa'i phyir tshong 'dus su song ste/ der khyim pa dang lhan cig tu kaR+sha pa Na'am/ pa Na gcig gam/ pa Na'i bzhi cha'am/ bzhi
cha'i phyed dam/ bzhi cha'i phyed kyi phyed bskyod pa dang / des khros te 'phags pa/ bdag cag ni/ spogs byed pa yin na/ khyed cag kyang lhag par spogs
byed pa chen po'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams/
de dag de skad zer ba ni/ yus kyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rang gis nyo bar ma byed cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rang gis nyo bar ma byed cig /ces gsungs pa dang /
dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar nyo bar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i dge bsnyen pha la chol cig /gtsug lag khang na
gnas pa'am/ dge bsnyen dang pa med la nges par nyo bar 'dod par gyur na/ gtan la bab pa'i tshig lan gnyis lan gsum du smra bar bya ste/ kaR+sha pa Na la sogs pa'i tshul
gyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis nyo bar 'dod kyang rung / nyo bar mi 'dod kyang rung ste/ kaR+sha pa Na la sogs pa'i tshul gyis tshig lan gnyis lan gsum du 'das par
bskyed cing smra na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi phyir rin thang bskyed kyang nyes pa med do/ /gleng gzhi'i nang nas sgo bzhi pa'i
mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ rtsa bas 'tsho ba mi bya ste/ /rnam pa bzhi ni mi bsgo ste/ /bsrung ba dang yang mang du bya/ /ca co mang po 'byin pa'o/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la bza' shing
drung stong dang ldan pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig phul ba de'i tshe na dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu zos nas phyal bar bor bas na/ mda' lta bu'i nags su gyur to/ /de nas dus phyi zhig na
rgyal po lam de phyogs su phyin pa dang / des de dag mthong nas des blon po rnams la mda' lta bu'i nags su gyur pa'i kun dga' ra ba 'di/ su'i zhes smras pa dang / blon pos/ lha/
bza' shing drung stong dang ldan pa'i kun dga' ra ba dag lhas 'phags pa rnams la phul ba de nyid 'di lags te/ de dag gis 'bras bu zos nas phyal bar bor bas na/ da ni/ mda'
lta bu'i nags su gyur pa'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ kye/ 'phags pa de dag 'di la zhal ta dang / las mi byed dam/ des/ lha/ de dag bsam gtan dang / kha
ton la zhugs pas/ 'di'i sug las dang / zhal ta mi bgyid do/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rtsa bas 'tsho ba la phyal bar ma dor bar las gyis shig /dge slong rnams kyis sus las
bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'cha' ba rnams kyis byos shig /de rgan pas na/ de dag gis las bya bar mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad kyis las byos shig /des las kha cig ni/ rid/ rgas 'khogs/ kha cig ni/ na bas las byed mi nus/ drug sde rnams ni/ byed du mi
btub pas na/ las ma byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor rnam par dbye bas 'khor rnam par phye la skal skal du bgos te las byos shig /dge
slong rnams lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa rnams dang sde de la zhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de 'ba'
zhig la yang 'jug par mi bya ste/ la lar so shing bza' bar bya/ la lar gdong pa bkru bar bya/ la lar ni/ rkang pa bkru bar bya'o/ /dge slong de dag gis de bzhin du
las byas nas 'bras bu rgyal te smin par gyur pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong dag cig glo bur du 'ongs pa dang / de dag gis 'bras bu rgyal zhing smin pa de dag mthong nas de
dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rnams/ bdag cag kyang a mra smin pa'i 'bras bu bza' bar bgyi na/ kho bo cag kyang dbang ngam zhes smras pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis 'di dag ni/ bdag
cag gis sngar bgos na/ bzar ga la yod ces smras pa dang / de dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la yang byin cig /dge slong rnams kyis bgos pa'i lhag ma la byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams/ rnam pa
'di bzhi ni/ mi bgo ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun thams cad dbang ba dang / mchod rten thams cad dbang ba dang / nad thams cad kyi rung ba dang /
rin thang nar mar bza' ba thams cad do/ /de bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis rtsa bas 'tsho ba rnyed dam/ 'bras bu'am/ me tog la sogs pa gang zag rnams kyis yongs su spyod pa
bzhin du yong su spyod cig /de dag mngon sum du dbang ba yin pas na/ zhal ta byos la me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams ni/ dge 'dun la brims shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
mngon sum du dbang ba yin pas so sor zhal ta byos la me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams dge 'dun la brims shig ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis de dag zhal ta byas pas
me tog dang / 'bras bu smin pa dang / de dag yal bar bor nas me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams rkun po rnams kyis khyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis srung ma
zhog cig /ces gsungs nas dge slong rnams kyis nyung ngu zhig bzhag ste de nyid nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mang du 'khod pa de dag las
phyed ni| zan sngar zo zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis shing tog a mra'i 'bras bu smin pa dge 'dun la brims shig /ces gsungs pa dang / gang gi tshe smin par gyur pa de'i tshe srin bus
zos par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'cha' ba rnams kyis so sor brtag par byos shig /so sor brtag par byed pa de dag ca co che nas dge slong
rnams kyis de las bzlog kyang de dag mi btub pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags
pa'i mi smra bas so sor brtag par bya ste/ ca cor ma smra zhig /smra na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //
mdor na/ rung bar bya dang dge tshul pha/ /bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / /blangs shing byin len byed pa dang / /yang na de ltar bstan pa dang / /mtshams bcings pa dang stong
pa dang | |'thab mo dang ni rdzogs pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka land ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis shing tog a mra'i 'bras bu brims
shig |ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams sus brim pa mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung bar byed pas brims shig /rung bar byed pa med na/ dge
tshul phas byos shig /dge tshul pha med na/ dge slong rang gi lag pa khrus la byin len byos te so sor rung bar byos shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rang gi lag pa khrus la
byin len byos te so sor rung bar byos la brims shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'bras bu mang pos gang ba'i rkon bu gcig pus ma theg nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| khyim pas kyang grogs byos la gnyis kas brim par bya ste/ gang khyim pas brims pa de ni/ byin len bya'o/ /gang dge slong gis brims pa de ni/ byin len bya mi dgos so/ /
a mra gzhan zhim por grags pa zhig yod na/ de dag bsres te rim par brims pa dang / thams cad kyis thob par ma gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag so sor brims shig /
ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra gang zhim por grags pa so sor brims shig ces gsungs pa dang / drug sde rnams kun dga' ra bar dong nas de dag gis a
mra'i zhim por grags pa de rang gis blangs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs te byin len byas shing zos pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa dag |a mra'i zhim po de dag ma brims na/ ci'i phyir zad dam zhes dris pa dang / srung ma rnams kyis de dag brim du ga la yod/ drug sde rnams kyis blangs te gtsug lag khang
du dong nas byin len byas te zos so/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong rnams 'phya bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan
'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong rnams gang su zhig sngar blangs la phyis byin len byed na/ nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/ de bas na/ dge slong gis sngar blangs pa las phyis
byin len mi bya'o/ /snyam du mkhyen nas dge slong dag /drug sde rnams kyis ni/ mi rigs par byas kyi/ de bas na/ dge slong rnams sngar blangs pa las phyis byin len ma byed
cig |sngar blangs pa phyis byin len byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams me tog dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /
gzhan yang bza' ba dang / btung ba 'brim pa la mdzub mos bstan cing 'di byin cig /'di dag byin cig /ces smras shing de yongs su zos pa dang / 'brim pa ma snyoms par gyur
nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong kha cig gis dpyas pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
slong dag 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ dge slong gis mdzub mos 'di byin cig /'di dag byin cig /ces bstan cing bza' bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong gis mdzub mos 'di byin
cig 'di dag byin cig /ces bsten cing zos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /ltung ba med pa ni/ drod chung bas smin pa 'dod pa dang / drod che bas ma smin pa 'dod pa'o/ /gleng
gzhi ni| mnyan du yod pa na ste/ drug sde rnams ljongs spyad pa spyod cing ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig gi gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin na de'i dge slong dag nyin par spyod pa'i phyir
dong ste gtsug lag khang de stong par lus pa dang / drug sde po rnams dga' bo dang nye dga' bo/ gtsug lag khang stong pa mtshams ma bcad pa 'dir bdag cag rnams kyis 'dir
gnas na/ ji ltar gnas par bya/ mtshams gcad kyi/ tshur shog /ces smras nas/ de dag gis legs kyi/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras nas de dag gis mtshams bcad ma thag
tu snga na gnas pa'i dge slong dag lhags pa dang / drug sde po rnams kyis de la ngal bso zhig ces byas na/ de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams/ 'di ltar khyed cag ni/ glo bur
du lhags pa'o/ /nged ni/ snga nas gnas pas khyed cag la bdag cag gis ngal bso zhig ces bya ba'i rigs so/ /zhes pa dang / drug sde po rnams
kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bdag cag gis kyang mtshams bcad do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis kyang sngar mtshams bcad do/ /zhes smras nas/ dge slong de
dag |ci/ mtshams snga ma btsan nam/ 'on te phyi ma btsan zhes the tshom skyes pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong glo bur pa rnams gtsug lag khang du zhugs ma thag tu stong par mthong na yang mtshams gcad par mi bya'o/ /lam gyi ngal bsos te shin tu
brtags nas snga na gnas pa med na/ gdod mtshams gcad par bya'o/ /gzhan du na gcad par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dze ta'i tshal gyi sgor khyim pa gnyis
