ma bsregs pa'i thug pa dang ni mar/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu sdong bu lo mar bcas/ /thug pa thams cad blud par bya/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med
zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ sman gcig las de nyid snga dro ba/ de nyid phyi dro ba/ de nyid
zhag bdun pa/ de nyid nam 'tsho'i bar du rung bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ u pa li/ bu ram shing ni/ snga dro'i'o/ /de'i khu ba ni/ phyi dro ba'o/ /bu ram ni zhag bdun pa'o/ /bu ram shing dang /
bu ram bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pa li/ zho ni/ snga dro ba'o/ /zho'i chu ni/ phyi dro ba'o/ /mar ni/ bdun pa'o/ /zho bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar
du'o| |u pa li/ sha ni/ snga dro ba'o tshil bu ni/ bdun pa'o/ /sha bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /u pa li/ til ni/ snga dro ba'o/ /til gyi mar ni/ bdun pa'o/ /til
bsregs pa'i thal ba ni/ nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong zhig na bar gyur nas sman pas mthong ste/ 'phags pa/ gso ma'i thug pa byos la
'thung zhig /ces smras pa dang / des de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar sman pas bsgo na/ de bzhin du gyis shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan dag cig
yang na bar gyur nas de dag kha cig la ni/ sman pas yungs kar gyi thug pa 'thung zhig /ces bsgo'o/ /kha cig la ni/ rtsa ba'i thug pa 'thung zhig /ces bsgo'o/ /kha cig la ni/ sdong
bu'i thug pa 'thung zhig /ces bsgo'o/ /kha cig la ni/ 'bras bu'i thug pa 'thung zhig /ces bsgo ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ ngas rjes su gnang gi/ sman pas nad pa la lung bsgo na/ thams cad kyi thug pa'ang 'thung zhig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig/
rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// //mdor na/ bu ram chu dang btung ba de bzhin te/ /zhag bdun bzhag par gyur pa dang / /gzhan gyi phyir yang
bsngo ba dang / /rjes su phan gdags myang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom
ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas te ljongs spyod cing gshegs pa dang / de dag ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin te ri brag gi grong de na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa
de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das ri brag gi grong der byon pa dang / khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung
du 'ongs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos de
lta bu bshad nas khyim bdag des thos pa dang / 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ /ji tsam na dge slong de
dag lam gyis ngal bas gzir nas log pa'i lha khang dang / bkad sa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / shing drung dag tu glos phab ste nyal zhing 'khod pa dang / khyim bdag de rab tu dad pa thob
pas na| bkad sa dang / lha khang dang / shing drung dag tu rim gyis dge slong dag la phyag bya ba'i phyir song ba dang / dge slong dag gnas na nyal zhing 'dug pa des mthong nas 'phags pa
dag /bstan pa la shin tu brtson par bgyi ba la/ ci'i slad du na gzims shing bzhugs zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis/ khyim bdag /lam gyi ngal bas gzir cing nyam chung ste dge ba'i
phyogs spyod par yang mi nus so/ /zhes smras pa dang / des 'phags pa rnams/ de ltar na/ phyi dro bu ram gsol bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag
'tshal te mchi'i/ gsol cig ces smras pa dang / de dag las kha cig na re/ khyim bdag/ de legs kyi/ bza' bar bgyi'o/ /kha cig gis/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyim bdag be
ra tra si dag gis bu ram bza' ba la brten nas des dgra bcom pa mngon du gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du rjes su gnang na/ bdag cag ni/ lam gyi ngal bas gzir
te| 'jig rten na ma dad pa dag ni/ grong na 'khod bzhin du za'o/ /zhes mi dga' bar 'gyur gyi/ gud du 'dong ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / kha cig gis/ yang tshe dang ldan pa/ de ltar
'dong na/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu ram ni/
thams cad du bza' bar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad du bu ram zo zhig /ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag gis zos pa dang / de
dag lam gyi ngal bas skom gyis gdungs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu ram gyi chu gyis la 'thung zhig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bu ram chu zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs te 'tshal du rung ngam/ u pa li/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyi bar du bzhag la btung bar bgyi/ u
pa li| ji tsam na dang bar gyur te skyur por ma gyur cing / rang bzhin ma nyams pa'i bar du'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong dang / tshul nas byung ba
dang | chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang / gos bsngo ba dang / gang zag gcig po mgron du bos pa dang 'di lnga ni/ rang gi bsam pas 'grub bo/ /zhes gsungs so/ /dge slong de dag gang
du mgron du bos pa der de las gzhan du'ang mgron du bos sam/ de las lhag par yang rung ste/ gcig tu ni/ bdag nyid/ gnyis su ni/ bdag gi sems btang nas gzhan btang
ba'o| |mu ge'i dus la bab ste/ dge slong rnams bsod snyoms kyis shin tu phongs par gyur to/ /dad pa'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis dge slong gnas brtan dag zas la mgron du bos
pa dang / khyim bdag cig la khas blangs te gzhan btang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ ngas mu ge byung zhing sdug bsngal la rnyed dka' ba'i dus na/ ji
snyed du mgron du bos pa de thams cad bdag gir bya bar gyis la bdag kyang zo zhig /dge slong dag la yang bsgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag gzhan gyi der dong
ba dang | de dag gis/ 'phags pa/ khyed ni/ bdag cag gis mgron du ma bos kyi/ 'di bzhin bgyi ba'i gnas brtan bdag cag gis spyan drangs so/ /zhes
smras so| |de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag nyid song la byin len bya ste/ kham gnyis sam/ gsum
zo la 'di skad du/ khyim bdag/ dge slong dag zas kyis brel te/ 'di la sbyin gyi/ rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /ces smros shig /de bzhin du gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ ji snyed
mgron du bos pa thams cad la byin cig /thams cad de ltar byas nas tha mar mgron du bos pa ni/ ji tsam 'grangs par bza' bar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /rkyang pa'i sgo dang /
po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ mar ram de ste 'bru mar ram/ /gzhan yang bzhag par gyur pa dang / /mig sman gyi ni gab tshe dang / /yangs pa can
dang rung ba'i gnas/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong gzhan zhig rlung nad kyis btab
pa des sman pa'i gan du song ste bzhin bzang / bdag la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab na/ sman ston cig /ces smras so/ /des/ 'phags pa/ mar 'di tsam zhig gsol dang / 'tsho bar
'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman pas
mar 'thung zhig par bsgo na/ btung bar bya'o/ /dge slong des 'thungs pa dang / nyin par bde yang / /mtshan mo yang rlung nad langs so/ /dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris pa dang / des /mtshan
mo'ang 'thung zhig /ces smras so/ /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo yang 'thung zhig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / des mang du bsags
nas zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs te/ de sos par gyur to/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig nad kyis btab nas de'ang sman pa'i drung du song ste nad med cig /
ces byas nas bzhin bzang / bdag la 'di 'dra ba'i nad cig gis btab na/ sman gyi thabs ston cig /ces smras so/ /des/ 'phags/ 'bru mar 'di tsam zhig 'thungs na/ sos par
'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgo ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste sman
pas 'bru mar 'thung zhig /ces bsgo na/ 'bru mar 'thung zhig /dge slong des 'thungs pa dang / nyin par sos kyang mtshan mo yang rlung nad de langs so/ /dge slong dag gis sman pa la dris
pa dang / des/ mtshan mo yang 'thung zhig ces bsgo'o/ /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan mo
yang 'thung zhig /des 'bru mar bsags te zhag bdun du byin gyis brlabs nas 'thungs pa dang / sos par gyur to/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig nad
kyis btab pa dang / de yang sman pa'i drung du song nas nad med cig ces smras nas bzhin bzang / bdag la nad 'di lta bu zhig gis btab na/ sman gyi thabs ston cig /ces smras
so| |des mar ram/ 'bru mar 'di tsam zhig 'thungs na/ sos par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / de bshes nyung bas btsal kyang ma rnyed nas yang sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin
bzang / khyod kyis bsgo yang / kho bos 'bru mar yang ma rnyed na/ mar lta ga la rnyed/ gzhan lta cung zad ci rung ston cig /ces smras pa dang / des/ 'phags pa/ 'di zhes bya ba'i
dge slong zhig gis 'bru mar sbyar la/ 'di zhes bya ba zhig gis mar sbyar gyi/ de'i gan du song dang / gal te sbyar ba de'i lhag ma yod kyang srid do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dag
gi drung du song nas bslangs na/ de dag gis/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de zhag bdun las 'das te spangs par gyur pas med do/ /zhes smras pa dang / de de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras
pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad pa'i thabs rtogs la/ mar ram/ 'bru mar gzhan ci yang rung / bzhag
pa yang bla'i/ bza' bar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ gzhan ci'ang rung / bzhag pa yang bla'i/ zo zhig /de la the tshom
du ma byed cig /ces bka' stsal na/ byin len byed pa med do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byin len byed pa'i mi med na/ byin len ma byas kyang bla'i/ zo zhig /gang gi
tshe na pa na gnang ba de/ sos na ma spyod cig /spyad na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa
lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mig sman gyi snod gab tse chongs shig /ces bka' stsal na/ ci 'dra ba bcang bar bgyi/ u pa li/ rin po che las byas pa ma gtogs
so| |yang zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yul yangs pa can na mi rung ba rnam pa bcu spongs la/ rung ba'i khang pa byin gyis brlabs par gyis shig /ces bka' stsal na/
ci btsun pa/ khang pa 'og rung bar byin gyis brlabs na/ khang pa'i steng yang rung bar byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ ji ltar steng gi bzhin du ngos kyi yang brjod par bya'o/ /
rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //mdor na/ rtsa sdong lo ma 'bras bu rnams/ /thams cad chang gis spags pa dang / /kha
zas med par bkrus pa dang / /yang na zas ngan de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i dngos po shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe rgyal po zas
gtsang ma'i shAkya'i rigs re re zhing yang shAkya lnga brgya zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yog tu phul ba dang / de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung ngo / /de dag sngon lus chang
gis gsos pas na/ de dag chang med nas lus la nad zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/
kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir na shAkya dag rnyi rnyi por gyur ces bka' stsal pa dang / de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa| de ltar na/ ngas gnang ba ni/ chang du 'gyur ba rtsa ba dang / sdong bu la sogs pa bskams la phye mar bgyis te ras dkar po'i nang du thum por gyis la chang gi mthu zhil pa
rdza ma ma gang ba'i nang du lugs shig /de nas slar phyung ste lag pa khrus la chu kha zas med pa dang bsres te 'dang par tshogs la 'thung zhig /de skom na/ snga dro yang rung / phyi dro
yang rung ste/ the tshom ma byed par 'thung zhig /de ltar byos dang / de dag chang la sred pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong khyed ston pa nga la dmigs na ni/ chang ma 'thung zhig /ma blud cig/
rtswa mchog gis kyang ma reg cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas de la sman pas zas ngan pa byin cig ces bsgo ba dang / de la dge slong kha
cig gis ni/ shes kyi/ kha cig gis mi shes pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa u pa li la dris pa dang / des de dag zhib tu smras so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa
lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong swa sti la zas ngan pa byin cig ces gsungs pa ni/ ci/ de yang byin len bgyi 'tshal lam/ u pa li/ de yang byin len byos
shig /su las byin len bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ dge bsnyen dad pa las so/ /rkyang pa'i sgo dang po'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa ste/ sgo dang po rdzogs so// //mdor bsdus
par na/ snod dang chos gos gnyi ga dang / /ko sa la dang gsar pa de bzhin te/ /bsgrags dang chos gos sna tshogs dang / /lhan cig pa yang dge slong ma rnams ni/ /tha mar byas te bsdus
pa'i mdor gsungs so/ /mdor na/ snod dang yo byad gtsug lag khang / /'gron pa mang bcom gos rnams dang / /gos dang gdugs dang de bzhin shing / /dur khrod pa dang de bzhin
spangs/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na khyim bdag gzhan
zhig gis ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul lo/ /de na mal stan
dang / snod spyad mang du gyur/ dge slong ni/ nyung du gnas te/ de'i nang nas kha cig gis tshe dang ldan pa dag /mal stan dang / snod spyad dang / yo byad dag ma spyad na/ de dag chud
zos par 'gyur gyi/ de dag las bdag cag la spyad par ji tsam dgos pa de tsam zhig bcangs la/ de'i lhag ma rnams ni/ gtsug lag khang gzhan du dbul lo/ /zhes smras
nas de dag gis de bzhin du byas so/ /ji tsam zhig na bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig ljongs spyad pa spyod cing gtsug lag khang der 'ongs pa dang / dge slong de dag gis ngal bsor
bcug nas de'ang dge 'dun de dag gi nang na rgan pa zhig ste/ gtsug lag khang du lam gyi ngal bsos nas des de dag la/ tshe dang ldan pa/ mal stan mchis sam zhes smras na/
med do/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar yin pa de la zhib tu smras so/ /de gding ba med par sa la de bzhin du nyal nas nang par sngar langs te/ lde mig kyog po
dang | lde mig khyer nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang / de nas khyim bdag des de la bde bar byon tam zhes pa'i tshig brjod nas stan khyer te phyir byung ba dang / bsod snyoms
pa de spyod lam zhi ba'i tshul du 'dug go /bsod snyoms pas kyang de la nor las bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi yon tan rgyas par brjod pa dang / khyim bdag gis/ 'phags
pa| bdag gis de thams cad bgyis so/ /zhes smras pa dang / bsod snyoms pas/ khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang na mal stan dag yod med de/ mdang nga yang gding ba med par
sa'i steng na de bzhin du nyal nyal te 'dir 'ongs so/ /khyod na re/ de thams cad bdag gis de bzhin du bgyis so/ /zhes zer na/ 'di ci nyes zhes smras pa dang / khyim bdag gis/
'phags pa/ kho bos ni/ der mal stan dang / snod spyad dang / yo byad rnams mang du sbyar na/ 'phags pa/ de dag gis gtsug lag khang gzhan du gdon ma zos par btang ngo / /zhes
smras pa dang / des khyim bdag nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gi lde mig kyog po dang / lde mig gi ngo shes sam zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa/ shin tu 'tshal to/ /des de bstan pa dang /
des/ 'phags pa/ bzhud cig /bdag kyang mchi'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bsod snyoms pa song ba dang khyim bdag kyang rjes bzhin du 'ongs nas des dge slong rnams bsdus nas 'phags
pa| bdag gi 'dir mal stan dang / snod spyad dang / yo byad mang du phul na/ de dag gar mchis zhes smras pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad khyim
bdag la smras pa dang / des nyes pa ngor brjod de/ smras pa/ khyod kyis ma legs par byas te/ de yang der bas na/ da ci slar blang du rung ngam/ 'on te mi rung / de dag gis smras pa/
mi rung ngo / /'phags pa/ kho bos ni/ der ma phul gyi/ song la slar longs shig /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gzhan du ma dbul cig /ji ltar dmigs pa de bzhin du spyad par bya'o/ /gzhan du na/ gang gis byin pa de la rin thang bzhin du phobs
shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ drug sde rnams 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu ljongs spyad pa spyod cing dong ba dang / de dag chos kyis rdul gyis 'jigs pa na/ yang
na ni| 'gron pa dag gi mdun du 'dong / yang na ni/ phyi bzhin 'dong ngo / /ji tsam na 'gron pa mang po rnams rkun pos bcom nas skye bo mang po rnams kyis nor bor te bros pa dang /
rkun po rnams kyis nor kun bkur ma nus nas de dag gis bzang ba 'dams te khyer te dong ngo / /drug sde rnams 'gron pa mang po'i phyi bzhin du 'brangs te dong ba las gnas der
phyin pa dang / de dag gis nor mang po bor ba mthong ste/ de nas dga' bo nye dga' bo/ phyag dar khrod brnyed kyi/ blang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis de las kyang gos rnams bdams
te khyer ro/ /'gron pa mang po ra mda' dang lam srung du bcas te/ slar log pa de dag gis drug sde dag gis khyer ba rnams ngo shes nas de dag gis/ gang rkun po rnams kyis bor ba de
yang dge sbyong mgo reg rnams kyis brkus so/ /zhes bsam mo/ /drug sde rnams la kha ngan du/ 'phags pa dag drang srong gi rgyal mtshan 'dzin la/ de lta bu'i log par spyod pa
dag spyod ces spyos te/ nyes pa ngor brjod pa dang / de dag gis/ 'gron pa mang po rnams rkun pos bcom ste/ nged kyis ni/ ma yin gyi/ nged kyi phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed do/ /zhes
smras pa dang / de dag gis phyag dar khrod kyi gos ni/ ma lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de lan med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams/ 'gron pa mang po 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ dge slong dag gis 'gron pa mang po bcom pa'i gos ma
bkur cig /dge slong dag gis 'gron pa mang po bcom pa'i gos khyer na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dad par gyur pa de dag gis/ 'phags pa dag /ci bder
snoms shig /ces smras na/ dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas mi len to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste ci bder khyer cig /ces smra na//
longs la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ rgyal po'i khab na ste/ dge slong drug sde dag gis bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du dong ba dang / shi ba'i yo byad gdugs dang / shing dang /
gos dag mang po bor ba de dag gis mthong nas de'i nang nas gcig gis/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ phyag dar khrod kyi gos rnyed kyi/ bkur ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / dga' bos legs kyi/
bkur ro/ /zhes smras nas de dag gis blangs te dong ngo / /dur khrod kyi srung ma rigs ngan dag 'ongs nas des bsam pa/ dur khrod 'di na cung zad kyang med pas na/ kha cig gis dur
brkus par gdon mi za'o/ /snyam bsam nas yang 'di snyam du/ gang gis brkus pa de rnyogs pas slar yang 'ongs par gdon mi za'i/ mngon par gab ste 'dug go /snyam du bsam
ste de nags stug po'i nang du zhugs nas nyin gcig bzhin du sdod cing 'dug pa dang / drug sde zhag bdun nam brgyad lon te dga' bo nye dga' bo/ bdag cag gis dur khrod du
ma dong nas da ring zhig lon te cung zad tsam rnyed kyang srid kyi/ yang 'dong ngo / /zhes smras nas de dag dong ngo / /ji tsam na de na gos dang / gdugs dang / shing dag bor ba de dag gis
blang par brtsams pa dang / rigs ngan nags tshal stug po na 'dug pa des mthong nas rgyugs te 'ongs nas des/ 'phags pa dag/ bdag cag phu nu dang / gnyen dang / grogs po dag rgyal
po'i bka' bzhin du byed pa yang dur khrod kyi gos 'di'i phyir yin na/ khyed cag gis ci'i phyir bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod kyi shi ba'i yo byad dag bkur par bya zhes smras pa dang / de
dag gis/ bzhin bzang / nged cag gis ni/ phyag dar khrod pa'i gos blangs so/ /des/ 'phags pa/ 'di la de dag phyag dar khrod kyi gos yin na rab tu legs so/ /zhes smras pa dang /
de dag lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rigs ngan
'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ dge slong dag /bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod nas phyag dar khrod kyi gos ma len cig /dge slong dag gis bdag po yod pa'i dur khrod kyi phyag dar khrod pa'i
gos blangs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dad par gyur pa dag gis de dag la/ 'phags pa dag /ci bde bar khyer cig ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom du gyur te

ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste ci bde bar longs shig /ces zer na/ blang bar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// //
'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu pa/ mdor na/ gos la sogs pa shing bal dang / /lha khang nas 'phrog de bzhin te/ /dge 'dun gyi ni chos gos
gsum/ /gang zag dag las blang mi bya/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ drug sde bzhon pa mang po
shing rta dang lhan cig lam du zhugs nas lam gyi phyed du phyin pa dang / shing rta gcig gi srog shing chag nas tshong pa des srog shing yang brjes nas srog shing chag pa bor te song ngo / /
nye dga' bos shing rta'i srog shing de blangs te lam po che'i bzhi mdor bor nas smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ 'di ni/ bdag cag gi srog shing dbang phyug ces bya ba'i lha rten du bca'
ba'i phyir btsugs so/ /zhes byas te dong ba las/ khyim bdag gzhan dag gis kyang der stegs su brtsigs so/ /gzhan zhig gis kyang de la gsol ba btab ste/ gal te bdag gi don
'di dang 'di lta bu zhig grub na/ bdag gis 'dir khang pa brtsigs la bram ze brgya rtsa brgyad la ston mo bya'o/ /zhes smras pa las/ de'ang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas de'i
de'ang grub nas des der dam ji ltar bcas pa thams cad bsgrubs nas de log pa'i lha khang du gyur te lha khang bas kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas tshong pa 'gron po mang po dag cig lam
der zhugs pa dang / der gos dang / bal dang / shing bal ngag mang du phul lo/ /drug sde dag slar log pa'i tshe lha khang de rab tu rgyas par mthong nas de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ shing
rta'i srog shing dbang phyug gos dang / bal dang / shing bal dag rab tu mang zhing phun sum tshogs pa de bkur ro/ /zhes de dag gis blang bar brtsams pa dang / lha khang pa dag lhags te de
dag gis/ 'phags pa dag /lha khang 'di ni/ bdag cag gi ste/ 'di ni/ las dang / byi dor bdag cag gis bgyis na/ lha'i gos rnams ci'i phyir len cing dbrog /khyed cag ma
byin par len pa ma spangs sam zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis bkren pa/ 'di ji ltar khyed kyi lha khang / ded cag gis shing rta srog shing chag pa zhig rten thabs su btsugs te bzhag go /
zhes smras so/ /lha khang pa des ku co bton pa dang / de nas nye dga' bo khros nas de rdog pa gcig brgyab nas bsgyel bar byas so/ /de nas de snyems shing dregs pa rnams spa gong nas 'phags
pa| khyed dam/ gzhan zhig gis byas par gyur kyang bdag cag ni/ 'di la brten cing / 'tsho ba yang 'di la ltos na/ ci'i phyir khyed kyis 'phags pa'i chos ma yin pa byed ces smras pa dang / de
dag ma spobs te cang mi zer bar 'dug go /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /log par lta ba'i
lha khang na gnas pa dag 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lha khang bdag po yod pa'i gos la sogs pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis lha
khang bdag po yod pa'i gos la sogs pa blangs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /log pa'i lha khang pa dad pa gzhan gyis ci bde bar spyod cig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong de dag the
tshom skyes te ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te ci bder byas pa ni/ blang bar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis nad pa la skul cig ces gsungs pa dang / ji tsam zhig na dge slong zhig na bar gyur pa de'i nad g.yog gis/ tshe dang ldan pa/ dge 'dun la cung zad cig phul cig ces smras
pa dang | des kyang bdag la cung zad tsam yang med mod kyi/ chos gos gsum dbul lo/ /zhes smras pa dang / de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ des chos gos gsum phul nas de dag gis
btsongs te bgos so/ /dge slong de phyis sos te langs nas chos gos gsum gyis phongs par gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge slong la dge 'dun gyis chos gos gsum ma blang cig /blangs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun gyis
kyang ma len cig /de ste blangs na yang ma 'ged cig /bgos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis kyi mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o/ /mdor na/ gnyi
ga la yang gnang ba dang / /rnam pa tha dad rjes su gnang / /sum cha dang yang dge tshul dang / /dge slob ma dang dge tshul ma/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong drug cu zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brag gi grong zhig tu phyin nas de na khyim bdag dad pa zhig gnas pa des de dag de'i khyim du bshos

la spyan drangs nas des dge slong re re zhing ras yug re re dbul lo/ /snyam du bsam mo/ /de dag za ba la zhugs pa dang / dge slong ma drug cu zhig kyang ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brag gi grong der phyin pa
dang bsod snyoms slong ba la zhugs so/ /gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag 'di'i khyim na/ dge slong dag bshos gsol gyi/ der bzhud cig /ces smras pa dang / de dag der song ste de dag gis kyang
zan zos pa dang / de nas khyim bdag des ras yug drug cu zhig rgan rim gyi mdun du bzhag go /dge slong dag ji lta bur bgo ba mi shes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis 'thob pa yin gyi/ dge 'dun sde gnyis su bgos shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod
pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ des de'i zhal bsros te dge 'dun sde gnyis bshos gsol nas
rnyed pa yang mang du phul te dge slong dag gis bgos pa dang / dge slong dag /nged cag la ni/ chos gos gsum dgos kyi/ dge tshul pha dag la ni/ stod g.yogs dang
mthang gos su zad na/ ji ltar bdag cag dang mthang gos su mnyam par bgo zhes bya'o/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang dge slong ma ni/ skal ba mnyam par bgos shig /dge tshul pha dang / dge tshul ma dang / dge slob ma dag la ni/ sum cha gcig byin cig /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha dag la sum cha gcig byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / ji tsam zhig na dge tshul pha gzhan zhig lo nyi shu yang tshang zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par
'dod na/ de la dge slong gis tshe dang ldan pa lo yang nyi shu tshang na/ ci'i phyir bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed ces smras pa dang / des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ bdag cag gi rnyed pa 'di
lta bur bcas na/ stod g.yogs dang mthang gos su mi ldan na/ chos gos gsum du lta ci smos te/ ji ltar bsnyen par rdzogs par bya zhes smras so/ /de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul pha bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod pa dang / dge slob ma la sum gnyis byin cig /dge tshul dang dge

tshul ma gzhan ni/ skal ba sum char zad do/ /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o/ /mdor na/ ko sa la na drug cu dang / /brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang / /sgra gcan 'dzin
dang dpal sbed dang / /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten te/ /gdugs dang bris pa de bzhin sbyar/ /zan la mgron du bos pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko sa lar ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na
ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig tu byon nas ri brag gi grong de na khyim bdag cig gnas pas/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa khyim du bshos la spyan drangs so/ /dge slong ma drug
cu zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod pa na/ ri brag gi grong der phyin nas de dag kyang der zan zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang lhan cig tu bshos gsol nas khyim
bdag des ras yug brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum zhig rgan rim gyi mdun du bzhag go /dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas dge slong ma dag gis de la gzhan byar ci yod/ sngon yang
dge 'dun sde gnyis bshos gsol ba las bdag cag gis rnyed pa'i phyed thob na/ da yang bdag cag la rnyed pa'i phyed byin cig /ces smras so/ /de lta bur gar pa dge slong dag gis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang du dge slong ma mang la dge slong pha nyung na/ der rnyed pa dge 'dun gnyi gar bgos shig /gang
na dge slong pha mang la dge slong ma nyung na/ der mgo grangs bzhin du bgos shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
dag bshos la spyan drangs so/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun dag ni/ dong / bcom ldan 'das ni/ gtsug lag khang na bzhugs te/ bshos tshur mnos so/ /rnam pa lnga'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bshos mnos te gsol lo/ /lnga gang zhe na/ lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed pa yin/ nad pa dag gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ mal stan dag
gzigs par bzhed pa yin/ nang du yang dag 'jog la 'jug par bzhed pa yin/ nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' bar bzhed pa yin no/ /don 'di ni/ bcom ldan
'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas 'cha' bar bzhed pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang na bzhugs shing bshos mnos te gsol lo/ /khyim bdag de rgan pa dag la mngon par dad
nas de rgan rim du mar dang / mar la btsos pa'i bca' ba rnams brims/ bar ma dag la ni/ 'bru mar dang / 'bru mar la btsos pa'i bca' ba dag brims/ gzhon nu la ni/ 'bru mar gyi tshigs
ma dag brims so/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos mnos te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis bshos mnos nas 'ongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra
gcan 'dzin la dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bsod pa'i zas kyis tshim par byas sam zhes smras pa dang / des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ rgan pa rnams tshim mo/ /sgra gcan 'dzin/ khyod ci'i phyir
ring cing nyam chung zhing de skad zer ba smros shig /des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'bru mar gyis ni mthur gyur te/ /mar gyis kyang ni mdangs su 'gyur/ /'bru mar tshigs kyi tshod mas ni/ /mdangs
mchis stobs lta ga la zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan 'dzin/ ci yin pa de smros shig /des de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis sgra gcan 'dzin la/ de na gnas brtan su zhig 'dug /ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/ mkhan po mchis so/ /sgra gcan 'dzin la/ dge slong shA ri'i bus ni/ 'og ma dag ma
brtags pas na/ ngan du zos pa yin na/ de lta bu'i byung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bsdus nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba la bzhugs te nyan
thos rnams la 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gnas bca' ba'i phyir dge slong dag /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gi mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos ngas bca' ste/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong
gis zas 'brim pa'i tshe snyoms par brims shig /ces sgos shig /des tshad ma sna re re la'ang smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lan tshwa
'am| dang por gang brims pa de'i tshe smros shig /thams cad la ni/ ma yin no/ /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gis ji ltar bur mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bzhin ma byas na/ 'das
pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis zan zos pa smad do/ /zhes thos nas des bdag ston pas zan zes pa smad na/ 'di ltar 'dug
pa mi rigs so/ /zhes bsam nas des bskyugs te btang ngo / /dge slong dag /the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la zan zos pa smad pa dang / des slar bskyugs pa la gzigs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di 'ba'
zhig ma yin gyi/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas de la zan zos pa la smad pa dang / des phyir bskyugs so/ /dge slong dag nyon cig /de sngon byung ba ni/ grong khyer gzhan zhig na mang por 'chad
pa'i bram ze zhig gnas te/ de bram ze'i bu dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na/ ri brag gi grong zhig tu phyin nas des rdzing zhig gi 'gram du bram ze des bram ze'i bu der bzhag nas cung

zad cig sdod/ nga grong du phye la sogs pa bslangs te slar 'ong ngo / /de de na 'dug pa dang / khyi sha can zhig rdzing du chu brog 'thung du 'ongs so/ /de la bram ze'i bus kye skyes bu/ bdag kyang chu brog
cig stsol cig /ces smras so/ /des kyang lo ma la snod drubs shig ces smras pa dang / des snod drubs so/ /des de la khyi'i pags pa la byas pa'i sgye'u'i nang nas byung ba'i phye byin no/ /de snum pa
dang bram ze'i bus phye 'di snum na/ ci zhig ces dris pa dang / 'di ni/ pags pa la sgye'u byas pa'i mthu ste/ des sgye'u de dag ci la byas pa zhib mor byas na/ bram ze'i bu des ma go'o/ /
bram ze de slar 'ongs nas des/ bram ze'i bu/ khyod song la chu brog rgyu slongs shig ces smras pa dang / des kyang chu brog 'tshal lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / sus byin/ mi pha bis byin no/ /
des pha bi khyi sha can te/ des khyod la phye byin na/ de khyod kyis sdig par gyur to/ /zhes smras nas des de la smad pa dang / des zos pa slar bskyugs so/ /dge slong dag /mi shes sam/ gang
mang po 'chad pa'i bram ze de ni/ da ltar nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu de ni/ da ltar gyi dge slong shA ri'i bu ste/ de'i tshe na yang ngas zas pa la rab tu smad nas de slar
bskyugs so/ /da 'dir yang ngas zas zos pa la smad nas 'dir yang slar bskyugs par gyur to/ /gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/ de'i tshes na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag me
skyes kyi sring mo'i khyo gcer bu pa'i dge bsnyen dpal sbed ces bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ khyim bdag me skyes dad pa des 'di snyam du/ dpal sbed 'di dge 'dun dag la yon
'bul du bskul lo/ /snyam bsam nas des de la dpal sbed/ dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / yon phul cig dang / khyod kyi bsod nams su 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras so/ /dpal sbed kyis smras
pa| ngas kyang dge 'dun dag mchod cing yon dbul bar bya'o/ khyod kyis kyang gang po la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag la mchod cing bshos gsol cig /me skyes kyis 'di snyam du
bsam pa/ de ste khas ma blangs na/ dpal sbed kyis dge 'dun la mchod pa'i bar chad du 'gyur na/ sems can thams cad la sbyin pa lta nyes med kyi/ gcer bu pa'i dge 'dun dag la
zan byin te/ bdag gis des dge 'dun la mchod cing yon dbul ba'i ched du bya'o/ /snyam bsam nas des zan sbyin no/ /zhes khas blangs nas dpal sbed kyis 'di snyam du/ bdag gis dang por
sangs rgyas la sogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dag sngar bshos gsol na ni/ me skyes kyis phyis zan mi sbyin gyi/ gang po la sogs te rab tu byung ba'i dge 'dun dag bshos sngar gsol ba dang /
ngas phyis zan sbyin no/ /snyam bsam nas me skyes la 'di skad ces smras so/ khyod kyis dang po zan byin cig dang / ngas kyang phyis dge slong go'u ta ma dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
dag la zan sbyin no/ /des kyang khas blangs nas de nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis gang po dag gang na 'dug pa der phyin nas gang po dang lhan cig rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba'i gtam sna tshogs dag byas nas
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang po/ khyod sang bdag gi khyim du gcer bu pa mang po dang / dge 'dun dang lhan
cig tu bshos gsol gyi/ khas longs shig /gang pos bsam pa/ khyim bdag 'di ni/ gor ma chag par dge sbyong go'u ta ma la sun par gyur nas bdag cag la rab tu dad par gyur te/ de ni
bdag cag gi rnyed pa rab tu rnyed pa ste/ gang po bdag cag gi dge 'dun gyi rigs la rab tu dad par gyur to/ /snyam nas des khas blangs so/ /de nas khyim bdag me skyes de dag spyan drangs nas
song ngo| |de nas khyim bdag me skyes kyis de'i nub mo rab tu bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba'i kha zas dag sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te sngar langs nas stan bting / ril ba dag chus
bkang ste bzhag nas gang po dag la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol pa/ kye gang po/ bshos rnams bshams kyi/ dus mkhyen par mdzod cig /de dag dong ba dang / dpal sbed kyis de'i gan du
'ongs te smras pa/ 'phags pa gang po/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ khyim bdag gi khyim du bzhud de/ de nang du bzhud kar sgo'i them pa la zhabs bzhag nas 'dzum pa ston te/ de nas nyan thos kun
dga' bo zhes bya bas stod g.yogs phyogs gcig tu gzar/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni/ rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ btsun pa/ ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen gyis na/ 'dzum pa mdzad ces zhus pa dang / des kyang kun
dga' bo/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dag ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa ston par mi mdzad de/ ji
lta bur dgongs pa bzhin lung ston to/ /zhes smras nas de la skye bo mang po dag kyang rab tu dad par gyur gyi/ khyod kyis kyang khyim bdag me skyes kyi khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe de ltar bya ba'i rigs
so/ /'on kyang skye bo mang po dag rab tu dad par 'gyur ro/ /des khas blangs so/ /de nas gang po gcer bu pa mang pos bskor nas khyim bdag me skyes kyi khyim du phyin pa dang / khyim bdag me
skyes kyi sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag ste rta gad du bgad pa dang / de'i nang nas gcer bu pa zhig gis rkang pa la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu rgyu med rkyen med par
'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ /zhes dris pa dang / kye/ chu bo dregs bral gyi 'gram na spre'u pho zhig gis spre'u mo zhig mthong nas de la sems rab tu chags te spre'u mo de la brgal
lo/ /snyam nas brgyugs pa dang / dred de shing gi rtse mo nas rdeg 'chos nas dus 'das so/ /de'i tshe na nga 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i rgyus sdug bsngal ba cher
gyur to/ /snyam mo/ /de skad du kha nas byung ma thag tu khyim bdag me skyes kyis thos nas des bsam pa/ bu zan mo'i bu gang po ni/ khab 'tshong pa slar khab rdung pa'i khyim du khab tshong par sems
pa bzhin te/ ci nas 'di la kyal ka zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas de nas dbyug gu can mang po thams cad bde bar 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' ba dang / bza' bas
phor pa bkang nas steng du tshod ma blugs te byin no/ /gang po gcig pu la ni/ phor pa'i zhabs su tshod ma blugs nas steng du 'bras kyis g.yogs te byin no/ /gcer bu pa phal dag za zhing 'dug pa
dang / gang pos bsam pa/ gor ma chag par des ni/ nga la ston par dmigs te/ des tshod ma zhim po dang / kha zas bzang po sbyin par bsam mo/ /snyam nas ji tsam tshod ma brims zin pa dang /
des bsam pa/ de ni/ brel bas brjed kyi/ bdag gis bskul lo/ /snyam nas des bos nas khyim bdag /nga la ni/ 'bras chan 'ba' zhig 'ongs kyi/ tshod ma ni/ med do/ /zhes smras pa
dang / des slar tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi mthong ba ni mthong bar byed/ /mthong bar bya ba mi mthong ste/ /dregs bral 'gram gyi spre'u mthong la/ /phor bu'i nang ga tshod ma min/ /gang po
yang de'i gdong bltas pa dang / des phor bu'i zhabs na tshod ma 'dug pa bstan te/ gang po/ khyod kyis chu bo dregs bral gyi 'gram na spre'u 'dug pa ni/ mthong / phor bu'i nang na
tshod ma 'dug pa ma mthong ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ 'dis bdag skyengs par byas kyi/ ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis kar phan par mi 'gyur ba de ltar sbyin pa'i
yon tan brjod do/ /snyam du bsam pa dang / me skyes kyis de skyengs par shes nas sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i tshe de'i mdun na mi 'dug go/ /des zan zos nas sbyin pa'i yon tan bklags
pa/ sbyin bdag gis ni sbyin pa'i dus/ /dge sbyong gzhan ni za ba'i dus/ /lhag ma gzhan la 'ongs pa'i dus/ /bsod nams mi dge yod ma yin/ /sgo ba zhig 'dug pa des sbyin pa'i yon tan

brjod pa la nyan nyan te thos nas khros pa/ 'di 'dra ba'i sdig can zan zos pa la srung yang mi nus te/ 'di 'dra ba'i sbyin pa'i yon tan lta ga la srid kyi/ bu zan mo'i bu 'di la kyal ka zhig bya'o/ /snyam

nas des 'bras khu bum pa gang sgo drung du pho'o/ /sgo gtan gyi gdang phyed tsam drangs te bzhag pa dang / gcer bu pa phyir byung ba dang / 'bras khu las dred de klad pa sgo gtan la phog nas khrag byung ngo / /de
nas sgo ba des mthong ste tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sgo gtan phyung ba'i dus la bab/ /'bras khu pho ba'i dus bab pas/ /mgo bo snad pa'i dus yin gyi/ /dge dang mi dge'i dus med do/ /de
klad pa la khrag zag bzhin du khyim bdag dpal sbed gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / dpal sbed kyis mthong nas btsun pa gang po/ 'di ci nyes zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ me skyes kyis 'di
'dra ba'i gnod pa byas so/ /dpal sbed kyis smras pa/ khyed ni/ gson por thar gyi/ sdod cig dang / ci nas 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa kho bo'i khyim nas
gson bzhin du phyir mi 'byung bar bya'i/ mi dgar ma byed cig /dpal sbed kyis bsam pa/ 'di'i dgra la lan glan gyi/ spyan drang du 'gro'o/ /de ste dge sbyong go'u ta ma de thams cad mkhyen
pa yin na ni/ mgron du bos kyang khas len du mi btub bo/ /de ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin na ni/ khas len to/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag dpal sbed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye go'u ta ma/ sang bdag gi khyim du dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig bshos la gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes shig /ces spyan drangs pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis dgongs pa/ gang gis nga las bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de 'di ltar byed do/ /de ste ngas khas ma blangs na ni bden pa'i bar chad dag tu 'gyur te/ ci nas khas blang ngo / /snyam nas
gshegs par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /dpal sbed kyis bsam pa/ 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin te/ de ste thams cad mkhyen pa yin na ni/ 'di ltar
khas mi len pa'i rigs na/ ci nas 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'gyur bar dgra'i lan glan no/ /snyam nas de nas de'i khyim du song ste/ de'i khyim gyi sgo khar dong chen po brkos
nas nang du shing ka di de'i me mdag dud pa med pas bkang nas de'i steng du rtswas g.yogs nas sas bkab ste bzhag go /dug rnon pos bza' ba dang / btung ba sbyar to/ /de nas me skyes
kyi sring mos dpal sbed la jo bo ci zhig mdzad ces dris pa dang / des smras pa/ dgra gsad par bya'o/ /jo bo la dgra su mchis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'o/ /de ste jo bo khyod kyi dgra bcom ldan 'das
yin na/ mdza' bo su zhig mchis kyi/ jo bo 'di lta bu 'phags pa'i chos ma yin pa'i las bya bar mi rigs par soms shig /ces smras pa dang / de nas dpal sbed kyis bsam pa/
'di'ang me skyes kyi gnyen du 'ong ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la dad pas na gsang shor bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des mo mdzod kyi nang du bcug ste sgo lcags bcug ste bzhag go /gang po
la sogs pa gcer bu pa thams cad bos nas ngas dgra gsad pas bltar shog cig /dge sbyong go'u ta ma gsad pa'i phyir sgor dong chen po brkos nas nang du seng ldeng gi me mdag gis bkang
ste bzhag /kha zas dang skom gyi nang du dug rnon pos bkang ngo / /de dag yid rab tu dga' nas myur zhing rings su dong ste yang thog gi steng du 'dzegs te 'khod nas deng bdag cag bde bar 'khod do/ /
dge sbyong go'u ta ma me'i dong gi nang du ji ltar tshig pa dang / dug rnon pos rab tu zhen pa dang / yan man dus la ji ltar 'gyel ba dag la blta'o/ /dpal sbed kyis gdan bting nas bcom ldan
'das la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol to/ /go'u ta ma bshos kyang sbyar lags kyi/ kye go'u ta ma dus la bab par dgongs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod song la dge slong dag la 'di skad du/ dpal sbed kyi khyim du de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par dge slong su'ang sngar ma 'dong zhig /ces sgos
shig /btsun pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la mnyan te dge slong dag la/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed kyi khyim du
de bzhin gshegs pa ma gshegs par sngar dge slong su'ang ma 'dong zhig /ces bka' stsal to/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed
dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong mang pos bskor nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du byas te dpal sbed kyi khyim ga na bar de logs su gshegs so/ /de nas 'od ma'i tshal na gnas
pa'i lha bran rnams sdug bsngal zhing yid mi dga' bas gzir te myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la gtugs te snying rje ba'i tshig gis 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpal sbed kyi khyim du gshegs par mi rigs so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ lha/ de na gnod pa ci zhig yod/ bcom ldan 'das/ dpal sbed ni/ bcom ldan 'das la ma rung par bgyi ba'i slad du bshams so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gnod pa thams cad dang bral na/ des nga la gnod pa ci zhig byar yod/ lha bran gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom
ldan 'das des dgrongs pa'i slad du dong chen po'i nang du seng ldeng gi me mdag gis bkang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha/ gang 'dod chags kyi me
dang / zhe sdang gi me dang / gti mug gi me dag kyang ye shes kyi chus btab na zhi bar 'gyur na/ me'i nang na tha ma des ci zhig byar yod kyi/ mya ngan ma byed par 'dug cig /lha bran gyis gsol pa/
de gcig pu ma lags kyi/ gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i slad du bya bar sbyar te/ dug rnon po mi bzad pas kha zas dang / btung ba'i nang du sbyar to/ /zhes smras pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha/ dug gi gnyen po ye shes kyis 'dod chags kyi dug dang / zhe sdang gi dug dang / gti mug gi dug kyang rab tu btang / rab tu bskyugs/ rab tu bor na/
dug gi nang na tha ma des byar ci zhig yod/ bdag slar log la bdag gi las la nan tan du byos shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu byon pa dang / rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha
dag gis snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang / lha de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis lha snga ma bzhin du bsgos te slar bkye'o/ /de nas dpal sbed kyi khang pa'i sgor byon pa dang / dpal sbed kyi khyim gyi lhas
snga ma bzhin du gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag kyang snga ma bzhin du bsgos te slar bkye'o/ /de nas dpal sbed kyi chung mas bsam pa/ da ni/ bcom ldan 'das sgo dang por phyin cing /
da tsam ni/ dong gi steng du zhabs bzhag go /da tsam ni/ dong gi kha rtswas g.yogs pa'i steng nas lhung ngo / /da tsam ni/ bcom ldan 'das me'i nang du lhung nas dud pas kyang 'tshal/ mchi ma yang
byung / me lces chos gos tshig pa'i dud pa yang byung ngo / /snyam nas mi dga' ba des khang pa'i nang du bcug pas yid mi dga' ba skyes nas mig mchi mas gang zhing ngo 'dzum gnas nas rtags mi
dge ba la rtog ste ngu zhing 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad la phan pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i yid kyis sgo bar mar byon nas me dong gi steng du zhabs bzhag pa dang / de
nas me'i dong gi steng du zhabs bzhag ma thag tu de thams cad mtshe'u pad+ma can du gyur te/ ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dag gis ni/ khebs
bya ngang pa dang / ka rand dang / ngur pa la sogs pa chu na spyod pa'i bya rnams kyis brgyan te/ bya de dag kyang skad sna tshogs 'byin pa ni/ ji ltar lha'i rdzing man da ka bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la
gnas pa'i lha dag gis kyang lha'i me tog ku mu da dang / lha'i me tog kha tog dang ldan pas steng nas gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i steng dag tu zhabs bzhag ste dpal sbed
kyi khyim du byon pa dang / khyim bdag dpal sbed ngo mtshar che ba'i mig gis bgrad de bltas nas/ btsun pa gang po/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la ltos shig /ces smras
pa dang / gang po mi dga' ba'i bzhin du bsgyur nas/ khyim bdag /dge slong go'u ta ma dad dam/ de'i sgyu ma la dad dam zhes smras pa dang / dpal sbed kyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po/

de ltar 'di lta bus bsgrub tu rung na ni/ khyod kyang thams cad mkhyen pa na sgyu ma de lta bu byos la ston cig /de lta bus nga dang / nga'i mdza' bo dang / phu nu dag kyang bsgrub par gyis shig /gang
pos bsam pa/ dgos pa ma grub par gyur te/ slar 'gro'o/ /snyam nas des de la spyos te khang pa'i steng nas babs te skyengs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung bar ma nus te/ de

nas 'gros dal zhing bags kyis song nas gdong yang sa la bltas te dpal sbed kyi khyim nas byung ste bros te song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed khyim bdag me skyes kyi sring mo gang na ba der song ste
phyin nas sgo lcags phye ste/ bzang mo tshur shog /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag tshol cig /ces smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ 'di bdag slu bar byed do/ /snyam nas snying rje
ba'i tshig gis dal bus smras pa/ sdig pa'i grogs pos bslus te bsad na/ bdag la bgam du ci zhig yod ces smras pa dang / des/ bzang mo bden par zer te/ bgam pa ni/ ma yin gyi/
bcom ldan 'das dgrongs par ma nus pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du 'byung bar mi nus kyi/ nga khrid la song zhig ces smras pa dang / des dpal sbed kyi chung ma de dga' ba skyes nas mgu
ba'i yid kyis dpal sbed khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
btsun pa/ bzod pa mdzod cig /khyim bdag 'di/ mi dge ba'i grogs pos bslus pas na/ bcom ldan 'das la mi dge ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag bgyis so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i sna 'dra ba'i phyag brkyangs nas gsungs pa/ khyim bdag /longs shig dang bzod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/ mdza' ba dang / dgrar bye brag mi 'byed/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ mdza' ba dang dgrar bye brag mi 'byed/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mtshungs so/ /zhes smras pa
dang | de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' ba skyes nas mos pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la cung zad cig gzhes shig /bdag gis bshos de
gdod sbyar ro/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /de bzhin gshegs pa la spyan 'dren pas dus gsol to/ /go'u ta ma bshos dag sbyar lags
kyi| kye go'u ta ma dus mkhyen par mdzod cig /ces zer na/ da yang ci'i phyir na/ 'di skad du smra/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mi dge ba'i grogs po la bltas par gyur
pa'i blos log par lta ba gsum du 'gro ba'i sdig pas de la gzhol te kun la sdug par 'gro ba gnyis kyang bgags nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir zhugs so/ /zhes
smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ gnod pa thams cad dang bral na/ ci'i phyir nga la gnod par 'gyur/ btsun pa/
bdag gis dug rnon pos zhal zas dang / skyems kyi nang du sbyar gyi/ de dag pho la gdod sbyar ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /gang 'dod
chags kyi dug dang / zhe sdang gi dug dang / gti mug gi dug kyang rab tu bskyugs shing bor na/ dug ngan pa 'di lta bus ci zhig byar yod kyi/ gang sbyar ba de khyer te shog cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das
dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting ba la bzhugs te/ bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong dag la 'di skad du/ nam rgan rim
du 'byor tshogs so/ /zhes skad ma byung gi bar du su yang zan ma za zhig par sgos shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong dag la/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa ni/ rgan rim du 'byor tshogs so/ /zhes skad ma byung gi bar du su'ang ma za zhig ces byung ngo / /de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bde bar 'khod nas kha zas dag bsnyen pa
dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyis dpal sbed kyi khyim rgan rim du 'byor tshogs zhes skad phyung ba dang / kha zas dang / skom dag kyang dug med par gyur to/ /dpal sbed de dogs bzhin
du kha zas dang / skom dag 'brim zhing bsam pa/ rgan rim nas gzhon nu dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang / da tsam dge slong rgan rim dag ni/ dug rnon pos 'gyel gor ma chag go/ gzhon nu nas
yang rgan rim gyi drung du 'ongs nas yang 'di snyam du sems te/ de'i blo yang de lta bur skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi dug spangs kyi/ nyan
thos thams cad ma yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas/ de ltar dge slong thams cad kyis bshos gsol na/ gcig la yang gnod par ma gyur to/ /chung du na/ de'i lhag
ma zos pa dag la yang gnod par ma gyur/ de nas khyim bdag dpal sbed phyi phyir dad pa skyes so/ /de chung ma dang gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas lhung bzed phyung ste phyag
bcabs par shes nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal sbed dang / chung ma'i bsam pa dang / bag
la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin dag mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chos rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu bshad do/ /khyim bdag dpal sbed kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs
la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ /des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum smras te/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis phan btags pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ sdug pa dang / mdza' ba dang / gnyen dang / 'khor gyis kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis
lhas kyang ma bgyis/ snga ma'i pha mes dag gis ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis mchi ma dang / khrag gi rgya mtsho ni/ bskams
rus pa'i ri las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni/ bcad/ mtho ris kyi sgo ni/ phye ste/ bdag ni/ lha dang / mi'i gnas su bzhag go /zhes smras nas yang gsol pa/ nyes pa mang ba ma rungs pa/
ngan du 'gro ba'i lam rnams te/ /khyod kyi mthus ni de dag bcad/ mtho ris 'gro ba'i sgo phye bsod nams can/ /mya ngan 'da' ba'i lam yang bdag gis thob/ /khyod la brten pas thob pa nyes
bral ba'i/ bdag gi mig ni dag cing rnam par dag /'phags pa dgyes pa'i gnas bzhi thob/ /sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol brgal/ /skye bo lha min lha dang mis mchod pa/ /skye ba na ba rga shi
rnam par bral/ /srid pa stong du'ang rnyed par shin tu dka'/ /thub pa khyod mthong dang ni 'bras bur ldan/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par brgal te/ mngon par brgal lo/ /da ni/ bdag
bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun du skyabs su mchi'i/ deng phan chad nam 'tsho'i bar srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi nas mngon du dad kyi/ bdag dge bsnyen
du zungs shig /btsun pa/ deng phan chad mu stegs can gcer bu pa dang / gcer bu ma dang / gcer bu pa'i nyan thos rnams la ni/ sgo bcad/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dang / dge slong dang /
dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pha dang / dge bsnyen ma la ni/ sgo dbye'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpal sbed la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par bstabs/
yang dag par gzengs bstod/ rab tu dga' bar byas nas gdan las bzhengs te bzhud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge
'dun gyi mdun du gdan bting pa la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag dpal sbed kyi khyim du de lta bu'i gnod pa
dag byung ba de la der de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par ma gyur na/ gor ma chag par dge slong rab tu mang po zhig dug gis dus 'das par 'gyur/ khyim bdag de'ang ngan du spyad pas mtshams
med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo / /de bas na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi dge slong la mtshungs par spyod pa'i chos bca'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan dge slong gi rgan rim du
'dug nas kha zas dag bshams te 'ongs pa dang / sngar chung du na lan tshwa tsam yang ma blang zhig/ nam rgan rim du 'byor tshogs zhes skad ma phyung ba blangs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur
ro| |gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de'i tshe khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gtsug lag khang chen po zhig rtsig pa la zhugs pa la/ des phyed tsam brtsigs pa dang dus 'das so/ /de'i bu

khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge slong dag gis de'i gan du song ste bzhin bzang / khyod kyi phas gtsug lag khang rtsig pa la zhugs pa dang / de'ang phyed tsam zin pa dang dus 'das so/ /de ni/ khyod kyis

mjug sgrub pa'i rigs so/ /zhes smras pa dang / de dad pa chung ste/ gtsug lag khang de ni/ che bas na/ de tsam rtsig sus nus kyi/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni/ chen po de bshig la chung ngur
bskyungs te bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste rtsig mi nus na/ bshig la chung ngur
gyis shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis gtsug lag khang chung ngu zhig rtsig pa la zhugs pa las/ de'ang phyed tsam zin pa dang
de dus 'das so/ /de'i bu'ang khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas des dge slong dag gis de la bzhin bzang / khyod kyi phas gtsug lag khang phyed brtsigs nas lus pa de/ da khyod kyis mjug sgrubs shig/
ces smras pa dang / de rab tu dad pa zhig ste/ 'phags pa dag /bdag ni/ cher bgyid par dad na/ de ni/ chung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na/ snga ma bshig la chen po zhig brtsig
go /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste nus na/ chung ngu bshig la cher rtsig tu gnang gi/ de la the
tshom du ma byed cig /de bzhin du khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis mchod rten chen po zhig brtsigs par byas pa la phyed tsam zin pa dang de dus 'das so/ /de'i bu'ang khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas
de la dge slong dag gis bzhin bzang / khyod kyi phas mchod rten phyed tsam brtsigs shing 'dug na/ de khyod kyis mjug sgrubs shig /ces smras pa dang / de'ang ma dad
pa zhig ste/ 'phags pa/ de tshe ches pas rtsig mi nus na/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ de la bdag gis de slar bshig la chung ngur bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gtsug lag khang chen po las chung ngur bskyung du yang rung / cher yang rung gi/
mchod rten ni/ chen po las chung ngur ma skyungs shig /chung ngur byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gzhan zhig yang mchod rten chung ngu zhig rtsig pa la zhugs pa las
phyed tsam zin pa dang de dus 'das so/ /de'i bu yang khyim gyi bdag por gyur nas dge slong dag gis de la bzhin bzang / khyod kyi phas mchod rten rtsig tu zhugs pa las phyed zin pa dang /
de'ang dus las 'das na/ khyod kyis mjug sgrubs shig /ces smras pa dang / de'ang rab tu dad pa zhig ste/ bdag ni/ cher dad pa lags kyi/ de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/
bdag gis cher bskyed par bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de chung ngu
bshig ste chen po byed nus na/ gnang gi/ byos shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /mchod rten dang gdugs rnying zhing zhig pa'ang de bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos shig ces bka' stsal
pa dang / gzhan zhig gis gdugs phab nas slar ma bsgrubs kyi bar du dus 'das pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rjes ma ma zin gyi bar du snga ma dbab par ma byed cig /de
bzhin du sku gzugs 'jim pa la byas pa dag rnying nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dang 'dra ba'am/ de las lhag par ni/ byos
shig /chung ngu ni/ ma yin no/ /de bzhin du ri mor bris pa dag kyang ri mor byed pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ri mor ma bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byid na/ de nyid kyi
rgyu slar bris shig /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi bka'i glegs bam dag byed par gyur pa na/ dge slong dag gis the tshom skyes nas ma bris pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byid na/
sangs rgyas kyi bka' slar bris shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// //'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po zhe gcig
pa| mdor na/ gsar bu 'jug par bya ba dang / 'khor rnams rnam pa lnga yis dang / /yon dang snod dang rol mo dang / /dge bsnyen dag ni bsgrags pa'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na
ste| bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs la dus kyi mchod ston chen po dang bcas par byos la/ grong khyer gyi nang du bkur bar gyis
shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis sus bkur bar mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyer cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong gzhon nu dag gis khyer cig par bka' stsal pa dang / de 'khor med par gyur pas na/ mi mdzes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma'i 'khor lnga dang chos shig /dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gis yon phul na/ sus kyang ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dge slong dag gis blang bar byos shig /gzhon nus blang ngam/ rgan po rnams kyis blang ba de dag gis ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan po rnams kyis longs shig
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bkur bar byos shig /dge slong gnas brtan dag gis khyer te ngal bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dge slong gnas brtan dag gis bsrungs la gzhan gyis bkur bar gyis shig /dge slong dag gis rol mo mi byed par dong ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan
'das kyis gnang na ni/ sku gzugs gshegs pa'i tshe bdag gis rol mo sbyar ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag/ de ltar na/ gnang gi /sbyor cig /
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong gis rol mo bgyir rung ngam/ u pa li/ mi rung ngo / /nam mchod pa'i dus na 'di skad du/ bzhin bzang /
ston pa la mchod par byos shig ces sgos shig /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o/ /mdor na/ sgrog par byed dang snod sbed dang / shing rta tha dad pa byed pa dang / snod rnams
bged pa dad pa dang / mdo yi tshigs su bcad par brjod/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ston
chen po gyis la shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma na bzhugs pa'i sku'i gzugs grong khyer du gshegs pa rgyas par byos shig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis bram ze dang / khyim bdag dag
la ma sbran par dong ngo / /de dag gis e ma'o/ /'phags pa dag /nged cag la sngar sbran na ni/ nged kyis yon rnams sta gon bya ba zhig ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhag bdun nam brgyad kyi snga rol nas dus kyi mchod ston chen po byed do/ /zhes grong khyer dang / tshong 'dus dang / srang dang /
lam dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrags par byos shig /de dag gis dus ston no/ /dus ston no/ /zhes bsgrags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhag
dus thob la zhag 'di snyed cig na dus ston byed do/ /zhes sbron cig /de ltar byas kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gro ba la bris la bal glang
gi steng du zhon te tshong 'dus dang / srang dang / lam dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dag tu bsgrags par gyis shig /gang gi nyin mo bcom ldan 'das kyi dus ston chen po byed pa na/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge slong gnas brtan dang / gnas brtan dag gis ni/ yon rnams srungs shig /gzhon rnams kyis khyer cig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang / des khyer te bab bab tu bor ba dang / ma byin par
len pa dag gis brkus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod spyad sbed pa'i dge slong skos shig/ bsko ba ni/ 'di ltar bsko'o/ /stan things la gaN+DI brdungs shing dris pa la lan ldon
pa'i dge slong bskos te dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams tshogs shing 'khod pa dang / sngar ni/ dad par byos shig /khyod ming 'di zhes bya ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par bsko na/ dad dam zhes dri ste/
dad na/ des kyang dad do/ /zhes smros shig /de'i 'og tu dge slong zhig gis gsol pa dang las byos shig /gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes
bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed par dad na/ de ste dge 'dun gyis dus la bab shing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnong zhig /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod sbed par bskos te snod sbed pa ming 'di
zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod sbed de/ 'di ni/ gsol pa'o/ /las kyang 'di ltar bya ste/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi smod sbed par
dad de/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ snod sbed par bskos te/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi snod sbed na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang la ming 'di zhes bgyi ba snod
sbed du bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang gis mi bzod pa de dag ni/ smros shig/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod sbed par bskos te dge 'dun gyis bzod
cing gnang bas na/ cang mi gsung ste/ de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /der yang rnyed pa dag mang du byung nas dge slong ma dag gis 'phags pa/ bdag cag la rnyed pa'i skal pa stsol cig /ces
smras kyang / dge slong dag gis ma byin no/ /de dag gis phyi de nyin mo shing rta gzhan zhig bshams pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis 'phags ma dang / shing rta 'di nyid dam/ 'on
te gzhan zhig ces dris nas/ dge slong ma dag gis kyang rnyed pa mang du gyur to/ /dge slong ma dag gis rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la ngom par gyur pa dge slong dag gas mthong nas 'phags pa/
khyod kyis kho mo cag la rnyed pa ma byin mod kyi/ bdag cag gis kyang shing rta logs shig tu bshams pas/ bdag cag la rnyed pa yang mang du thob par gyur to/ /
smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong dag /gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni/ dge slong
ma dag gis dus ston gyi tshe shing rta gud du bshams pas de bas na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dag gis shing rta logs shig tu mi bshams par dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong mas mi rigs pa byas te/ de bas na/ dge slong mas dus ston gyi tshe shing rta logs shig tu ma shoms shig /dge slong ma dag gis dus ston gyi
tshe shing rta logs shig tu bshams na/ dbyen byas pa dang nye ba'i nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /snod de dag de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bgos shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis ji ltar bsgo ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snod 'ged pa'i dge slong zhig skos shig /bsko
ba ni/ 'di ltar bya'o/ /stan bting ste gaN+DI brdungs la dris pa la lan ldon pa'i dge slong bskos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus te 'khod pa dang sngar dad par byos shig /khyod dge 'dun gyi
snod 'ged par bsko na/ dad dam zhes dris la/ de ste dad do/ /zhes zer na/ de'i 'og tu dge slong zhig gis gsol ba dang las byos shig/ gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ snod 'ged
pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged par dad na/ de ste dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnong la dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod 'ged
par skos shig /ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged de/ 'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las kyang 'di ltar byos shig /gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi
ba snod 'ged par dad na/ dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged de/ dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi snod 'ged par tshe dang ldan pa rnams gang bzod pa ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /
gang mi bzod pa de dag ni/ smros shig /dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di snod 'ged par bskos te/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na/ cang mi gsung ste/ de de bzhin
bzhin du 'dzin to/ /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o/ /mdo bar ma ste/ rnam pa tha dad byas dang yon/ /gang gi tshe na gcig la lhag /gang gi tshe na gnyis las
gcig /bdag gir bya bar mi rung ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /gang gi tshe dus ston chen po
byung ba na rnyed pa mang po dang ldan par gyur nas dge slong dag gis ji ltar bya ba'i thabs mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos sbed pa'i dge
slong gis stan things la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa la lan ldon pa'i dge slong bskos la dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du btsong par bya'o/ /de dag gis sus rin thang gdab pa ma
shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis thob cig /de dag gis de nyid nyor bcug pa dang / de nyid la nyor ma gzhug cig /dge 'dun gyi
gnas brtan gyis rin cher btab ste sus kyang ma nyos nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ cher ma gdab cig /ces gsungs pa dang / shin tu chung du btab bo/ /shin tu
chung ngur yang ma gdab par ran par thob cig /gang gis thog mar rin skyed pa de nyid nyor chug cig /ces smras pa dang / de la ma btsong par gang gi tshe rin thang sus kyang ma skyed na/ gdod
de nyid la tshongs shig /drug sde dag gis rin cher btab ste rin blangs na/ dge 'dun gyi don gyi phyir nged kyis rin thang bskyed do/ /zhes smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ gang nyo ba des rin thang skyed cig /gzhan gyis rin thang bskyed na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis rin thang bskyed de nyos nas bkrus shing bgos so//
rin len pa la de nyid slar byin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin 'ongs kyi bar du de la ma byin cig /rin ma byin par bgos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo
gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// //mdor na/ gtsug lag khang ni zhig pa ste/ /lci ba'i phyir ni gzhig par bya/ /nam zhig 'jigs par gyur pa na/ /skad cig
rnyed pa dge 'dun gyi/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gnas
khang lnga brtsegs su byos shig /dri gtsang khang ni/ bdun brtsegs/ sgo khang yang bdun brtsegs su byos shig /ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong ma'i gnas khang ni/ sum brtsegs
so| |dri gtsang khang ni/ lnga brtsegs so/ /sgo khang yang lnga brtsegs so/ /steng gi lcid kyis rtsig pa 'jig tu byed de/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng ma'i rim gcig phri zhig /'on kyang 'jig par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rim pa gnyis nas bzhi'i
bar du phri la 'og khang gcig pu zhog cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams la 'jigs pa dag byung nas gtsug lag khang stong par byas te dge 'dun gyi mal stan yang
bor nas bros te dong ba dang / ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus so/ /brkus pas dge slong dag phongs par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi mal stan bor te ma 'dong zhig /gang du 'dong ba der khyer cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du 'dong bar
khyer cig ces bka' stsal pa/ dge slong zhig gis bgo ba dag khyer te dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu bros te dong ba dang / de na nub mo dge slong zhig gis tshe dang ldan pa/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyi
nang na rgan te/ ji ltar rgan rim du dbang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang de byin no/ /des de byin nas ji tsam nam nangs pa dang / des bgo ba 'di khyer cig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gang gi tshe
bgo ba bgos pa de'i tshe na ni/ khyed rgan pos khyer la/ da bkur ba'i tshe na ni/ nga la sbyin nam/ khyod nyid khyer cig /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis 'jigs pa'i tshe khyer ba de de nyid kyi'o/ /gang gi tshe 'jigs pa med par gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngo / /zhes slar ma phul
ba dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /re zhig ngas dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag gnang
gi |gtan du ni/ ma yin gyi/ 'jigs pa dang bral na/ slar phul la rgan rim du byin cig /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ dze ta'i tshal
du mchod ston che/ /rnga chen gyis ni 'du bar bya/ /gral ni 'chol bar 'khod pa dang / /dge slong las ni zhal tar bsgo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na/ bdag gis dus ston chen
po bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /ngas gnang gi /byos shig /de dze ta'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas pa dang / dge slong mang po
'dus par gyur nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod ston chen po byed pa na gaN+DI dang / rnga dang / dung bus shig dang / dge slong dag gdugs tshod la bab par dus rig par 'gyur ro/ /
zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag /rnga dang dung dag gi sgras brdegs na/ 'chol bar 'khod do/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong las zhal ta ba bskos te/ ci nas rgan rim du 'khod pa dang / nam zas dag rgan rim nas brims te/ gzhon nu'i gan du phyin tsam nas gdugs tshod kyang
yol te dge slong dag zas kyi bar chad du gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
lnga brgya phrang du gyis la/ kha zas ni/ rgan rim gyi mdun du zhog cig /dge slong dag gis de bzhin du byas pa dang / khyim bdag ni/ bza' ba dag 'brim pa la rku'o/ /de ltar gyur
pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'brim pa'i spyan pa dge slong skos shig /de dag kyang kha zas kyi bar chad du gyur nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag sngar dang zan byin la phyis zhal ta byed du chug cig /rkyang pa'i sgo gnyis pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //mdor
na| dge slong ma ni mang du gyur/ /dge slong dang pos rjes yi rang / /gcig dang gnyis dang mang po dang / /bu chung rab tu dag gyur pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ ri brag gi grong gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag cig gnas pa des dge slong ma mang zhig bshos la spyan drangs pa dang / ji tsam zhig
na| dge slong gcig cig 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing ri brag gi grong der phyin pa dang / de der bsod snyoms la zhugs na/ de na gzhan zhig gis de la/
'phags pa/ khyim 'di na dge slong ma dag bshos gsol zhing 'khod kyi/ der bzhud cig ces smras pa dang / de'ang der song na/ dge 'dun ma'i gnas brtan sbom mo dga' ldan 'dug ste/
des 'phags pa/ de ste sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod nus na ni/ rgan rim du bzhugs shig /de ste mi nus na ni/ phyogs gcig tu bshos snoms la bzhud cig /ces smras pa dang / de
skyengs nas des bsam pa/ de ste bdag gis sbyin pa'i yon tan brjod kyi bar du 'dug na ni/ 'gron pa mang po dag kyang dong bar 'gyur gyi/ phyogs gcig tu zan zos te 'gro'o/ /snyam
nas phyogs gcig tu zan zos te song ngo / /rim bzhin du mnyan du yod par phyin pa dang / dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa bde bar 'ongs sam/ ci bde bar spyad dam zhes smras pa dang / des
smras pa/ ga la zhig bde bar spyad/ dge slong mas kyal ka byas so/ /de ji ltar byas zhes smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa rgyas par dge slong dag la smras so/ /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na dge slong gcig dang / dge slong ma gcig pa de na dge slong de gral yang dang po/ chu yang dang po/ zan yang dang por
zo zhig gang na dge slong ma gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ de las kyang lhag pa zhig la dge slong gcig cig 'ongs na/ dge slong gcig pu de lta na yang dang po/ chu yang dang po/ zan yang dang
por zo zhig /gang de ste dge slong ma dag 'ba' zhig na yang rtag tu gral gyi dang por stan gcig lhag par zhog la 'khod cig /de ste dge tshul zhig 'ongs na/
yang de der 'dug la zo zhig /de ste des mi nus par gyur na yang dge slong mas sbyin pa'i yon tan lhogs shig /dge slong mas de ltar ma byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /
gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin pas dze ta'i tshal du dus ston chen po byas nas bu dang / chung ma dge 'dun la yon du phul ba dang / dge slong dag
gis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag la bris shig /dris pa
dang / pha des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /rin thang chod cig dang / bdag gis blur gsol lo/ /drug sde dag gis de la 'gran cing spel ba la zhugs pa dang / de'i nang nas chung ma bu
chung du can gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi rkang pa la btud de/ jo bo/ /bdag gi bu chung gi /bdag ma gtang zhig /ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ sems can gyi nang na bud med las snying chung pa med kyi/ 'jigs par ma bya zhig /de
bas na/ dge slong gis bud med kyi rin thang ma gcod cig /bcad na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin bdag gis ji ltar dga' ste byin pa bzhin du longs shig/ rkyang
pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa rdzogs so// //mdor na/ bsdus par na/ yo byad bus pa blun pa dang / /gang gi ba dang de yi ste/ /de ltar khye'u las bslang mi bya/ /mgon
med zas sbyin de bzhin te/ /spu yi gri dang 'khor rnams dang / /chu dang bsdus par gsungs pa'o/ /mdor na/ yo byad rnams dang gnang ba dang / /u pa lis ni dris pa ste/ /ji ltar byin gyis
brlab par bya/ /yid gcugs tshigs bcad mdor gsungs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/
dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod pas na/ na bar gyur te/ kha cig la sman med nas lhung bzed btsongs kyang khyim bdag gis ma nyos nas dus 'das par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ gnang gi/ yo byad dang / gos chongs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis yo
byad dang / gos chongs shig /ces gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis bkrus nas kha bsgyur te bcangs pa dang / rin chung ngur gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma
bkrus/ kha ma bsgyur/ gsar ba btags ma thag chongs shig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mu pa las zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis dge slong dag gis yo byad bcu gsum chongs shig /ces bka' stsal na/ ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bgyi/ u pa li/ so sor byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ chos gos
'di ni/ sbyar mar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ bya ba zin pa yongs su spyad pa'o/ /de bzhin du stod g.yogs dang / mthang gos dang / sham thabs dang / sham thabs kyi 'theb
dang / stod chags dang / stod chags kyi 'theb dang / gdong phyis dang / lus phyis dang / g.yan pa'i gos dang / skra bzed dang / g.yogs ma dang / ras chen te/ gos 'di ni/ yo
byad kyi gos su byin gyis brlabs te na ba la dgos te/ bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa'i phyir byin gyis brlab bo/ /yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis
zhus pa| btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yo byad bcu gsum byin gyis rlobs shig ces bka' stsal na/ de las lhag pa'i gos rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ u pa li/ de ni/ slob dpon dang / /mkhan po dang / yid gcugs pa rnams la bsngos la bcang bar bya ste/ de yang 'di ltar bsngo bar bya ste/ dge slong gcig gi mdun du
'dug la 'di skad smros shig /dgongs shig tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gos 'di lhag par bsngo ste/ bsngo ba'i rigs pas ni/ mkhan po la bsngo ste/ mkhan po la yid
gcugs pas bcang bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du lan gnyis gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /rkyang ba'i nang nas sgo gsum ba'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o// //mdor na/ bus
pa blun la sogs pa shes/ /bcu gnyis kyi ni gang zag dang / /de bzhin rnam par dbye ba dang / /tshul bzhin pa ni gsum pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gang zag du'i slar bzlog pa mi btsan/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pa li/ bcu gnyis te/ bus pa dang / blun po dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa dang / ngo tsha med pa dang / 'khon du 'dzin pa dang / mtshams kyi phyi rol na
'dug pa dang / spangs pa dang / tshig mi brtan pa dang / spyod lam las 'gal ba dang / tshul bzhin du mi gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o/ /yang zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/
byis pa lta bu nas ji tsam gyis na/ bslab pa stsal ba'i bar du lags/ u pa lis gang log par bsam pa sems pa dang / log par smra ba smra ba dang / bzlog dka' ba bzlog pa yin te/
u pa li/ de ltar na/ byis par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ glen pa lags/ mdo sde mi 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba mi 'dzin pa/ ma lta bu mi 'dzin
pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na/ u pa li/ glen pa yin na/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mi gsal ba lags/ /u pa li/ mdo sde yang 'dzin/ 'dul ba yang 'dzin/ ma lta bu yang 'dzin
mod kyi/ 'on kyang mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa'i don mi shes pa ste/ 'di tsam gyis na/ u pa li/ mi gsal ba yin no/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mi mkhas pa
lags| u pa li/ gang mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma lta bu yang 'dzin/ de dag gi don kyang shes mod kyi/ gzhan shes par byed mi nus pa ni/ u pa li/ mi mkhas pa ste/ 'di
tsam gyis na/ u pa li/ mi mkhas pa yin no/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ ngo tsha med pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ phas pham pa bzhi las gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa byung bar gyur
pa ste| u pa li/ de ni/ ngo tsha med par gyur pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ 'khon du 'dzin pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ khro ba dang / 'thab mo dang / /gzhan yang gang dang gang du
'thab pa'i sgor gyur pa ste/ u pa li/ de tsam gyis na/ 'khon du 'dzin pa'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pa lags/ de ni/ u pa li/ dge
