slong gi mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa ste/ u pa li/ de tsam gyis na/ mtshams kyi phyi rol na 'dug pa'o/ /btsun pa| ji tsam gyis na/ spangs pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ dge
'dun gyis gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyis spangs pa ste/ u pa li/ de tsam gyis na/ spangs par gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ tshig mi brtan par gyur pa lags/ u
pa li| de ni/ tshig mi brtan par gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal par smra ba'o/ /u pa li/ de tsam gyis na/ tshig mi brtan par gyur pa'o/ /
btsun pa/ ji tsam na/ spyod lam 'gal bar gyur pa lags/ u pa li/ de ni/ dge 'dun gyi nang nas langs nas song ba'o/ /u pa li/ de ltar na/ spyod lam las 'gal bar gyur
pa'o| |btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ mi spyod pa ni/ spyod/ dge slong gi bslab pa ni/ mi slob pa'o/ /u pa li/ de tsam
gyis na| tshul bzhin la mi gnas par gyur pa zhes bya'o/ /btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ bslab pa stsal bar gyur pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ de ni/ dge slong la dge 'dun gyis gsol ba
dang bzhi'i las kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab pa byin par gyur pa ste/ u pa li/ de lta bu ni/ bslab pa byin par gyur pa'o/ /yang gsol pa/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ gang zag
gis slar bzlog pa la btsan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pa li/ rnam pa gsum ste/ tshul bzhin la gnas pa dang / tshig brtan pa dang /
spyod lam las ma 'gal ba'o/ /rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// //mdor na/ gang gi phyir ni bya ba dag/ gang zag kyang ni bcu gnyis te//
bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang / /khyim pa yin par khas blangs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la las bya ba de'i slar bzlog pa mi btsan no/ /zhes bka' stsal pa/ btsun pa/
gang zag bcu gnyis so sor bsko ba'i tshe de dag 'di skad mchi ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ nged cag la ni /ma bsko zhig /ces mchi na/ ci/ de dag gi slar bzlog pa yang mi btsan nam/
u pa li| btsan no/ /de ni/ chad pa'i las langs dgongs te gsungs so/ /btsun pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyid pa khyim pa lags par khas blangs na/ bsnyen par rdzogs
bar zhes bgyi'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa zhes bgyi/ u pa li/ bsnyen par rdzogs zin kyang khyim pa yin par khas blangs na/ de yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs zhes bya na/ bsnyen par
rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// //mdor na/ tshal bu dag ni mi rung ba/ /lnga pa gang gis rkang mi
bsku| |dbang phyug bsgrag par bya ba dang / /zhing gi dngos po dge 'dun gyi'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das kyis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga'i lham ma 'chang zhig| ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag gis mi rung ba rnam pa lnga po de dag gi tshil bus rkang ba byugs nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po
gsal rgyal gyi bal glang gi drung du song ste rdzi phyogs su 'khod pa dang / bal glang dag gi dri tshor nas bros pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag/ zungs shig ces smras pa dang / /de dag
gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis gzung bar mi nus so/ /bzhin bzang / nged kyis gzung ngam/ 'phags pa dag/ zungs shig/ nged la ci sbyin/ bca' ba'i rin no/ /des de dag gis
mdun du song ste rdzi mi ldang ba'i phyogs su 'dug pa dang / bal glang de dag kyang 'khod do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ci/ khyed rig pa mkhyen tam/ bzhin bzang / nged
rig pa mi shes mod kyi/ nged kyi bal glang cang shes kyi tshil bus rkang pa bskus pas so/ /'phags pa dag /rgyal po'i bal glang mchog dag bros par gyur na/ khyod kyis rgyal po la
gnod pa byas par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras nas de dag nyes pa dor brjod cing 'phyas 'dogs te mi snyan pa zer ro/ /de ltar gyur bar dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bal glang cang shes kyi tshil gyis rkang ba byug par ma byed cig /dge slong gis bal glang cang shes
kyi tshil gyis rkang pa la byugs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bal glang cang shes pa bzhin du rta cang shes dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / gzig las sogs pa rgyas par
brjod par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ rgyal po'i khab na ste/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na bar song ste drung du phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal bo gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
smras so/ /'phags pa kun dga' bo/ seng+ge'i gdan bshams pa 'di ci zhig bgyi/ ci/ deng chos bsgrags sam/ de'i tshe gso sbyong gi dus la bab ste/ des rgyal po chen
po/ dge slong gis mtshungs par bzung ba lags kyi/ khyim pas mtshungs par bzung ba ma lags so/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /mkhyen
bzhin du 'dri ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir rgyal po chen po chos ma mnyan par song zhes smras pa dang / de ltar
gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la zhib mor gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis nyes so/ /de ste rgyal po gzugs can snying po so sor thar pa thos par
gyur na| nges par de sngon pas kyang mngon du dga' bar gyur te/ dga' nas dga' ba'i dbang gis bya ba byed du gdon mi za'o/ /de bas na/ ngas gnang gis/ 'di 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa
dad pa de dag la ni/ thos par gyis shig /gzhan yang rab tu phyug la ma dad dbul la rab tu dad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bu dag la'ang thos par gyis shig/

gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya ba skya bo seng seng po skem zhing rid la rmya zhing lus nyam chung bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
po la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci'i phyir na gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu zhes bya ba skya bo seng seng bo skem zhing rid la rmya zhing nyam chung par gyur/ des bcom ldan 'das de dang po btsas nas
thug pa 'ba' zhig gis lus bskyed pa lags so/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ /de ltar na/ ngas gnang gi /gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa la
thug pa lud cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa la tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ni/ thug pa thung zhig
bar gnang ngo / /zhes bsgos pa dang / des smras pa/ btsun pa/ kun dga' bo bdag gcig pu la'am/ de ste dge 'dun thams cad/ des smras pa/ khyod gcig pu'i/ /btsun pa kun
dga' bo 'dis gleng bas na/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis kyang 'di skad du/ gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu pa bstan pa la rab tu byung ba/ sngon grong khyer tsam pa na lo legs
par gyur pa'i tshe bal glang bdun gyis drang ba spangs te rab tu byung nas da thug pa tsam la yang chags so/ /zhes zer gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi phyir dge 'dun thams cad
kyang thug pa gnang na/ bdag kyang gzod 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na/ gnang gi /gro bzhin bye ba nyi shu ba'i phyir dge 'dun thams cad kyang thug pa 'thung zhig /gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis dge 'dun rnams thug pa 'thung bar gnang ngo / /zhes thos nas des dge 'dun las bon bum pa stong gis gdab pa'i zhing dag phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi phyir blang bar bya ste/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /de bas na zhing las byung ba rnams dge 'dun gyis spyad par gyis shig /rkyang pa'i
sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// //mdor na/ gding dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / /dge tshul pha dang gsar bu dang / /snyoms zhugs dang ni mi gnang
ba/ /bslab pa byin pa gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong dang / khyim pa gnyis lhan cig tu gding ba gcig la mchis su rung ngam/ u pa li/ de ni/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen
zhig byung na/ gnang ngo / /btsun pa/ dge tshul pha dang / dge slong gsar bu dang / ma ning dang / za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom
pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis phrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / rkun gnas dang / so sor gnas dang / mi gnas pa
dag la sogs pa dang / gding ba gcig gi steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/ u pa li/ de ltar ni/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/ de bzhin du stan gcig gam/ /khri
gcig gam/ khri'u gcig gam/ par gtang gcig tu rung ngam/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ khyim pa dang stegs bu la stan
bting ba'i steng na lhan cig tu mchis par rung ngam/ mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/ rung ngo / /par tang dag gding yang mi rung mod kyi/ de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na/ par
tang dag bting bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du dge tshul pha dang / dge slong gsar bu nas so sor gnas pa'i bar du ste/ de bzhin du gnas la nyes pa'i dmigs su ma byung
gi bar du lhan cig 'dug na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ bslab pa stsal pa gnyis shig stan gcig gi steng na lhan cig mchis su rung ngam/ u pa li/ de ni/
mi rung ngo / /rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// //'dul pa gzhung dam pa/ bam po zhe gnyis pa/ mdor na/ mi bslang ba dang khri'u gcig /
brel bar gyur pa'ang de bzhin te/ /cung zad brel bar gyur pa dang / /rtswa dang shing yang dge 'dun gyi'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas
sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs pa'i tshe dge slong dag khri'u'i steng na btso blag gi las byed cing 'dug pa dang / drug sde dag de nyid du 'dug cing gnod par byed/ de dag brel bzhin
du bslang ba dang / de dag la gnod par gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong btso blag gi las
byed cing brel ba la dge slong dag gis ma bslang zhig /bslangs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag zan za zhing 'khod pa rnams la
drug sde dag gis rgan rim bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes bslang ba dang / dge slong dag ldang du ma btub nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar rgan rim bzhin du 'dug cig /bcom ldan
'das kyis ji ltar rgan rim bzhin du 'dug cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag phyis 'ongs nas dge slong snga ma zas za zhing brel ba dag bslang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong zan za zhing brel ba dag ma bslang bar gud du 'dug par bya ste/ bslangs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ dge slong dag zan za zhing brel ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chung du lan tshwa'am/ shang tse'am/ la phug
kyang rung / brim par gyur pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong zan za zhing brel pa la ma bslang zhig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag rgan rim gyis dang por 'dug nas zan za zhing ched
du brel bar byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis gral ma yin par 'dug pa la zan za zhing brel bar ma byed cig/ byas na/
'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag gral rim la mkhas par gyis shig /de las gzhan du na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun gyi btso blag gi bum pa dang /
gzhong khung dag dge slong dag gis blangs nas btso blag gi las byed pa dang / drug sde dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag nged rgan pas nged sngar dbang ngo / /zhes smras nas tshon rtsi dag pho ste khyer
ba dang / dge slong dag brel bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis bum pa
'am/ gzhong khung dag brel ba la ma blang bar bya ba rnams zin nas gdod longs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis bum pa'am/ gzhong khung dag brel ba la ma
blang zhig /zhes bka' stsal pa/ drug sde dag gis bsam bzhin du snod rnams tshon cung zad tsam gyis brel bar byas te bzhag pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon
rtsi thams cad snod gcig gi nang du blugs la dgos na/ blang bar gyis shig /dge slong gis snod dag gi nang du tshon rtsi cung zad kyis brel bar byas te ma gzhag cig /bzhag na/
'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis dze ta'i tshal shing thags kyis bskor ba dang / khyim bdag dag gis bdag bcag cing
bcag cing khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bkur shig /ces sgos shig /de dag gis bsgos pa dang / shing dang / rtswa yang bor te dong ngo / /de dag chud zos nas bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyad du mi rung ba dag ni/ tshang mang du skyol cig /lhag ma dag ni/ las gsar du byed pa la phul cig /drug sde dag gis las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing
dag gshegs nas mer bus te btso blag gi las byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ las gsar du byar rung ba'i shing dag ni/ ma 'bud cig /bus na/ 'das pa
dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// //mdor na/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi rgyan dang / /'dug pa bslang bar mi bya dang / /
snod spyad lag na thogs pa dang / /lam yang phyi bar bya ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim
bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na/ bdag gis dze ta'i tshal yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim
bdag /ngas gnang gis phul cig /des shing gang pho'i ming du bya ba la ni/ pho'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ gang mo'i ming du bya ba ni/ mo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / dge
slong dag gis ji ltar bya bar mi shes nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag nyid la dris shig /
de dag gis khyim bdag nyid la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ji ltar bsngos pa de bzhin du mdzod cig /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang shing pho'i ming du bya ba dang / gang shing mo'i ming bya ba rnams kyi rgyan so sor bsdus la thum por byos te zhog cig /nam dus ston gyi tshe yang de
bzhin du brgyan par gyis shig /rtsig pa'i ni/ ri mo'i yo byad du byos shig /bsro khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gi ni/ las gsar du byos shig /de'i sa'i ni/ dge 'dun gyi snang mar
byos shig /nad pa'i sman khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i de dag ni/ las gsar du byos shig /des sa'i ni/ sman gyi yo byad byos shig /tshang mang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i ni/ de dag las
gsar du byos shig /de'i sa'i ni/ dge 'dun gyi bshos su gyis shig /chu khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i ni/ de'i las gsar du byos shig /de'i sa'i ni/ skom du brims shig /dugs
khang gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba'i ni/ de'i las gsar du gyis shig /de'i sa'i ni/ dugs khang du gyis shig /bkad sa'i khang ba'i rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gi ni/ las gsar du gyis shig /de'i
sa'i ni/ snum pa'i zong gyis shig /khyams dang / stegs bu dang / 'chags dang / sgo khang dang / yang thog gi rtsig pa dang / ka ba dag gi ni/ las gsar du gyis shig /de'i sa'i ni/ dge
'dun spyi bor bgos shig /gang rdzing bu'i bde ni/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dag spyir zhog cig /dge slong spang ba'i khang bu'i nang na 'dug cing dge ba'i phyogs spyod pa dang / drug sde
dag der 'ongs nas nged rgan no/ /zhes zer nas de dag bslangs te btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgan rim mo/ /zhes dge slong gis dge slong 'khod pa la ma gsung zhig /bslang
na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag bya ba byas nas stan las langs te 'chag cing 'dug bzhin du gzhan gyis stan blangs na/ ma ster nas dge slong dag brel bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur
pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bya ba byas nas stan las langs nas stan ma 'dzin cig /dge slong dag ring zhig tu stan la 'dug
nas langs te 'chag pa dang / de'i sar drug sde dag 'dug nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der ma 'dug cig /
langs te 'chag tu 'gro na yang de'i steng du chos gos sam bus khyud cig zhog la chongs shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag snod rnams thogs

bzhin du btsug \ GTZUG\ lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / de nas dge slong zhig gis thogs bzhin du phyag byas pa dang / de'i ril ba chag par gyur to/ /gzhan zhig gis kyang khang bzang gi ka pa la lha ma brdabs
pa dang / dge slong dag 'phya bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i mtshungs
par spyad pa'i chos bca'o/ /dge slong lam du 'jug pas chu mthong na/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos phog ste phyogs gcig tu zhog la/ de nas gos dag kyang sprugs te khrus byos la/ de nas
rkang pa dang lag pa khrus la chu yang chu tshags kyis btsogs te ras gsher bas lham phyis la/ de'i 'og tu lag pa bsnyal nas bla 'og gi bgo ba legs par gyon la spyod lam zhi bzhin du
gtsug lag khang du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de las gzhan du na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// //mdor na/ spu

gri brdar dang sen mo bcad/ /smad tsher rkang pa'i rten dang ni/ /bshad par bya ba dang gcig ba'i gnas/ /bya ba byas pa mi bcang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i snod chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi spu gri khyer te bya ba byas
kyang spu gri blangs na/ da dung bya ba yod ces zer nas spu gri mi ster ro/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spu gri bya ba byas
nas ma 'chang zhig /'chang na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /spu gri ji lta ba bzhin du brdar dang / sen mo gcad pa dang / smang tsher dang / rkang pa rten pa rnams so/ /drug sde dag gis gci pa'i
gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas kyang / da dung yang slar 'jug go /zhes smras nas dge slong lhags pa rnams 'jug tu mi ster ro/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gci ba'i gnas su zhugs te bya ba byas nas dge slong dag ma bgags shig /bgags na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bshang pa'i sar
yang de bzhin no/ /rkyang ba'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ g.yog dang dus ston chen po dang / /rnyog pa can gyi chu dang ni/ /phye las rdzis dang skyo ma dang / /
sde re ba sdus de bzhin bsgrags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
bcom ldan 'das kyis de ste gnang na/ bdag gis sen mo dang / dbu skra'i mchod rten la dus ston chen po bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ de ltar na/ gnang gi/ gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten la dus ston gsol cig /ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag dus ston chen po'i tshe 'dus

nas de dag rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bzed rnams bkrus pa dang / gtsug lag khang du gnas pa dang / dge bsnyen dag gis kyang mar dang / 'bru mar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi'i bum pa rnams kyang rdzing bur
bkrus pas na/ lhung bzed rnams dang / bum pa de rnams kyi snum dag gis chu'i steng du zhag chags par gyur te/ de la dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas chu mi 'thung ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong
dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyi/ dkrugs la 'thungs shig /de la the tshom ma byed cig /chu de
kho ra khor yug tu skye bo mang po dag gis dkrugs pas na/ thams cad kyang rnyog pas gang ste/ gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang mi snang bar gyur/ chu tshags kyang rnyog pas 'gags nas chu
mi zag pa dang / de dag la gnod par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na gdong gi gzugs
brnyan mi snang ba der lhung bzed chung ngu'am/ snod gzhan gyis chus la shing tog ka ta ka'i 'bras bu chug ste skad cig sdod la rtogs shig dang / nges par gdong gi gzugs brnyan yang snang bar 'gyur
ro/ /de lta bu med na zan gyi chang bu chug cig /de snum med pas zhig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phye mar gyis la der chug cig /chu ba tshwa can du gyur nas dge slong dag the
tshom skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste des lan tshwa'i bya ba byed nus na/ byin len byos la 'thungs shig /de ste bya ba byed mi nus na/ chus la 'thungs shig /de la the
tshom du ma byed cig /rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcas pa dgu pa'o// //mdor na/ chu dang zho las chur gyur dang / /bum pa bung pa de bzhin te/ /lag pa bsnyal nas btung ba dang //
dge tshul pha la'ang rnam bzhir bya/ /lhung bzed dang ni gdong bkru dang / /bsod snyoms pa la rnam pa gnyis/ /rgyags dang 'bras bu me tog dag /phongs na rung gi bza' bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag khron pa'i nang nas chu bcus te de dag gis bcags te/ 'bras chan brul ma dang / khur
ba'i dum bu dag byung ngo / /de dag the tshom skyes nas chag pa dang / dum bu dag kyang 'khrug par gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyi/ phyung ste bor la tshogs shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /dge slong dag rdzing nas chu 'chu ba dang / der chu'i bum
pa dang / sbrang rtsi'i bum pa dag bkrus pa dang / dge slong dag gis kyang lhung bzed snum can dag der bkrus so/ /de dag gis snum gyis chu'i steng zhag chags par gyur/ zho'i dum bu dag
kyang snang bar gyur nas dge slong dag the tshom skyes te ma bcus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kha zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus kyi/ chus shig /phyi dro mi 'thungs nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thungs shig /bum pa dang / ril ba dag gi nang du mi ldugs te bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang lugs shig /dge slong dag cig
lam du zhugs te dong ba dang / de na chu med de khyim bdag gi snod nas chu 'gron pa mang po la byin pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma 'thungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste
gzhan med na/ rtogs la 'thungs shig /de dag bum pa dang ril pa'i nang du mi ldugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang lugs shig /phyi dro mi 'thungs pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thungs shig /lam na rdo chu sgrom yod pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes te chu ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ dge slong rnams rngo chu sgrom ni/ bkru bkru ba yin gyi/ rtogs la 'thungs shig /ril ba dang / bum pa dag tu mi ldugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ der yang
lugs shig /phyi dro mi 'thungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'thungs shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /de bzhin du shing sgrom dang / rkyal ba'i nang na 'dug pa yang
rtogs la 'thungs shig /phyi dro dang / ril ba dang / bum pa'i nang du'ang lugs shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /dge slong dag gis dge 'dun la chu brims pa dang / de na dge slong dag gis
tshe dang ldan pa/ chu rgyun lhung bzed kyi nang nas ma chad pas na/ bzhag par gyur to/ /zhes smras te/ de dag gis ma blangs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khu ba thams cad kyi rgyun ni thur du 'bab kyi/ steng du mi 'gyur gyi/ 'thungs la de la the tshom du ma byed cig /de bzhin du 'o ma dang / zho dang /

zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang / rtsab mo dang / tshwa la sogs pa la rgyas par brjod do/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa las/ ba lang gi lhas su phyin pa
dang / de dag la de na chu med de/ de dag gis zho'i chu byin pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas mi 'khru'o/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang na chu med pa der zho'i chu dang / dar ba dang bas khrus shig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /dge slong dag gis ba lang rdzi
la bum pa brnyas pa dang / de dag gis mar gyi bum pa dang / 'o ma'i bum pa dag rnyed na/ de dag the tshom skyes nas ma blangs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das
la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum pa la rnam pa lnga ste/ bshang ba'i bum pa dang / gci ba'i bum pa dang / chang gi bum pa dang /
'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa'o/ /de la snga ma gsum po ni/ ma bzhag pa yang ma gzhag cig /bzhag na ni/ rgyang ring por 'or cig /'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar
gyi bum pa ni/ me'i nang du bsregs la de nas lci ba'i ri lu'am/ ba lang gi lci bas rung bar gyis la/ chu bcus te de snga dro dang / phyi dro yang spyod cig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig/
gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong gzhan zhig gis bum pa'i nang nas chu 'thungs pa dang / bung bas zos so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bum pa nas chu ma 'thungs shig /'thungs na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /sngar lag pa snyol
la kha bkrus te gdod/ chu 'thungs shig /bum pa'i kha gab med par ma gzhag cig /de bas na/ ngas gnang gi /bum pa'i kha gab chongs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bum pa'i kha gab chongs
shig /ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong dag gis kha gab ji lta bu bcang bar mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing las byas pa'am/ rdo las byas pa'am/ sa las byas
pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa snyol la chu 'thungs shig /ces bka' stsal na/ lam du zhugs pa dag cig la chu nyung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dab
ma rang lhags pa tshol la de'i nang nas 'thungs shig /de'ang med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bag yod bzhin du shing la chags pa las 'thungs shig /de'ang
med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dben par 'dug la bum pa nyid nas chu 'thungs shig /gzhan gyis ma mthong ba dang mdzes par gyis shig /dge slong dag /ngas
phongs pa na gnang ba de/ ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig /spyad na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod dong pa las de
dag gis rgyags dge tshul pha dag la bskur ba dang / de dag ma theg nas de dag gis theg pa la skur cig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma bteg go /de ltar gyur pa dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ the gcig /dge tshul pha dag ngal nas phog ste slongs zhes smras pa dang /
dge slong dag gis ma phog nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pho gcig /dge tshul phas ma bzung bzhin
gdeg pa dang / dbab pa dag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul phas ma bzung bar gdeg pa dang / dbab par ma byed cig /dge tshul pha dag gis bdag cag chad de
ngal bso'i khyed kyis cung zhig khyer cig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma khyer ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tha gus bcings la/ tha gu'i rtse mo dge tshul phas
bzung ste phyi bzhin du 'brang du chug la dge slong gis khyer cig /dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas de la mi za ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig/
dge slong 'gron pa mang po dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te lam du zhugs pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag rkun pos bcom pa dang / dge tshul gyis rgyags rnams bor nas bros te dong ngo / /dge
slong dag gis rgyags khyer nas de nyid na bor zhing 'dug pa dang / 'gron pa mang po dag gis 'phags pa/ khyed kyi rgyags ni/ rkun pos ma khyer ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis
dge tshul pha dag la dengs la rgyags longs te shog cig /ces smras pa dang / de dag skrag nas 'dong du ma btub ste/ khyed nyid ci'i phyir mi 'dong / nged cag rkun pos gsad mod ces smras pa dang /
de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ longs la gzod dge tshul pha la byin cig /dge slong dag gis the tshom skyes
nas de dag ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig /klung brgal bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul pha
dag la khyed nyid kyis khyer te brgal bar nus sam zhes dris la/ de ste nus zhes zer na/ legs/ de ste mi nus so/ /zhes zer na/ rgyags bdag cag gis khyer la rgol cig /de la dge slong dag
gis rgyags dag pha rol tu bsgral bar bya na/ dge tshul phas bsgral bar gyis la brtag par gyis shig /de ste dge tshul pha yang mi nus na/ dge slong dag gis rgyags pha rol tu sgrol la de'i
'og tu dge tshul pha yang bsgral bar gyis shig /de ste gnyi ga nus na/ dge tshul pha dang rgyags lhan cig tu bsgral bar gyis shig /gnyis ka lhan cig tu bsgral ba dge slong rnams the tshom
skyes nas ma zos so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par bza' bar gyis shig/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag lhung bzed du zo zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus nas mthe bos brdabs na/ sgra mi
gsang nas dge slong de la the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgyu med par lan gsum du bkru bas khrus la mthe bos brdabs na sgra gsang bar byung na/ de la the tshom
du ma byed par zo zhig /dge slong gzhan zhig gis lhung bzed bkrus te de bu gu nas zas kyi tshigs ma zhig mthong ba dang / de the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la
shing bus brud de lan gsum gyi bar du khrus la de la the tshom du ma byed cig /dge slong gzhan zhig gis yang lhung bzed gas pa zhig gi nang du khu ba dron po zhig gi blangs pa dang / de'i 'phro nas
snum byung ste zhag steng du byung ba dang / dge slong de the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng gi zhag zhoms la btung bar gyis shig /dge slong zhig rlung nad kyis btab
nas des phyi dro khu ba zhig 'thungs te/ nub kar lhung bzed de'i nang du skom btung zhes byas pa dang / lhung bzed kyi nang du snum langs nas de'i steng du zhag chags pa dang / dge slong de the tshom
skyes nas skom yang ma 'thungs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa dang kha bkrus nas snum
zhoms te 'or te de la the tshom du ma byed par 'thungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis kha khrus shig /ces bka' stsal na/ dge slong dag kha cig bkru ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
lci ba'am/ sa'am/ shing gi shun phrags la sogs pa gzhan gyis so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ji tsam gyis na/ kha bkrus pa zhes bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kha dang rma gnyis mtshungs te rtag tu zug pas ma 'bags par mi nus mod kyi/ lan gsum du kha bkrus te chu bor ba ni/ kha bkrus pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong zhig
gis bsod snyoms bslangs te gnas khang du bzhag nas phyi rol tu byung ba dang / khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis de'i steng du zas shig blugs te bzhag pa dang / ji tsam bsod snyoms pa der slar
'ongs nas bsod snyoms kyi steng na zas gzhan zhig blugs par mthong ste/ de the tshom skyes nas zan ma zos so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste byin len byed pa yod na/ byin len byos la zo zhig /de ste med na/ steng gi gsar pa de logs shig tu 'or la de la the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig/ dge slong gzhan

zhig gis bsod snyoms blangs nas gnas khang du bzhag ste phyi rol tu song ba dang / de khyim pa zhig gis reg par mthong ste/ dge slong de the tshom skyes nas ma zos so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de la ci'i phyir reg ces dris la/ des rtswa dang / sbrang ma dag bsal pa'i phyir
reg ces zer na/ byin len byos la zo zhig /de ste 'dod pa'i phyir reg go /zhes zer na/ de'ang phye mar bgos la byin len byos te/ de la the tshom du ma byed pa ra zi zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong dag rgyags khyer cig ces bka' stsal na/ khyim pa dang / dge tshul pha dag med nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa'i bdag po spro ba skyed cig sbyin bdag kyang med na/ bdag nyid kyis slar khyer la de khyim pa dang brjes la zo zhig /de ste de la med na/ skal pa gnyis su chod la khyim pa la

byin te| des khyer na ni/ de'i skal ba slar bslangs te byin len byos la zo zhig/ bdag gi skal ba ni/ de la byin cig/ de ste de ltar yang ma 'byor na/ nyi ma dang po'i tshe ni/ snyung bar 'dug cig /phyi de

nyid kyang byin len byed pa med na/ stag gi sbar thabs shig zo zhig /yang phyi de nyin mo yang byin len byed pa med na/ stag gi spar thabs gnyis zo zhig/ de ste zhag bzhi'i nyin mo yang byin len byed pa

med na/ ji tsam 'grangs pa'i bar du zo zhig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /de ste rgyags med na/ 'bras bu rang lhung ba de la longs la gdugs tshod la bab kyi bar du khyer te song la/ de ste khyim pa

dang phrad na/ skal ba gnyis su chod la gcig ni/ de la byin te/ de'i skal ba slar bdag gis slongs la rung bar byos te zo zhig /bdag gi de byin cig /de ste ma phrad na/ snga dro'am/ phyi dro yang rung / rung bar bya ba'i

phyir rgyu med na/ srog dang 'bral bas the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig/ de ste yang lhung ba med na/ shing la 'dzegs te thogs shig /yang na sprugs la byang phyogs kyi dus su bsngos te zo zhig /de bzhin

du rtsa ba la sogs pa 'ang sa las rang gis brkos te phyung la the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig /ngas khyod la phongs pa'i tshe gnang ba de/ ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig /spyad na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur
ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo gsum pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu ste/ sgo gsum pa rdzogs so// //mdor bsdus pa ste/ sa bon bum pa rkun po rku ba dang / /lus kyi reg pa de bzhin te/ /'bras chan

lan tshwa song ba dang / /bu ram shing dang rkun 'brum dang / /glo bur 'ongs dang gnas pa'o/ /mdor na/ sa bon bum pa shing rta gru/ /khur dang 'o ma tshong de bzhin/ /bya rog sbrang ma btso blag las/ /u pa
li bzhi chog kun shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka land ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bum pa stong gi sa bon btab pa phul ba de'i

tshe dge slong dag gis de'i thog zes nas zhing kun tha bar bor te rtswa ku sha'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi rol tu byung bas de dag mthong nas des blon po la/ kye sus 'di
ltar zhing kun tha bar bor nas ku sha'i gnas su gyur ces smras pa dang / des lhas 'phags pa dag la bum pa stong gi sa bon gyis btab pa phul ba de dag gis legs par
blangs pa de dag gzigs mod ces smras pa dang / rgyal pos ci/ 'phags pa de dag gis thun shas su'ang ma btang ngam zhes de dag gis dge slong dag la smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi zhing dag ni/ thun shas su thongs shig /dge slong dag gis thun shas su
byin no/ /zhing pas zhing gshin pa'i rnams na thams cad bdag cag khyer yang de dag gis de dag gi skal pa ma blangs pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhing shas kyi skal pa longs shig/ dge slong dag gis blangs te de nyid du bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skal pa gtsug
lag khang du skyos shig /ces gsungs pa dang / sngar zhing pa nyid kyis der bskyas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon du zhing bdag gis der skyos shig /de dag skyed pa na
yang brkus so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srung ba'i dge slong rnams skos shig/ shing rta'i nang du skyed
pa las shing rta chag kyang dge slong gis grogs ma byas pa dang / khyim bdag mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di ni/ khyed kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan
'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shing rta las phyugs 'debs pa'i sa ma rtogs par

der bskya ba dang zhing pa'i grogs kyis shig /dge slong gzhan zhig na bar gyur nas shing rta pa dag gis shing rta'i steng du zhon cig/ ces smras pa dang / de the tshom skyes te ma zhon nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ na na shing rta la zhon cig /de la the tshom du ma byed cig /gru'i nang du thun shas kyi skal pa skyed pa las gru'ang chag par gyur nas dge slong dag gis grogs ma byas pa dang /
khyim bdag mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'di ni/ khyed kyi na/ khyed kyis ci'i phyir grogs mi bya/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gru'i dang / ma gtogs par phul ba'i grogs dang / zhing pa'i grogs gyis shig /dge slong gzhan zhig yang klung
gi 'gram nas song ba las na bar gyur nas mnyan pas/ 'phags pa/ 'di'i nang du zhugs zhes smras pa dang / de the tshom skyes nas nang du ma zhugs so/ /de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis bcom
ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dong ma gtogs par nang du zhugs la de la the tshom du ma byed cig /gzhan yang khur gyis
bskyas pa las de chad par gyur nas des 'phags pa/ 'di mar phog cig /ces smras pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma phog go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phog
cig /dge slong dag gis phab nas slar ma bteg pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar dbog pa de bzhin du thog cig /lha khang gi sgor bor te dong ba dang / ma byin par len
pa dag gis brkus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang du skyos shig /dge slong dag gis sus nang du bskya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim pas
so/ /khyim pa med na/ dge tshul phas so/ /dge tshul pha'ang med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag cag nyid kyis nang du skyos shig/ dge slong dag gis nang du bskyas na/
bdag cag gis bskyas pa yin no/ /snyam nas ma zos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom
ma byed par zo zhig/ dge 'dun gyis zangs kyi nang du me cher 'bar bas 'o ma la sogs pa ni/ khol rung bar byed pa ni/ sgor song nas bo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
phyi rol tu ma 'gro zhig /de rkyen zhig byung nas phyi rol tu song na/ mgal ba dag phyir drongs shig /'on kyang de bzhin du lud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma dag ma dag phyir dbyung
bar gyis shig/ mdag ma phyir phyung yang lud pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos kyi tha mas g.yobs shig/ 'on kyang lud par gyur na/ bdag nyid kyis gzar bu longs la
dkrug par gyis shig/ dge slong dag/ ngas phongs pa la gnang ba de/ ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig /spyad na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sman dag kyang dge tshul pha'am/ lha

khang na gnas pas dkrug par gyis shig /de'ang phyi rol tu song na/ de'i thabs snga ma bzhin no/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ tshong pa mang po dag cig gis sangs rgyas dang / dge slong gi dge
'dun la sogs pa bshos la spyan drangs so/ /de dag gis bshos sbyar te dro sar bskyas nas ma drangs kyi bar du tshong khang du me shor te de dag me gsod du song ba dang / gdugs tshod yol la thug nas
dge slong dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i sems kyis yongs su btang bas na/ dge slong dag de la the tshom ma byed par bza'
bar bya'o/ /zos nas byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi dus su byin gyis rlobs shig /dge 'dun gyi dro sar bya rog mchus zas la reg pa dang / dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas zan ma zos so/ /de ltar gyur pa
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mchu'i than kor 'or la/ de la the tshom ma byed par zo zhig /dge slong
dag gi lhung bzed kyi nang du bya rog dag gis reg nas de dag kha zas ma zos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i mchu'i than kor dag 'or la/ the tshom ma byed par bza' bar

gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa nam gru ni/ ci la'ang the tshom za ste/ nam gru the tshom can/ nam gru the tshom can zhes ming du gyur to/ /de bshang sar 'ongs pa dang sbrang ma zhig mthong ngo / /phyis yang
de dang 'dra ba zhig bskos na zas kyi steng na 'dug pa mthong ba dang / des tshe dang ldan pa dag /bshang sa na mthong ba'i sbrang ma des 'dir 'ongs te kha zas la 'bags te ma rung bar byas so/ /zhes
smras pa dang / de thos pa dang / dge slong mang zhig gis zas ma zos par gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ dge slong rnams/ sbrang ma ni/ mthon dman kun tu rgyu ste/ des gang du reg pa de 'or la/ de la the tshom ma byed par zo zhig /dge slong dag tshon rtsi'i las byed pa na/ de dag gi sems
'khrul pas tshon rtsi'i bum pa yin no/ /snyam nas des dge 'dun gyi 'bru mar gyi bum pa dang / mar gyi bum pa dag steng du bteg ste khyer ba dang / de na gang gi tshe ngo shes pa de'i tshe na 'greng
bzhin du bor nas chag pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thang ma skas la 'dzeg pa las cung zad tsam zhig ni/
'dzeg/ mang du lus na/ slar bobs la gnas gar bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog cig/ thang ma skas la mang du 'dzeg pa thung du 'dzeg dgos na/ steng du 'dzeg la gnas bde bar ma 'gyel bar zhog
cig /dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas ma zos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de la the tshom du ma byed par zo
zhig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bzhag pa rnam pa du 'tshal du rung / u pa li/ rnam pa gnyis kyis te/ ngo tsha med cing bslab pa la mi mos pa
dang / gang la ngo tsha yod kyang dran pa nyams pa ste/ de gnyis kyis bzhag pa rung gi/ gnyis ka zo zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can la

sbyin pa byin na ni/ rnam par smin pa brgyar re bar bya'o/ /tshul khrims ngan pas zin pa'i mi la sbyin pa byin na ni/ rnam par smin pa stong du re bar bya'o/ /tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag

la sbyin pa byin na ni/ rnam par smin pa brgya phrag stong du re bar bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi drang srong 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dag la sbyin pa byin na ni/ rnam par smin pa sa ya phrag brgya stong du re
bar bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la ni/ tshad med do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa la ni/ de bas kyang tshad med do/ /lan gcig phyir
'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/ /lan gcig phyir ldog par rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byed
bar zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/ /phyir 'ong ba'i rgyun du zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/ /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byed par zhugs pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/ /
dgra bcom pa la de bas kyang tshad med do/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lta smos kyang ci dgos bram ze dang / khyim

bdag dad pa dag gis dge slong dag mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du dong ba la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bskur ba dang / dge slong dag rnam pa de lta bu'i rkyen byung nas de dag gis gang
du bskur bar bskur ma nus so/ /de dag gi nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni/ gzhan du bsngos la gzhan du dbul bar ma byed cig/
ces 'byung / kha cig gis yang smras pa/ de la gzhan byar ci yod/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ rnam pa bzhi la ni/ nges par dbul dgos te/ byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang / lha'i yul nas gshegs pa'o/ 'di dag las
bsngos na/ gzhan du bsngo bar ma byed cig /de las gzhan la bsngos pa'i rkyen rnam pa de lta bus na/ gzhan dag tu bsngor rung gi/ de la the tshom du ma byed cig /dge slong rnams/ ngas phongs
pa'i tshe gnang ba de bzhin du ma phongs pa'i tshe ma spyod cig /spyod na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge
slong gnyis shig 'khrugs par gyur/ rtsod par gyur/ 'thab par gyur pa de la gang med par gzung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /gnyis ka tshul
khrims dang ldan na/ gang mang du thos pa'o/ /gnyis ka mang du thos na/ gang chog shes pa'o/ /gnyi ga chog shes na/ gang cher chog shes pa'o/ /gnyi ga cher chog shes na /u pa li/ gnyi
ga cher chog shes pa las cher chog pa med mi srid do/ /gnas med de/ de gnyis lta bu la ni/ 'khrug pa'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'thab par gyur pa 'byung ba'i gnas ma yin no/ /rkyang pa'i sgo'i mdo
bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang po'o/ /'dul ba gzhung dam pa/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/ mdor na/ rkun gnas dang ni za ma dang / /sngar 'khrugs pa la rnam pa bzhi/ /
bslab pa byin pa tshul shing brims/ /de dag dge 'dun dbyen mi 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med pas sbyin gyi kun dga'
ra ba na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshul shing 'brim pa rku gnas kyis tshul shing brims na/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen du mi 'gyur
ram| u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ ma ning dang / za ma dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / pha bsad pa dang / ma bsad pa dang / dgra bcom pa bsad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang / mu stegs can dang / mu stegs can du song ba dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dag gis tshul shing brims na/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen du
'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ sngar 'khrugs pa bzhis tshul shing brims na/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa/ bslab pa byin pas
tshul shing brims na/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen du 'gyur ram/ u pa li/ mi 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'o// //mdor na/ lus la reg
dang rdul gzan dang / /char pa 'bab par bcad mi bya/ /tshang mang dang ni bshang gci'i sa/ /ma rung nas ni mi dor ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon
med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag kyang lus la reg par bgos/ rkang pa nas mgo'i bar du thang chad par bgos pa dang / de ltar gyur pa
dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi mal stan lus la reg par ma bgo zhig /bgos na/ 'das pa dang
bcas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi mal stan lus la reg par ma bgo zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgo ba mi shes nas de ltar
gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zag gis rdul gzan gyi steng du shes bzhin du dal nas khad kyis bgo bar gyis shig /
drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyis gos bgos nas dbyar char gyi nang na bla gab med par 'dug go/ de char gyis ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon nas dbyar char gyi nang na bla gab med par ma 'dug cig /'dug na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur
ro/ /drug sde dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos bgos nas tshang mang du song ba dang / de dud pas ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi gos gyon nas tshang mang du 'gro bar ma byed cig /song na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /drug sde dag gis
dge 'dun gyi mal stan dag bgos nas bshang gci'i sar song ba dang / bshang gci'i zer ma dag gis phog nas ma rung bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge 'dun gyi mal stan gyon nas bshang gci'i sar ma 'gro zhig /song na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/
mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams dge 'dun gyi mal stan rdol ba dang / ral pa rnams gar bab bab tu 'dor te/ de de dag mi spyod pa dang / de nyid ma rung bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge
slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi mal stan cung zad rdol tam ral na/ ma dor bar rdol na ni/ lhan pas glon cig /
ral na ni/ slar drubs shig /de'i nang na rnying pa dag ni/ khol phyung la gsar pas glon cig /de rnying pa las rung ba yod na/ me mar gyi snying por gyis shig /der yang mi rung na/ ba lang gi
lci ba'am/ sa dang bsres la ka ba'i ser ka'am/ rtsig pa'i ser ka dag gi zhal zhal du gyis shig dang / sbyin par byed pa dang / yon bdag gis yun ring du spyad par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i
sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum pa'o// //mdor na/ kha zas de ste me mar dang / /byug par bya dang lham rnams dang / /gos dang gdugs dang shing dag dang / /rtsa ba sman rnams
tha ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug ste/ des yo byad thams

cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ 'khor mang po'i dge slong dag cig la phul lo/ /de 'khor drug cu dang der dbyar tshul du zhugs so/ /tshul de nas byung nas lhan cig spyod pa dang nye gnas dag

ljongs dang / phyogs gang dang gang na 'khod 'khod pa de dang de dag nas de'i rkang pa la phyag bya bar lhags nas de dag gis de'i rkang pa la phyag byas te dong ba dang / des tshe dang ldan pa rnams/ nga khyim bdag
'di zhes bya bas mgron du bos kyi/ khyed 'di nyid du 'khod cig/ ces smras pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po/ mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ 'o na 'khod de zan zos la dengs shig /de dag gis
smras pa| zas dang / yo byad khyer te mchis la de nyid bdag cag 'tshal lo/ /des/ 'o na legs kyi/ de bzhin du gyis shig /ces smras pa dang / zas dang / yo byad dag khyer te dong ngo / /de bzhin du kha
cig gis me mar gyi mar/ kha cig gis ni/ rkang pa byug pa/ kha cig gis ni/ lham dag /kha cig gis ni/ gos dag /kha cig gis ni/ gdugs dag/ kha cig gis ni/ shing dag /kha cig
gis ni/ rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams khyer te dong ba dang / ring po ma lon par gtsug lag khang de yo byad kyis brel bar gyur nas

dge slong de khyim bdag ga na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / khyim bdag/ khyod kyis yo byad dag ni/ zad do/ /zhes smras pa dang / 'phags pa/ de na dge slong dag nyung la yo byad mang du phul na/ ci'i phyir
myur du bas zhes smras pa dang / de dag gis rgyas par smras pa nas des 'phags pa/ bdag gis ni/ de na bzhugs pa rnams kyi phyir phul na/ de dag gzhan du gnas la ci'i phyir gzhan du spyod
ces nyes pa ngor brjod do/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /yon bdag de 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de
bas na/ dge slong dag gis gzhan du gnas shing gzhan gyis 'khyer bar ma spyod cig /dge slong dag gzhan du gnas la gzhan gyis spyad na/ de dag ji tsam spyad pa thams cad rin thang bzhin du
phob cig /rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa'o// //mdor na/ mtshan ma dang yang mngon mtshan dang / par tang dag dang ri mo can/ /khri'u rkang pa ri mo can/ /
ral tshem bya ba dbyar mo khang / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /mnyan du yod pa na mi spun gnyis shig

rab tu byung ste/ de las gcig ni/ zhal ta ba'i gnas khang na 'dug go/ gcig ni/ dze ta'i tshal na'o/ /ji tsam na zhal ta pa de don zhig gi phyir ri brag gi grong du song ngo / /dge slong de phu nu bo blta ba'i phyir

bgo ba de bgos nas de'i thad du song ngo / /des dge 'dun gyi bgo ba'i nang du gang zag gi bgo ba de bzhag nas gtam 'dzer cing 'khod do/ /de nas nor te dge 'dun gyi bgo ba zhig gyon te song ngo / /de nas

zhal ta pa de slar 'ongs nas de na bgo ba chung ngu zhig mthong ste/ des tshe dang ldan pa ci/ dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa grub bam zhes smras pa dang / des smras pa/ dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa cang med do/ /bgo ba 'di
su'i/ 'di dag ni/ dge 'dun gyi'o/ /des smras pa/ nged cag gi ni tshe/ 'di ni/ chung na/ 'dir su'ang bgo ba gyon te ma 'ongs sam/ 'dir bdag gi phu nu bo zhig 'ongs so/ /song la dris shig /de
song nas dris te/ des bltas na/ dge 'dun gyi yin nas des smras pa/ bdag gis nor te/ dge 'dun gyi ni/ bdag gis khyer/ bdag gi ni/ de na 'dug pa'i rigs so/ /des khyer te 'ongs so/ /
de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi mtshan ma thob cig /dge slong dag gis ji ltar mtshan ma gdab pa mi shes
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di zhes bya bas phul ba'o/ /zhes yi ger bris shig /dge slong dag gis dge 'dun gyi dang / gang zag gi gnyi ga de bzhin du bris so/ /de ltar gyur
pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zag gi ni/ mngon mtshan thob cig/ gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na
ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi'am/ gang dag gi yang rung ste/ ri mo can ni/ gding ba med kyi bar du ma spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gang zag gi par tang stan
med pa la zhugs pa dang / de'i nang nas kha cig gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ ri mo can rnyed pa ni/ gnang gi/ bdag nyid kyis bya bar ni/ ma yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gzhan
zhig gis yang byas pa'i dngos po spongs shig ces smras pa dang / de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bas na/
dge 'dun gyi ni/ par tang ri mo can rnyed dam/ byas na yang rung ngo / /gang zag gi ni/ gzhan gyis byin na/ yon bdag nyid la bsngos na/ 'chang bar gnang gi/ rang byed du ni/ mi gnang ngo /
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun la ni/ par tang ri mo can rnyed pa'am/ byas pa'ang 'chang du gnang gi/ gang zag la ni/ gzhan gyis byin pa de nyid la bsngos na/ 'chang du gnang ngo / /ces
bka' stsal nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis khri'u rkang pa ri mo can zhig bdag gis ni/ ma byas/ gzhan gyis byin pa 'chang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ngas ri mo can ni/ /dgongs te gsungs kyi/ khri'u rkang pa ri mo ca la ma yin gyi/ de bas na/ dge 'dun gyis khri'u rkang pa ri mo can rnyed dam/ byas

kyang rung gnang gi/ gang zag la ni/ rjes su mi gnang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dbyar tshul nas byung nas ljongs rgyu ba spyod cig ces gsungs pa dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs pa dang / khang
pa'i ral tshem dag ma byas par dong nas de dag gis ral tshem ma byas pas ma rung bar gyur to/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| dge slong ma dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ ral tshom ma byas na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa'o// //mdor na/ song
nas slar 'ong sbyin pa med/ /byin nas phyir yang 'ongs par 'gyur/ /dge 'dun gyis kyang sbyin par bya/ /gang las skyid par gyur pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal
mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /khyim pa zhig gi gnyen zhig dus 'das te mchod pa'i phyir rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis drangs nas dur khrod du bskyal te slar khyer te
'ongs nas dge 'dun la phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song nas slar
'ongs pa zhes byos la longs shig /kha cig ni/ dbul te phul ba de slar yang brnyas pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma ster to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
ste slar slong na/ byin cig /de brnyas nas de slar 'gyod pa skyes nas mi des slar yang phul ba dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de nas slar yang 'ongs so/ /zhes byos te longs shig /de la the tshom dang / khro bar ma byed cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ zhal ta byed
pa'i dge slong zhig gis/ dge 'dun gyi phyir khyim pa zhig las nor zhig bskyis pa dang / de dus 'das so/ /de dus 'das so/ /zhes thos nas de gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas dris pa/ dge slong ming
'di zhes bgyi ba zhig ga re zhes smras pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ de dus las 'das so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi nor zhig bskyis so/ /dge slong dag gis smras pa/ song la
de nyid la dos shig /de dge 'dun gyi phyir khyer gyi/ pha ma dang / bdag gi phyir ma lags kyi/ khyed kyis stsol cig /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste dge 'dun gyi phyir des khyer bar shes na/ dge 'dun gyis skyin pa byin cig /dge slong rnams/ ngas las gsar du byed pa'i mtshungs pa'i dge slong
gi chos bca'o/ /las gsar du byed pa'i dge slong gis bskyi ba dag rgan zhing rgan pa dag la dris la longs shig /las gsar du byed pa rnams kyis mtshungs par spyad pa'i chos bcas pa bzhin du ma byas
na| 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa drug pa'o// //mdor na/ bu ram shing dang dge slong rnams/ /za zhing bgo ba can gdags pa/ /
mi bgo ba dang bzhi pa dang / /skar ma bstan par mi bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag gis bca'
ba bu ram shing zhig rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul pha dag la ni/ sum cha byin cig ces bka' stsal nas/ de dag la bu ram shing gi sum cha re re byin no/ /dge slong dag rim du 'khod nas

gral nyis rim du gyur pas slar yang rgan rim gyi thog tu 'ongs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ de bu ram shing gi dum bu za zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du
mig lta zhing 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin/ khyod bu ram shing 'dod dam/ /des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyi sku skal las bcad de dum bu zhig de la byin nas dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bu ram shing gi bya ba byas te gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la phyag bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'ongs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin/ bu ram shing gi
bza' bas tshim par gyur tam/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi rnyed pa ni/ sum cha gcig stsol cig /ces bka' stsal pas ga la tshim mod kyi/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa des na/ gdod tshim par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dag bsdus nas dge slong dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ngas gos kyi thob
pa ni/ dge tshul pha dag sum cha gcig byin cig ces byas kyi/ kha zas kyi thob pa dag ni/ mtshungs par bgos shig /chung du na shing bu la sa'i lo ma tsam yang mnyam par bgos shig /
de las che chung du bgos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gnas pa de dus dus su dze ta'i tshal du 'gro ba las/ dge
slong zhig gis de la nor las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po bdun rgya cher snyan par bshad pa dang / de dad pa skyes nas gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/ der dge slong gang dag gnas pa
de dag kha zas 'phral 'phral du 'byor bar byed pa las/ des de dag gis kha zas kyi rgyur kaR+sha pa Na dag cig byin pa las de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag cag bsod snyoms la 'gro
bas chos gas kyis brel gyi/ zas kyis ni/ ma yin gyi/ kaR+sha pa Na ni/ chos gos kyi phyir bgo'o/ /dge slong bdag cag las su yang khyim bdag de'i khyim du ma 'dong zhig /ces de dag gis dam bcas
so| |de nas dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms pa zhig ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing mnyan du yod par phyin te/ de khyim bdag de'i gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas dge slong dag gis de ngal bsor bcug ste gnas dang
mal stan dag byin nas des bsam pa/ de ring la ngal bso zhing zan yang gral du zos la/ sang nas bsod snyoms blang ngo / /snyam du sems shing 'dug pa las/ dge slong gzhi na 'khod pa dag lhung bzed
dang chos gos khyer te bsod snyoms la dong ba dang / bsod snyoms pa des bsam pa/ gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag ni/ de ltar phongs pa lta na/ bdag kyang de 'dra bar 'gyur gyi/ bsod snyoms slong
du 'gro'o/ /snyam nas de lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po dang / sgo lcags kyang khyer nas mnyan du yod par rim gyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ khyim bdag de'i
khyim du 'ongs nas des de la bde bar phyin tam zhes tshig tu smras/ stan bting / rkang pa la phyag byas nas de'i mdun du 'dug go /de de'i mdun du 'dug nas des de la nor las byung ba'i bsod nams
kyi dngos po bdun du yon tan bshad pa dang / khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gis de thams cad bsgrubs lags so/ /bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis cung zad
zad kyang sbyar ba med de/ khyod kyis gtsug lag khang na thog mar kha zas med de/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci gsung / bdag gis der mang du phul na/ 'phags
pas gzhan zhig tu byon te nor bsnyam/ bsod snyoms pa des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod kyi gtsug lag khang gi lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po dag shes sam/ 'phags pa/ 'tshal lo/ /
des lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po dag bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de'i don glo bar chud do/ /zhes smras pa dang / bsod snyoms pas de khyer nas slar song ngo / /khyim bdag
kyang de'i phyi bzhin du song ste gtsug lag khang du 'dug nas ji tsam dge slong de dag bsod snyoms khyer te 'ong ba mthong ste/ mthong nas des 'phags pa/ khyed cag gang nas byon ces smras pa dang
de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag /spyod yul la dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /'phags pa/ kaR+sha pa Na gar mchis/ khyim bdag /gnas khang na yod do/ /bsnams te spyon/ de dag gis phyung
ste byin no/ /des smras pa/ da spyod yul gyi dad pa bskyed du bzhud cig /de dag gis ma spobs nas cang mi zer bar 'dug nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag de 'phya ba ni/ yus te/ de bas na/ rnam pa bzhi ni/ ma bgo zhig /de ni mchod rten thams cad kyi dang / phyogs
bzhi'i dge 'dun thams cad kyi dang / nad gsos kyi rin thams cad dang / zas nar ma thams cad do/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ drug sde dag ljongs rgyu ba spyod cing skar ma shar tsam zhig
na| gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang / dge slong de dag gis gang mdza' ba'i gnas su ngal bso zhing 'dug tu bcug pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ci zhig bsdad du yod
ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa zhig par bya'am/ rgan rim bzhin du ci'i phyir mi bgo/ de dag ji ltar rgan rim bzhin du 'ged pa la zhugs pa dang / gsar bu dag ma bgos par nam
nangs so/ /de dag nam nangs pa dang langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /nged cag 'dong gi/ mal stan longs shig /dge slong dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed cag skad cig 'khod
pa'i phyir khyed kyis dge 'dun thams cad la gnod pa byas so/ /de dag gis smras pa/ de ni/ ston pa'i bka' lung bzhin no/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
dang | bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skar ma shar phan chad mal stan ma bgo zhig /bgos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /mal stan 'ged pas kyang ma bgo
zhig /bgos na/ 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bdun pa'o// //mdor na/ rgun 'brum dang yang 'bras bu gzhan/ /
mes rung ba yang de bzhin te/ /zhugs thabs mar me sdong po dang / drang srong chen pos gnang ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul kun nas ljongs rgyu ba
spyod cing ro hi ta kar gshegs te ro ha ti ka'i gnod sbyin bal glang ldan zhes bya ba'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin bal glang ldan bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ do nub bdag gi gnas su dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs par ci
gnang / de nas gnod sbyin bal glang ldan la bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de nas gnod sbyin bal glang ldan bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis
bzhes par rig nas des gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul/ stan par tshangs can dang / la ba dang / sngas gru bzhi pa dag kyang lnga brgya lnga brgya sprul/ me mdag dud pa med pa bkang pa lnga brgya
yang sprul te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la ni/ gtsug lag khang chen po bskos/ de'i lhag ma dag ni/ dge slong dag la bskos te/ gtsug lag khang gi lhag ma dge slong dag la bskos
nas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sang
bdag gi khyim du dge slong gi dgu 'dun dang thabs cig tu bshos gsol bar cig nang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas na/ gnod sbyin bal glang ldan la cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes
pa dang gnod sbyin bal glang ldan gyi grogs po kha che'i yul na gnod sbyin u ni ko zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des de la sang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos la

spyan drangs kyi/ stong phyogs kyi nags kyi shing thog las skur cig /ces spring ba dang / des rgun 'brum dang / bal po se'u dang / 'bra go la sogs pas snod bkang ste gnod sbyin gyi lag tu bskur ro/ /des
gtsug lag khang gi dag rar spungs te bzhag go/ /dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ci zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams
'di ni/ stod phyogs kyi nags kyi shing thog go /dge slong dag gis ji ltar bgyi zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mes rung bar gyis la zo zhig /dge slong dag gis re
re nas rung bar byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung bar spungs la kha gsum mam/ bzhir mes reg par byas pas rung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams kyis rung bar byas nas
dge 'dun dag la brims pa dang / lhag nas dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag kun ma nyes la nang du chus blugs te der tshags kyis tshogs
la phyi dro'i skom du 'thungs shig /de dag gis phyi dra'i skom du brims na/ 'on kyang lhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskol te zhog la/ de'i
phyi de nyin skom du brims shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dgun gyi dus la bab pas dge slong rnams grang ste gzhi bstar ba'i steng du me bus pa dang / gzhi bstar ba dag ma
rung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhi bstar ba'i steng du me ma 'bud par zhugs ling gi steng du me bus shig /zhugs ling gi steng du me bus pa dang / dud
par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi rol tu zhugs ling gi nang du bus la dud pa med pa dang / mdag ma la ci bder spyod cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ bzo
bo zhig gis dge slong rnams la me mar gyi sdong bu yal ga gcig pa zhig byin pa dang / de dag gis ma blangs so/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun la mar me'i sdong po yal ga gcig pa grub na/ gnang ngo / /gang zag la yang gnang ngo / /yal ga gnyis pa'am/ yal ga mang po dag ni/ dge 'dun
la gnang gi /gang zag la ni/ mi gnang ngo / /rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'o// //mdor na/ glo bur gnyis po bya ba dang / chu klung pha rol gnyis po dang //

mang du ma rung byas pa dang / lus tshad kyi ni chos gos so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong glo bur du lhags
pa dag cig gtsug lag khang du phyin pa dang / gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis ngal bsor bcug go /de dag ngal sos zin pa dang / de dag gis ci yod pa dag brkus te dong ngo / /de ltar gyur pa dge slong
dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ngo mi shes pa rnams ngal bsor ma gzhug cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo mi shes par ngal
bsor ma gzhug cig /ces bka' stsal nas ngo shes pa zhig ngal bsor bcug pa dang / de de'i phyi bzhin du ngo mi shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te dge slong de phyi rol tu song ba dang / des de'i lhung
bzed dang chos gos dag len pa la zhugs pa dang / gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis bsam pa/ 'di ni/ gdon mi za bar de'i grogs po zhig go /snyam nas des de ma bags nas des de khyer te bros so/ /phyis

dge slong de slar 'ongs nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos mi snang nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag gi lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag sus khyer/ gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong gis smras pa/ khyod kyi

grogs pos khyer ro/ /des smras pa/ nga dang ngo shes pa ni/ med kyi/ nga'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos khyod kyis bor gyi/ khyod kyis skyin pa byin cig /de dang dge slong gzhi na gnas pa dag lhan cig tu
gcig la gcig rtsod par gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo bur du 'ongs pa'i
dge slong la 'di su zhig ces dris shig /de ste dge slong de ngas ngo shes so/ /zhes zer na/ dge slong de la de ste khyod kyi lhung bzed dang / chos gos sam/ nga'i yang rung 'di brnya zhes zer na/
sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes dris shig /de ste ma sbyin cig ces zer na/ rin thang bzhin du chod la phob cig /de ste byin cig /ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad do/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod
pa na ste/ dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa gzhan zhig /gzhi na 'dug pa'i dge slong zhig gis ngal bsor bcug nas de'i phyi bzhin du ngo mi shes pa'i dge slong zhig 'ongs te ji tsam na gzhi na gnas
pa'i dge slong de so shing dor du phyi rol tu song ngo / /de nas de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dag khyer ba dang / glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag gis bsam pa/ 'di yang sngon khyim 'di na gnas
pa zhig yin no/ /snyam nas dos kyang cung zad kyang ma smras nas de khyer te bros so/ /gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong de slar 'ongs pa dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos mi snang nas des smras pa/ tshe
dang ldan pa/ nga'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos sus khyer /des smras pa/ gnas khang na 'dug pas khyer ro/ /nga'i gnas khang na gnas pa gang yin/ khyod kyis lhung bzed dang / chos gos
khyer gyi/ skyin pa byin cig /de dang de gnyis lhan cig rtsod par gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo bur du

'ongs pa'i dge slong gis gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong la dge slong 'di khyod kyi cung zad ci'ang rung slong na/ sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes dris shig /de ste ma sbyin cig ces zer na/ rin thang bzhin du phob cig
de ste byin cig ces zer ba las khyer na khyer du zad do/ /gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi na gnas pa'i dge slong zhig la chos gos bzhag nas chems bzhag pa/ de steng song

gi 'og tu nga'i slob ma dag 'ongs te 'dod ces zer na/ byin cig ces smras nas song ngo / /de'i slob ma zhig gis chos gos khyer te bros so/ /de la dge slong des blangs pa dang / phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas
de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ste slob ma la byin cig ces zer na/ des khyer ba ni khyer rgyal du zad mod kyi/ gtan tshigs
yod na/ byin cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis gtan tshigs yod na/ byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / gtan tshigs kun gyis shes shing grags par spring ste/ gzhan gyis thos nas brkus pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ste gtan tshigs smros shig /de'ang gtan tshigs 'di 'dra bar shes pa zhig 'ongs na/ de la byin cig ces sgos shig /dge slong dag cig lam du zhugs
nas klung gi 'gram du phyin te de gru'i nang du zhugs pa dang de na dge slong gzhan zhig 'dug pa la gru'i nang du zhugs pas smras pa/ bdag gi tshad thur 'o ni/ tshur stsol cig ces

smras pa dang / des tshad thur byin pa zhugs pa las lhung ste chus khyer ba dang / des smras pa/ kho bo'i tshad thur khyod kyis bor gyi/ khyod kyis skyin pa byin cig /de gnyis rtsod par gyur pa dang / dge slong
dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs sam zhes smros la 'ongs so/ /zhes zer na/ gdod byin cig /de las gzhan
du na ni/ rin thang bzhin du chod la phob cig /yo byad gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du sbyor cig /ji ltar klung bzhin du ri la 'dzeg pa dang / 'obs la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar te/ lag tu
'ongs kyi/ thong zhes zer te btang ba las stor na ni/ stor du zad do/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ gtsug lag khang zhig na gtsug lag khang skyong gis sgo rab tu ma bsdams nas rab
tu ma brtags pas/ rkun po dag gis glags rnyed de brkus so/ /dge slong dag cig de'i skyin pa ni/ gtsug lag khang skyong la dbab po/ /zhes 'phya'o/ /de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan
'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sgo \?\ bsdam pa ni/ rnam pa lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ rgya gtan dang / sgo gtan dang / 'khor lo dang / sgo lcags dang /
lde mig kyog po dag go/ gal te de thams cad gtsug lag khang na yod la/ gtsug lag khang skyong gis bzhi ni/ bcug la gcig ma bcug na/ cha gcig de la phob cig /gsum bcug la gnyis ma
bcug na/ sum gnyis de la phob cig /gnyis bcug la/ gsum ma bcug na/ sum cha de la phob cig/ gcig bcug la bzhi ma bcug na/ bzhi cha de la phob cig /de ste thams cad ma bcug na/
ji tsam spyod pa de thams cad de la phob cig/ de ste bsdam pa rnam pa lngas bsdams na/ stor ba ni/ stor du zad do/ /gtsug lag khang na gtsug lag khang skyong la skyin pa ma dbab cig/ gleng gzhi ni/
mnyan du yod pa na ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pa lis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis chos gos khru tshad du gyis shig /ces bka'
stsal na/ btsun pa/ khru thung la lus ring na/ de'ang chos gos khru tshad du bgyi'am/ u pa li/ de ni/ lus kyi tshad du gyis shig /gang lus thung la khru ring na/ ci/ de'ang lus kyi tshad du bgyi'am/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ u pa li/ lus thung la khru ring na/ de yang lus kyi tshad du gyis shig /lus kyang che la khru yang ring na/ khru tshad du gyis shig /gzhan du na/ 'das pa dang
bcas pa ste/ ji ltar bcas pa las lhag pa zhig rnyed na yang de la byin gyis mi brlab mod kyi/ 'on kyang rung ba la byin gyis brlabs te rung bar byas na/ slob dpon nam/ mkhan po'am/ mdza'
bo'i yin par bsngos la spyod cig /rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu pa'o// //mdor na/ sham thabs rjes su gnang ba dang / /
sham thabs 'theb kyang de bzhin te/ /stod chags mchod par bya ba dang / /byin len ma byas de bzhin te/ /rdul dang rkyang pa bstan pa brjod/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze
ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /dge slong dag dpyid kyi dus la bab pas/ sham thabs rnams rdul gyis dri mi zhim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ sham thabs kyi 'thab chongs shig /sbyar ma yang rdul te dri mi zhim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stod chags chongs shig /de'ang de bzhin
du dri mi zhim par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stod chags kyi 'theb bcang bar bya ste/ de'ang dus su khrus shig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong
rnams chos gos gyon te mchod pa'i las dag byed pa na/ de dag dri dang / phye ma dang / 'bru mar dag gis ma rung bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dri dag gis
ma rung bar gyur pa ni/ khrus la gyon cig /gang phye mas ma rung bar gyur pa ni/ sprugs la gyon cig /gang 'bru mar gyis ma rung bar gyur pa la ni/ snum 'dag pa gang yin pas khrus la gyon
cig /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ dge slong rnams zan za ba las byin len ma byas par lhung bzed du lhung nas the tshom skyes te mi za ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
byin len byos la longs shig /byin len byed pa med nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i than kor cher longs te 'or la the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig /khu ba'i nang du lhung nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang than kor cher 'or la zo zhig /gang dge slong dag /phongs pa'i tshe ngas gnang ba de/ ma phongs pa'i tshe de ltar ma spyod cig /spyad na/ 'das pa dang bcas
par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / rlung dang / char pa dag bab nas lhung bzed kyi nang du rdul song ste the tshom skyes nas ma zos/ gral na za ba'i tshe yang de bzhin te
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams/ rdul ni/ rnam pa 'di lnga ste/ rung ba'i rdul dang / mi rung ba'i rdul dang / bzhag pa'i rdul dang / ma bzhag pa'i rdul dang / rdul gyi rdul
dang lnga'o/ /gzhan yang rdul rnam pa lnga ste/ bza' pa'i rdul dang / btung ba'i rdul dang / gos kyi rdul dang / me tog gi rdul dang / 'bras bu'i rdul te/ mngon par gsal ba med pas na/ de
thams cad kyang rung ba yin gyi/ the tshom du ma byed par zo zhig /rkyang pa'i sgo bzhi pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu pa'o/ /rkyang pa'i sgo rnams rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhung dam
pa| bam po zhe bzhi pa/ nongs pa dmigs pa zhes bgyi'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa mi dmigs pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa gzugs ma
mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/ gzugs mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa gzugs med pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa bstan du mchis pa zhes bgyi'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/
gsungs pa/ nyes pa bstan du med pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa bar du thogs pa dang bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ bar du thogs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa bar du thogs pa dang /
bcas pa zhes mi bya'o/ /nongs pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa 'dus byas pa zhes bgyi
'am/ 'dus ma byas pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa 'dus byas pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa 'jig rten pa zhes bgyi'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa
'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ ma gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa phung por gtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa khams su gtogs pa
zhes bgyi'am/ khams su mi gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa khams su gtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa bzung ba zhes bgyi'am/ ma bzung ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa

ma bzung ba zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa lung bstan pa zhes bgyi'am/ lung ma bstan pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa lung bstan pa zhes kyang bya/ lung ma bstan pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /lung bstan pa gang zhe na/
gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa bcas pa las bsam bzhin du 'da' bar byed pa ni/ lung bstan pa'o/ /lung bstan pa gang zhe na/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa bcas pa las ma
bsam par 'da' ba ni/ lung ma bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa 'byung ba chen por lung bstan pa zhes bgyi'am/ 'byung ba chen por lung ma bstan pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa 'byung ba chen por
lung bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa kun tu sbyor ba zhes bgyi'am/ mi sbyor ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa bsgribs pa zhes bgyi'am/ ma bsgribs pa zhes
bgyi| gsungs pa/ nyes pa bsgribs pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'am/ nyon ma mongs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa nyon mongs pa zhes kyang bya/ nyon ma mongs pa zhes kyang
bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa las bsam bzhin du 'da' ba 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa'o/ /nyon ma mongs pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas
pa las ma bsam par 'da' ba 'di ni/ nyon ma mongs pa'o/ /nongs pa zang zing dang bcas pa zhes bgyi'am/ nongs pa zang zing ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa zang zing du bcas pa
zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa chags pa la gnas zhes bgyi'am/ 'byung ba la gnas pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa chags pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa dgrar bcas pa
zhes bgyi'am/ dgrar ma bcas pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ dgrar bcas pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa dmigs pa zhes bgyi'am/ mi dmigs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ mi dmigs pa zhes bya'o//
nongs pa sems zhes bgyi'am/ sems ma lags pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa sems ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa rnam par smin pa zhes bgyi'am/ rnam par mi smin pa zhes bgyi /
gsungs pa/ rnam par smin pa zhes kyang bya/ ma smin pa zhes kyang bya'o/ /smin pa gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa bcas pa las bsam bzhin du 'das pa 'di ni/ smin pa zhes bya'o/ /ma smin pa
gang zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa las ma bsam par 'das pa ni/ ma smin pa'o/ /nongs pa las zhes bgyi'am/ las ma lags pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa las zhes
bya'o| |nongs pa nang gi skye mched du gtogs pa zhes bgyi'am/ phyi'i skye mched du gtogs pa zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ phyi'i skye mched du gtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /nongs pa sngar 'das pa zhes bgyi
'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bgyi'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bgyi/ gsungs pa/ nyes pa sngar 'das pa zhes kyang bya/ ma 'ongs pa zhes kyang bya/ da ltar byung ba zhes kyang bya'o/ /sngar 'das pa gang zhe na/
